name: Absol

builds.name: Night Cut
builds.explanation: X Attack may be used in battle items for higher aggression and opening KO windows further.

builds.name: Psycho Pursuit
builds.explanation: Plays to stay on the map and fights more than assassinates. An extremely high proficiency with Pursuit is required for this set up. X Attack may be used in battle items for higher aggression and opening KO windows further.

builds.name: Night Punch
builds.explanation: X Attack may be used in battle items for higher aggression and opening KO windows further.

notes: All of Absol's attacks and damaging moves can critically strike. Absol's Critical-Hit rate increases at levels 5 and 9.

skills.name: Super Luck
skills.description: Increased Critical-Hit rate by 15%.

rsb.name: Super Luck
rsb.true_desc: This Pokémon's critical-hit rate is increased by an additional 15%.

skills.name: Attack
skills.description: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, dealing damage to enemies and lowering their Defense by 15% for 2s when it hits. If this boosted attack hits only a single target, it deals increased damage.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, damaging opposing Pokémon and decreasing their Defense by 15% for 2s when it hits. If this boosted attack hits only a single target, it deals bonus damage.

skills.name: Feint
skills.description: Dash in an arc, attacking enemies that come in contact with Absol. This move ignores the defense stat and shield effects of enemies.

rsb.name: Feint
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: The user dashes in an arc forward, damaging opposing Pokémon and increasing the user's basic attack speed by 60% for 0.5s when this move hits. This move ignores the Defense and shield effects of opposing Pokémon hit.
rsb.notes: Each use alternates between a rightward and leftward arc.

upgrades.name: Night Slash
upgrades.description1: Dash in an outward arc, dealing damage to enemies. If this first attack hits, a second attack can also be performed. The second attack has the user dash straight ahead, dealing damage to enemies and increasing the user's critical-hit rate. The lower the enemies HP, the more the user's critical-hit rate is increased.
upgrades.description2: Using this move again will restore the user's HP.

rsb.name: Night Slash
rsb.label: Damage - First Hit
rsb.true_desc: The user dashes in a leftward arc forward, damaging opposing Pokémon and increasing the user's basic attack speed by 60% for 0.5s when this dash hits. If this dash hits, the move can be used again within 6s. This second use has the user dash straight ahead, repeating the effects of the first dash when it hits. The critical-hit rate of this move is increased by 0.8% for every 1% missing HP of opposing Pokémon hit, up to 30% increased critical-hit rate at 38% missing HP or more.
rsb.notes: The first use is a rightward arc forward from the perspective of the orange team (right-side team, which has the map flipped horizontally when in battle).
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Restores the user's HP for 50% of damage dealt with the second dash hit.

upgrades.name: Pursuit
upgrades.description1: Dash to the designated location and quickly charge an enemy with the next basic attack. (Basic attack range is doubled while this effect is active). If the basic attack lands from behind, its damage is increased and this move's cooldown is reduced.
upgrades.description2: Increased movement speed.

rsb.name: Pursuit
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: The user dashes forward, empowering the next auto attack for 3s. With this empowered attack, the user leaps to an opposing Pokémon and attacks, damaging opposing Pokémon hit. This damage is increased against opposing Pokémon hit in the back. If this empowered attack hits any opposing Pokémon in the back, this move's cooldown is reduced by 80%.
rsb.notes: When the user has an empowered attack readied, nearby opposing Pokémon have their backs highlighted.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases the user's movement speed by 35% for 2s after using this move and before using the empowered attack.

skills.name: Slash
skills.description: Slash with sharp claws in front of the user, increasing this move's critical-hit rate.

rsb.name: Slash
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: The user slashes in the designated direction, damaging opposing Pokémon hit.
rsb.notes: This move's critical-hit rate is increased by 15%.

upgrades.name: Psycho Cut
upgrades.description1: Attack with blades formed by psychic power that decrease the movement speed of enemies for a short time when this move hits. Also increases basic attack damage dealt to the affected enemy for up to 3 attacks after this move hits.
upgrades.description2: Also increases movement speed for a short time when the user gets close to the enemy that this move hit.

rsb.name: Psycho Cut
rsb.label: Damage - Initial Hit
rsb.true_desc: The user throws a psychic slash in the designated direction, damaging opposing Pokémon hit and decreasing their movement speed by 90% for 2s (decaying by 25% every 0.5s). 3 marks are applied to opposing Pokémon hit by the psychic slash for 5s. When the user deals damage to a marked target, 1 mark is consumed, dealing additional damage. The third mark deals increased damage when consumed.
rsb.notes: The critical-hit rate of the psychic slash and consumed marks is increased by 15%. The marks can be cleansed.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases the user's movement speed by 20% when an opposing Pokémon is marked by this move.

upgrades.name: Sucker Punch
upgrades.description1: Look for an opening to attack an enemy, decreasing the movement speed of the user and the target enemy for the duration. After a short time, charge forward to attack the enemy. However, if the user receives damage or gets attacked before it charges, attack immediately and shove the enemy.
upgrades.description2: Increases basic attack speed for a short time when this move hits.

rsb.name: Sucker Punch
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: The user becomes unstoppable and targets an opposing Pokémon and enters a counter stance for 1s, decreasing the movement speed of the user and the target by 50% for the duration. After 1s, the user leaves the counter stance to counterattack, charging behind the target and damaging the target and other opposing Pokémon. If the user is attacked or the target attacks during the counter stance, however, the user dodges the damage and effects of the first hit and immediately counterattacks, shoving the target and dealing increased damage to the target and other opposing Pokémon.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases the user's basic attack speed by 40% for 3s after using this move.

skills.name: Midnight Slash
skills.buffs: 80% Movement Speed, 20% Max HP Shield
skills.description: Unleashes a flurry of slashes in front of the user. This move ends by unleashing powerful blades of energy, dealing increased damage to enemies and shoves them.

rsb.name: Midnight Slash
rsb.label: Damage - Full (6 Hits)
rsb.true_desc: The user briefly becomes unstoppable before becoming untargetable and invulnerable for 1.15s while unleashing a flurry of 5 slashes in front of themself in the designated area, damaging opposing Pokémon in the area of effect. The user then becomes unstoppable again and unleashes a final slash in front of them with 3 blades of energy, shoving opposing Pokémon and dealing damage, up to 4 times at close range and down to 1 time at maximum range.
rsb.notes: The damage of the flurry of 5 slashes is divided by the number of targets hit. The first hit from the final slash deals full damage to each target hit; subsequent hits deal 30% of the full damage to the same target.

name: Aegislash

builds.name: Iron Claw
builds.explanation: Weakness Policy can act as an inbetween for defensive vs offensive item between Scope Lens and Focus Band

notes: Auto attacks, Shadow Claw, and Iron Head (after using Shadow Claw+) can critically strike. While in Shield Stance however, boosted attacks do not critically strike. Aegislash's Critical-Hit rate increases at levels 5 and 9.

skills.name: No Guard
skills.description: Honedge and Doublade do not gain the stat benefits of Stance Change. However, their boosted attack functions like Aegislash's Sword Stance boosted attack.
skills.passive2_description: Aegislash can switch between Sword Stance and Shield Stance. Using a blade move switches stance to Sword Stance; which increases Attack, movement speed by 5%, and Attack Speed by 15%. Using a shield move switches stance to Shield Stance; which increases Defense and Sp. Defense and reduces Attack Speed by 20%. After switching stances, movement speed and basic attack speed are further increased by 15% for 3.5s.

rsb.name: No Guard
rsb.true_desc: Honedge and Doublade do not gain the stat benefits of Stance Change; their auto attacks act like Aegislash's Sword Forme auto attacks.

rsb2.name: Stance Change
rsb2.label: Defense - Increase (Shield Stance)
rsb2.true_desc: Changes to Sword Forme when using blade moves (Shadow Sneak, Sacred Sword, or Shadow Claw, and Coup de Grace); increasing Attack, increasing movement speed by 5%, and increasing auto attack speed by 15%. Changes to Shield Forme when using shield moves (Iron Defense, Wide Guard, or Iron Head), increasing Defense and Sp. Def, and decreasing auto attack speed by 20%.
rsb2.notes: Increases movement speed and auto attack speed by an additional 15% for 3.5s when changing stances.
rsb2.add3_true_desc: Stat change applications require a forme change to come into effect after evolution.

skills.name: Attack
skills.description: Slash at enemies in front of Aegislash, dealing damage to them. If the boost count is one or more, basic attacks become a boosted attack. When in Blade Stance: pierce through enemies, dealing damage. When in Shield Stance: ram enemies, dealing damage and leaving them unable to act for a short time, restore HP, and reduce the cooldown of Sacred Sword and Shadow Claw when this attack hits. Every boosted attack consumes one boost count. Up to 4 boosted boosted attacks can be stored.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: When in Sword Forme: slashes at opposing Pokémon, damaging those hit. When in Shield Forme: rams at opposing Pokémon, damaging those hit. Becomes a boosted attack if the boost count is at 1 or more, consuming 1 boost count; the boosted attack changes based on the current Forme. The boost count caps at 4, and boosted attacks remain readied until used.
rsb.notes: As a boosted attack in Sword Forme: pierces through the target, damaging opposing Pokémon hit. As a boosted attack in Shield Forme: slams into the target, damaging opposing Pokémon hit and stunning them for 0.1s; restores HP, and reduces the cooldown of Sacred Sword or Shadow Claw by 1s when it hits.
rsb.add1_true_desc: Deals an additional 8.5% of the enemies Max HP as damage.
rsb.add1_notes: Against Wild Pokemon: The additional damage from maximum HP is capped at 1000.

skills.name: Shadow Sneak
skills.description: Cast a shadow in the designated direction, dealing damage to enemies hit. After the shadow hits an enemy or travels its maximum distance, Aegislash warps to the shadow’s location, dealing damage to nearby enemies and increase boost count by 1.

rsb.name: Shadow Sneak
rsb.label: Damage - 2 Hits
rsb.true_desc: Casts a shadow toward the designated location, damaging opposing Pokémon hit. After hitting an opposing Pokémon or traveling maximum distance; warps to the shadow’s location, damaging opposing Pokémon at the location.
rsb.notes: Increases the boost count by 1 if the warp hits an opposing Pokémon.

upgrades.name: Sacred Sword
upgrades.description1: Aegislash thrusts its blade into the ground, creating a triangular zone. This zone erupts with a hidden power, dealing damage to enemies in the area and throws them. Also increases boost count by 1 for each enemy hit (capped at 2 for wilds, 4 for players). At the same time as the eruption, Aegislash slashes forward, dealing additional damage to enemies hit. For a short time after this slash hits, damage dealt by Aegislash partially ignores the Defense of all enemies.
upgrades.description2: Increase Attack for a short time after hitting enemies with this move.

rsb.name: Sacred Sword
rsb.label: Damage - Triangle Attack
rsb.true_desc: Thrusts their blade into the ground and creates a triangular zone that erupts with a hidden power, damaging opposing Pokémon in the area of effect and throwing them for 0.6s. At the same time as the eruption, slashes forward, dealing more damage to opposing Pokémon hit; and increasing Defense penetration by 25% for 3s if the slash hits.
rsb.notes: Increases the boost count by 1 for each target hit by the triangular zone erupting (up to 2 from hitting wild Pokémon).
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases Attack by 50 for 3s after the triangular zone hits.

upgrades.name: Shadow Claw
upgrades.description1: Aegislash slashes with its blade twice in the designated direction, dealing damage to enemies hit. Follow up with a final rising slash that deals damage to enemies hit and throw them. Boost count increases by 1 when at least one of the three slashes hits.
upgrades.description2: Increases Critical-Hit Rate with all attacks and moves except for Coup de Grace for a short time.

rsb.name: Shadow Claw
rsb.label: Damage - First 2 Hits
rsb.true_desc: Slashes forward with their blade twice, damaging opposing Pokémon with each attack, then follows up with a final rising slash, damaging opposing Pokémon and throwing them for 0.75s when the rising slash hits.
rsb.notes: Increases the boost count by 1 if this move hits.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases critical-hit rate by 20% for 1s after the final slash.

skills.name: Iron Defense
skills.description: Envelops Aegislash in a powerful protective force for 1s. The protection disappears after blocking one attack or after 1s and then increases boost count by 1.

rsb.name: Iron Defense
rsb.true_desc: Envelops the user in a powerful protective force for up to 3s, blocking the next attack.
rsb.notes: Increases the boost count by 1 when this move blocks an attack.

upgrades.name: Wide Guard
upgrades.description1: Focus in place for a short time to create a great shield on Aegislash. When this shield appears, boost count increases by 1, granting a shield to Aegislash and shoves enemies in front. While this shield is active, enemy player attacks increase boost count by 1 for each different enemy player (capping at 4). When this move ends, shove enemies in front of Aegislash once again.
upgrades.description2: Cooldown reduced by 1s.

rsb.name: Wide Guard
rsb.label: Shield
rsb.true_desc: Focuses in place, becomes unstoppable and grants a shield effect for up to 1.2s; and shoves opposing Pokémon in front for 0.75s. This move can be used again to end the move early. When the shield effect is depleted or the move ends; shoves opposing Pokémon in front for 0.75s and decreases their movement speed by 45% for 2s.
rsb.notes: Increases the boost count by 1 unconditionally when granting the shield effect. Increases the boost count by 1 more for each instance of damage received by the shield effect (up to 2 times). Increases boost count by 1 more if an opposing Pokémon is shoved at the end or unconditionally when the shield effect is depleted before it can end normally.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Reduces this move's cooldown by 1s.

upgrades.name: Iron Head
upgrades.description1: Dash in the designated direction, dealing damage to enemies hit. Also increases boost count by 1, and protects Aegislash with a special shield for a short time afterward. This shield doesn’t protect from hindrances, but it can nullify damage. When the shield blocks an attack, it disappears and boost count is increased by 1.
upgrades.description2: Increase Attack for a short time after blocking an attack.

rsb.name: Iron Head
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Dashes barreling forward, damaging opposing Pokémon hit. Protects the user with a special shield for 1s afterward; this shield blocks the damage of the next attack then disappears; reducing this move's cooldown by 3s after a successful block.
rsb.notes: Increases the boost count by 1 unconditionally after barreling forward. Increases the boost count by 1 more if the shield blocks an attack.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases Attack by 10% for 3s when the special shield blocks an attack.

skills.name: Coup de Grace
skills.buffs: 30% Movement Speed, 30% CDR, 20% Max HP Shield
skills.description: Unleash a ground-splitting slash in the designated direction, dealing damage to enemies hit. The lower their remaining HP, the more damage this move deals. If this slash knocks out an enemy, boost count increases by 1.

rsb.name: Coup de Grace
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Becomes unstoppable and unleashes a ground-splitting slash in the designated direction, damaging opposing Pokémon in the line area of effect, dealing additional missing HP damage to those hit.
rsb.notes: Increases the boost count by 2 if this Unite Move knocks out an opposing Pokémon.
rsb.add1_notes: Against Wild Pokémon: The additional damage from missing HP is capped at 1000.

name: Armarouge

builds.name: Armor Shock
builds.explanation: Choice Specs is better if most of your moves hit single targets.

notes: Only auto attacks can critically strike, but Armarouge has 0% base Critical-Hit rate at all levels.

rsb.name: Flash Fire
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: When this Pokémon takes Sp. Atk-based damage from opposing Pokémon, the damage this Pokémon takes is reduced by 20% for 3s, and their next auto attack deals additional damage. This Ability goes on a 10s cooldown after it ends.

skills.name: Attack - Charcadet
skills.description: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, dealing increased damage.
skills.basic2_description: Every time the user hits an opposing Pokémon with a basic attack, the user's cannon gauge increases, up to 5 times. When the cannon gauge is full, the user's next basic attack consumes the entire cannon gauge, hitting in a large area of effect with the basic attack damage and additionally in a second close range area of effect with the boosted attack damage.
skills.basic3_description: When the user hits an opposing Pokémon with a basic attack, a blazing mark is applied to them for 7s. Up to 3 marks can be applied, with subsequent marks refreshing the duration. If the user hits an opposing Pokémon with 3 blazing marks using Fire Spin or Armor Cannon, all the marks are consumed and additional damage is dealt to the opposing Pokémon, equal to 10% of their max HP, capped to 1000 damage. There is a 6s cooldown after consuming the marks before the user can apply blazing marks on the same opposing Pokémon again.

rsb.name: Incinerate
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Has the user attack the designated opposing Pokémon with a flame, setting them ablaze and dealing damage over time for 4s. When a Pokémon on the opposing team that's ablaze picks up a Berry, the Berry's effects are halved.

rsb.name: Fire Spin
rsb.label: Damage - per Tick
rsb.true_desc: Has the user generate a fierce vortex of fire around themself, dealing damage to opposing Pokémon hit. Each time Armarouge deals damage while Fire Spin is active, gain a shield. This shield can stack up to six times.
rsb.notes: Gain 20% movement speed while the vortex is active. The vortex lasts 3s, and its duration is increased by 1s if the user hits opposing Pokémon with an auto attack. This extended duration can stack up to 3 times, to a total vortex duration of 6s. Moving towards an enemy will additionally increase movement speed by 10%.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Upon using Fire Spin+, gain 3 stacks of shields.

rsb.name: Armor Cannon
rsb.label: Damage - Explosion
rsb.true_desc: Has the user combine their shoulder armor and start charging power. When charged past a minimum duration, the user then fires a blazing ball of flame. The user releases a shock wave in front of themself when firing, dealing damage to opposing Pokémon in close range.
rsb.notes: The fired ball of flame explodes when it hits an opposing Pokémon or after it travels a set distance, dealing damage to opposing Pokémon and leaving them unable to act for 0.45s. The user's Defense and Sp. Def are decreased by 5% while this move is on cooldown.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases the range of this move and auto attacks.

rsb.name: Will-O-Wisp
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Has the user shoot a flame in the designated direction, dealing damage to opposing Pokémon hit, leaving them burned and decreasing their movement speed by 20% for 2s. After using this move, the user's next auto attack becomes a boosted attack.

rsb.name: Flame Charge
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Has the user cloak themself in flame and charge in the designated direction, dealing damage to opposing Pokémon the user hits and shoving them for 0.45s. When this move hits an opposing Pokémon, the user is granted a shield for 3s and this move's cooldown is reduced by 20%.
rsb.notes: For 3s after using this move, the cannon gauge becomes full and will not decrease after boosted attacks are used.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Reduces the damage the user receives by 20% for 3s after this move hits an opposing Pokémon.

rsb.name: Psyshock
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Has the user materialize odd psychic waves to attack in three areas of effect in front of themself, dealing damage to opposing Pokémon hit while ignoring 35% of their Sp. Def. The third attack throws opposing Pokémon hit for 0.7s. Multiple of the areas of effect can hit the same opposing Pokémon but the second damage instance will be reduced by 25% and the third by 50%.
rsb.notes: For 3s after using this move, the cannon gauge becomes full and will not decrease after boosted attacks are used.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases this move's area of effect.

skills.name: Psykaboom
skills.buffs: 30% Movement Speed, 30% CDR, 20% Max HP Shield

rsb.name: Psykaboom
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Has the user jump up, becoming unstoppable for 1.85s, and charge psychic power for 1s, then create an area that leaves opposing Pokémon unable to act. While the user is charging psychic power, the Unite Move can be used again to adjust the position of the area. The user then fires a ball of flame towards the center of the area, dealing damage to opposing Pokémon and throwing them away from the center of the area.

name: Azumarill

builds.name: Aqua Pulse
builds.explanation: Heavy focus on maintaining solo targetting

builds.name: Whirl Pulse
builds.explanation: Heavy focus on maintaining solo targetting. Weakness Policy substitution or Focus Band substitution gives bulk through attack scaled healing of Whirlpool

builds.name: Pool Play
builds.explanation: Heavy focus on maintaining solo targetting. Weakness Policy substitution or Focus Band substitution gives bulk through attack scaled healing of Whirlpool

notes: All attacks and damaging moves can critically strike, but the damage is 170% instead of 200%.

skills.name: Huge Power
skills.description: When this Pokémon hits only a single enemy with a basic attack, a move, or their Unite Move, the hit is always a critical hit. However, when hitting two or more enemies at once with a basic attack, a move, or its Unite Move, the hits are never critical hits.

rsb.name: Huge Power
rsb.true_desc: When this Pokémon hits only a single enemy with an auto attack, a move, or their Unite Move, the hit is always a critical hit. However, when hitting two or more enemies at once with an auto attack, a move, or its Unite Move, the hits are never critical hits.
rsb.notes: Critical hits deal 170% rather than 200%.

skills.name: Attack
skills.description: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, dealing increased damage to enemies within a cone area of effect in front of this Pokémon.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, dealing increased damage to enemies within a cone area of effect in front of this Pokémon.

skills.name: Tackle
skills.description: Charge forward, dealing damage to any enemy hit and leave them unable to act for a short time.

rsb.name: Tackle
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Charge forward; dealing damage to any enemy hit and leave them unable to act for 0.5s.

upgrades.name: Play Rough
upgrades.description1: Increases movement speed for a short time and changes the next basic attack. When Azumarill performs their next basic attack, lunge at one enemy in range and deliver repeated blows; dealing damage to that target and leave it unable to act for a short time.
upgrades.description2: Further increases movement speed when this move is used, and also reduces this move’s cooldown.

rsb.name: Play Rough
rsb.label: Damage - per Hit (3 hits)
rsb.true_desc: Increase movement speed by 30% for 4s and change the next auto attack. When performing the next auto attack, lunge at one enemy in range and deliver repeated blows dealing damage to that target and leave it unable to act for .75s.
rsb.notes: Using Play Rough will overwrite any active Aqua Tail attack change. Play Rough attacks count as auto attacks for the purpose of items, lifesteal and other benefits.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Further increases movement speed to 35% when this move is used, and also reduces this move’s cooldown by 1s.

upgrades.name: Water Pulse
upgrades.description1: Shoot a pulsing blast of water in front of Azumarill. When the blast of water hits an enemy, decrease that Pokémon’s movement speed and deal damage to all enemies in an area of effect around the initial target hit. The blast of water then automatically bounces to another target if one is available. Including the first target, the blast of water can bounce between up to 3 targets consecutively, and each hit behaves in the same way as the first. While the blast of water is traveling, Azumarill can perform a short rolling dash in a designated direction.
upgrades.description2: Increase the maximum number of targets that the blast of water can bounce between by 2.

rsb.name: Water Pulse
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Shoot a pulsing blast of water in front of Azumarill. When shooting the blast, Azumarill may perform a short rolling dash in a designated direction. When the blast of water hits an enemy, decrease their movement speed by 40% for 2s and deal damage to all enemies in an area of effect around the initial target. The blast of water then automatically bounces to another target if one is available. Including the first target, the blast of water can bounce between up to three targets consecutively, and each hit behaves in the same way as the first.

skills.name: Bubble
skills.description: Spray bubbles in a cone; dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and decrease their movement speed for a short time. This move can be used while moving.

rsb.name: Bubble
rsb.label: Damage - Initial Hit
rsb.true_desc: Spray bubbles in a cone dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and decreasing their movement speed by 30% for 2s. This move can be used while moving.
rsb.add1_true_desc: Subsequent hits on the same target deal 25% damage.

upgrades.name: Whirlpool
upgrades.description1: For a short time, four small whirlpools appear that swirl around Azumarill as they move. If a whirlpool hits an enemy, the whirlpool deals damage and restores Azumarill's HP. If a whirlpool hits an enemy player, an increased amount of HP is restored.
upgrades.description2: Reduce this move’s cooldown and increases the amount of HP it restored.

rsb.name: Whirlpool
rsb.label: Damage - per Hit
rsb.true_desc: For 5s, four small whirlpools appear that swirl around Azumarill as it moves. If a whirlpool hits a wild Pokémon, the whirlpool deals damage to them and restores Azumarill's HP. If a whirlpool hits an enemy player, an increased amount of HP is restored.
rsb.notes: Moving clockwise against your target will grant more hits against that target, and counter-clockwise will reduce the number of hits.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Reduces this move’s cooldown by 2s and increases the amount of HP restored.

upgrades.name: Aqua Tail
upgrades.description1: Increases the speed and area of effect of Azumarill's next 3 basic attacks. If these basic attacks hit from a distance, they also deal increased damage, restore Azumarill's HP, and can ignore the Defense stat and shield effects of enemies hit.
upgrades.description2: After activating this move, Azumarill's next 3 basic attacks will also reduce the cooldown of all moves when they hit an enemy from a distance.

rsb.name: Aqua Tail
rsb.label: Damage - Basic (Close Range)
rsb.true_desc: Increase area-of-effect and attack speed for the next three auto attacks by 20% for 6s. If these auto attacks hit from a distance, they also deal increased damage and restore HP. Using Aqua Tail will overwrite any active Play Rough attack change.
rsb.notes: Aqua Tail attacks count as auto attacks for the purpose of items, lifesteal and other benefits.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Aqua Tail attacks that hit from a distance reduce the cooldown of all moves by 0.8s.

skills.name: Belly Bash
skills.buffs: 30% Movement Speed, 30% CDR, 20% Max HP Shield
skills.description: Azumarill pounds their belly 3 times, granting a shield. With each pound, Azumarill loses HP in exchange for increased Attack. Azumarill can move while pounding their belly. Afterward, target an enemy and then charge at the target; dealing damage to them and throwing all enemies hit while charging.

rsb.name: Belly Bash
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Azumarill targets an enemy player and then pounds their belly three times; losing 5% remaining HP with each pound in exchange for a 6.5% max HP shield that stacks with each pound and lasts 6s. Azumarill gains 60 Attack for 5s and can move while pounding their belly. Azumarill then charges at the target damaging and throwing all Pokémon hit while charging and Pokémon within the area effect around the target. Azumarill is unstoppable during this move.

name: Blastoise

builds.name: Pump Spin
builds.explanation: Used as alternative zone control bulk piece where enemy compositions are slippery, mobile and high melee which make Surf harder to hit. Requires Blue Buff + 1 cdr item to hit 2 Hydro Pump within 1 Rapid Spin. Muscle Band does not change whether you will hit 2 boosteds or not within the Rapid Spin for optimal attack count within Rapid Spin.

notes: Only auto attacks can critically strike, but Blastoise has 0% base Critical-Hit rate at all levels.

skills.name: Torrent
skills.description: When the Pokémon is at half HP or less, its Attack and Sp. Attack are increased.

rsb.name: Torrent
rsb.true_desc: Increases Attack and Sp. Attack by 20% while at half HP or less.

skills.name: Attack
skills.description: Blastoise’s third auto attack is empowered - dealing 3 instances of damage, slowing enemies hit and reducing Blastoise’s move cooldowns by 1 second each.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, dealing 3 instances of damage, slowing enemies hit by 50% for 1s, and reducing Blastoise’s move cooldowns by 1s.
rsb.add1_true_desc: When evolving into Blastoise, auto attacks now strike twice for 50% Atk.

skills.name: Water Gun
skills.description: Attacks with a shot of water, shoving enemies and decreasing their movement speed for a short time.

rsb.name: Water Gun
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Blastoise shoots a jet of water in a straight line; damaging, knocking back, and stunning enemies hit for 0.5s. Enemies hit are also slowed by 30% for 1s.

upgrades.name: Hydro Pump
upgrades.description1: Has the user attack by blasing out a huge volume of water, dealing damage to opposing Pokémon and shoving them when it hits.
upgrades.description2: Increases damage dealt by this move.

rsb.name: Hydro Pump
rsb.label: Damage (3 Hits)
rsb.true_desc: Blastoise shoots a large amount of water, damaging, knocking back, and stunning enemies hit for 0.6s.
rsb.add1_true_desc: Blastoise unleashes a large burst of water in a radius around themself, damaging enemies, knocking them back and stunning those hit for 0.75s. Blastoise also gains a 30% movement speed bonus for the duration of this move.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increased damage.

upgrades.name: Water Spout
upgrades.description1: Spouts water toward the designated location, decreasing the movement speed of opposing Pokémon in the area of effect for a short time.
upgrades.description2: Increases damage dealt by this move.

rsb.name: Water Spout
rsb.label: Damage - Area (6 Hits)
rsb.true_desc: Blastoise calls down a barrage of water in a targeted radius. Enemies within the radius are struck 6 times over 3s, damaging and slowing them by 20% for 2s (refreshing every hit).
rsb.add1_label: Damage - Area (17 Hits) During Rapid Spin
rsb.add1_true_desc: Blastoise rapidly unleashes bursts of water in a radius around themselves dealing up to 17 instances of damage over the duration of Rapid Spin. Blastoise also gains a 30% movement speed bonus for the duration of this move. While in Rapid Spin, Water Spout's slow applies only once per Pokémon on the first time hit by Water Spout in Rapid Spin.
rsb.add1_notes: The move button must be held for the duration of Rapid spin in order to trigger all of the additional attacks.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increased damage.
rsb.enhanced_add1_label: Damage - Area (17 Hits) During Rapid Spin

skills.name: Skull Bash
skills.description: Fiercely rams an opposing Pokémon and leaves it unable to act.

rsb.name: Skull Bash
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Blastoise dashes forward damaging and stunning all enemies hit for 0.5s.

upgrades.name: Surf
upgrades.description1: Has the user charge forward on a wave, shoving enemies and leaving them unable to act. The user becomes immune to hindrances while using this move and can jump in a designated direction once this move ends.
upgrades.description2: Also grants a shield when this move hits.

rsb.name: Surf
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Blastoise rides a large wave in the designated direction damaging, knocking back, and stunning enemies hit for 1.6s. Blastoise is unstoppable while surfing, and once it ends, Blastoise can jump in a designated direction. The wave continues for a short duration after leaping off and the wave continues to knock back enemies hit but inflicts no damage.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Blastoise gains a small shield for 4s when hitting an enemy with Surf.

upgrades.name: Rapid Spin
upgrades.description1: Has the user spin rapidly, changing the mechanics of its basic attacks as well as its Hydro Pump and Water Spout moves.
upgrades.description2: Also reduces the damage the user receives while using this move.

rsb.name: Rapid Spin
rsb.label: Damage (10 hits)
rsb.true_desc: Blastoise withdraws into its shell and begins rapidly spinning for 5.5s resetting the cooldown of its other move. Blastoise resists hindrances for the duration of Rapid Spin and can freely move about the battlefield. While spinning, Blastoise will damage nearby enemies. Blastoise’s next auto attack after Rapid Spin ends becomes boosted. For the duration of Rapid Spin, the mechanics of Blastoise’s auto attacks as well as Hydro Pump and Water Spout are changed. Blastoise may exit Rapid Spin by re-entering the input used to enter Rapid Spin.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Blastoise gains a massive amount of Def and SpDef for the duration of the spin.

skills.name: Hydro Typhoon
skills.buffs: 30% Movement Speed, 40% Max HP Shield
skills.description: Has the user spout water to attack while spinning, throwing enemies in a large area. This also grants the user a shield.

rsb.name: Hydro Typhoon
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Blastoise gains a shield for 4s and sweeps powerful water jets in a large circle around itself dealing massive damage and throwing enemies hit into the air for 1.5s. Blastoise is unstoppable during this move.

name: Blaziken

builds.name: Chicken & Waffles
builds.explanation: Aeos Cookie and Weakness Policy variation value is pushed for MaxHP scaling off Blaze procs and Unite Style swap combined with the value of flat stats of the HP.

builds.name: KFC 3 Piece Meal
builds.explanation: Highly offense oriented build allowing for in-brush overheat into added Razor Claw burst usage without loss of damage due to persistent bonus of Accel Bracer.

notes: Only auto attacks can critically strike. Blaziken's Critical-Hit rate increases at levels 5 and 8.

rsb.name: Blaze
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: When this Pokémon hits an enemy with an auto attack or move, that enemy will receive a fire fragment. Hitting an enemy that has a fire fragment 5 times with a basic attack or move will deal additional damage and restore the user's HP. When this Pokémon's HP is at half or lower, more HP is restored.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Punch Style
rsb.true_desc: Deals damage to nearby enemies. While in Kick Style, basic attacks have a higher area-of-effect and reach. While in Punch Style, attack speed is increased by 40%.
rsb.notes: For the purpose of auto attacks, Torchic is treated as punch style while Combusken is treated as kick style. Once Blaziken has access to their Unite move, they can swap between styles.

rsb.name: Aerial Ace
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Dash in a designated direction, dealing damage to enemies that come in contact with the dash. If this move hits an enemy, this move may be used again once within 4 seconds before being put on cooldown.

rsb.name: Fire Punch
rsb.label: Damage - Per Punch (2x)
rsb.true_desc: Unleash 2 flaming punches in the designated direction, dealing damage to enemies hit. The designated direction can be changed during this move. When the user hits an enemy with this move, for a short time, this move can be used once more.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases damage dealt.

rsb.name: Overheat
rsb.label: Damage - Low Charge
rsb.alert: Kick Style: This move must be taken at level 7.
rsb.true_desc: Become Unstoppable, reduce incoming damage by 25%, and charge power in place in a designated direction. If used again, unleash a flaming kick in the designed direction, dealing damage to enemies hit. The longer the duration the charge is held for, the more damage this move deals. If the user charges a certain amount of power (when the gauge reaches the line indicator), this move also shoves enemies hit.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases damage dealt.

rsb.name: Ember
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Release a small ball of fire in the designated direction, dealing damage in a small area around the first enemy hit and decreases their movement speed by 50% for 1s.

rsb.name: Focus Blast
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Fire a ball of focused energy in the designated direction. The ball of focused energy explodes upon hitting an enemy or after traveling a set distance, dealing damage to enemies  in the explosion's area-of-effect and decreasing their movement speed by 35% for 2s.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases the movement speed decrease to 60%.

rsb.name: Blaze Kick
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.alert: Kick Style: This move must be taken at level 5.
rsb.true_desc: Jump backwards then kick while leaping towards a designated location, becoming Unstoppable during the jump and kick animation. Deal damage to enemies hit by the kick and shove them. The shoved enemies will have their movement speed decreased by 25% for 2s. If the shoved enemies come in contact with a wall, they will be stunned instead for 1s. Blaze Kick cannot go over walls.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases the movement speed decrease to 50%. Increases the stun duration to 1.5s if hitting a wall.

skills.name: Spinning Flame Fist
skills.buffs: 12% Max HP Shield; Has an internal cooldown of 30s to activate Energy Amplifier; Has an internal cooldown of 60s to activate Buddy Barrier;

rsb.name: Spinning Flame Fist
rsb.label: Damage (2x)
rsb.true_desc: Perform a flaming punch around itself, dealing damage to nearby enemies hit and increase the user's movement speed by 20% for 4s. After using this move, the user switches to Punch Style and all Punch Style cooldowns are reset.

skills.name: Spinning Flame Kick
skills.buffs: 12% Max HP Shield; Has an internal cooldown of 30s to activate Energy Amplifier; Has an internal cooldown of 60s to activate Buddy Barrier

rsb.name: Spinning Flame Kick
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Perform a flaming kick around itself, dealing damage to nearby enemies hit and increase the user's Attack stat by 30% for a 4s. After using this move, the user switches to Kick Style and all Kick Style cooldowns are reset.

name: Blissey
notes: Only auto attacks can critically strike, but Blissey has 0% base Critical-Hit rate at all levels.

skills.name: Natural Cure
skills.description: Removes all status condition from the Pokémon. This ability goes on cooldown after it's triggered.

rsb.name: Natural Cure
rsb.true_desc: Automatically cleanses this Pokémon every 6s, even if there are no effects to cleanse.

skills.name: Attack
skills.description: Becomes a boosted attack after a set amount of time passes, dealing increased damage.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Becomes a boosted attack after 6s, dealing increased damage. This boosted attack remains readied until used.

skills.name: Pound
skills.description: Has the user attack by pounding in the designated direction, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and decreasing their movement speed for a short time when it hits.

rsb.name: Pound
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: The user pounds in the designated direction, damaging opposing Pokémon in the area of effect and decreasing their movement speed by 40% for 2s.

upgrades.name: Egg Bomb
upgrades.description1: Hurls an egg at the designated location. The egg then explodes, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and throwing them.
upgrades.description2: Also decreases the movement speed of enemies for a short time when they are thrown by this move.

rsb.name: Egg Bomb
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: The user hurls an egg at the designated location that explodes, damaging opposing Pokémon in the area of effect and throwing them away from the center of impact for 0.8s. A maximum of 2 uses can be kept in reserve for this move, and there is a 2s cooldown between uses.
rsb.notes: If the user learns both Soft-Boiled and Egg Bomb, the uses kept in reserve for Egg Bomb is added to Soft-Boiled's reserve pool; this reserve pool is shared between both moves. The base cooldown for both moves becomes 5s. The cooldown between using the same move remains at 2s.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Decreases the movement speed of opposing Pokémon hit by 40% for 2s.

upgrades.name: Helping Hand
upgrades.description1: For a short time, greatly increases the user's and nearby allies movement speed and basic attack speed. While this move's effects last, all of the user's basic attacks become boosted attacks.
upgrades.description2: Increases the damage of basic attacks while this move's effects last.

rsb.name: Helping Hand
rsb.true_desc: The user increases the movement speed and basic attack speed of themself and nearby teammates by 30% for 4s. When buffed, the user's auto attacks also become boosted attacks.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases the auto attack damage of all teammates buffed by this move by 15% for 4s.

skills.name: Heal Pulse
skills.description: Continually restores the user's and designated ally HP for a short time.

rsb.name: Heal Pulse
rsb.label: Healing (4x)
rsb.true_desc: The user restores the HP of themself and a designated teammate every 0.5s over 2s.

upgrades.name: Soft-Boiled
upgrades.description1: Throws an egg to an ally, restoring its HP as well as the user's HP. A maximum of 3 uses can be kept in reserve for this move and cannot be used more than once every 2s.
upgrades.description2: Increases the maximum number of uses that can be kept in reserve.

rsb.name: Soft Boiled
rsb.label: Healing
rsb.true_desc: The user throws an egg to a designated teammate, restoring the HP of themself and the designated teammate. The user and the designated teammate restore HP over time every 1s over 2s afterward. Subsequent uses of this move overwrites any HP over time the user and the designated teammate is yet to restore from previous uses. A maximum of 2 uses can be kept in reserve for this move, and there is a 2s cooldown between uses.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Gains 1 additional use kept in reserve.

upgrades.name: Safeguard
upgrades.description1: Blissey grants both the targeted ally and themself a shield, purging hindrances and making both immune to hindrances as long as the shield lasts.
upgrades.description2: Shield value increased.

rsb.name: Safeguard
rsb.label: Shield
rsb.true_desc: The user cleanses themself and a designated teammate, and grants the user and the teammate a shield that makes them unstoppable for 4s.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Strengthens the value of the shield effect.

skills.name: Bliss Assistance
skills.buffs: 30% Movement Speed, 30% CDR, 20% Max HP Shield
skills.description: Has the user dash to the designated ally to give it an egg, granting that ally a shield and increasing its Attack and Sp. Attack for a short time. The user also intercepts a portion of the damage received by that ally for a short time. While dashing, the user throws nearby enemies and those it comes in contact with.

rsb.name: Bliss Assistance
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: The user becomes unstoppable and dashes to the designated ally Pokémon to give it an egg, granting that ally a shield and increasing their Attack and Sp. Atk by 20% for 6s. The user also intercepts 50% of the post-mitigation damage received by that ally as unmitigated damage for 6s. While dashing, opposing Pokémon hit are damaged and thrown into the air for 0.8s. When reaching the target ally, nearby opposing Pokémon are damaged again.

name: Buzzwole

builds.name: Super Smack
builds.explanation: Aeos Cookie may be used as a third item.

builds.name: Super Lunge
builds.explanation: Weakness Policy can be used as third item for high offense. Aeos Cookie may be used for high bulk with Superpower

builds.name: Smack Life
builds.explanation: Full Heal before activating Leech Life prevents interruption because of the Unstoppable

builds.name: Leech Lunge
builds.explanation: Full Heal before activating Leech Life prevents interruption because of the Unstoppable

notes: Only auto attacks can critically strike. Buzzwole's Critical-Hit rate increases at levels 5 and 9.

rsb.name: Beast Boost
rsb.true_desc: When Buzzwole knocks out an enemy player, movement speed is increased by 100% and basic attack speed increased by 50% for 3s. When Buzzwole assists in knocking out an enemy player, movement speed is increased by 50% and basic attack speed increased by 25% for 3s. Each time Buzzwole hits an enemy with basic attacks, Mega Punch, Lunge, or Smack Down - muscle gauge increases. Conversely, when Buzzwole has been out of combat for 10s, muscle gauge depletes by 1 increment every 5s. Up to 6 muscle gauge increments can be stored.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Each time a basic attack hits an enemy, increase muscle gauge by 1 increment. Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, throwing two consecutive punches while restoring Buzzwole's HP and increasing muscle gauge by 1 increment for each hit.

rsb.name: Mega Punch
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Jump in the designated direction before slamming the ground with a powerful punch. The shock from the punch deals damage to enemies in the area. Muscle gauge increases by 1 increment for each target hit.

rsb.name: Lunge
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Lunge in the designated direction, dealing damage to enemies, decreasing their Attack by 30% for 2.5s and slowing them by 30% for 1s. If this move deals damage, muscle gauge increases by 1 increment for each enemy hit. After this move is used, Buzzwole's basic attack speed is increased by 30% for 2s. Holds 2 uses in reserve and cannot be used more than once every 1s.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Whenever this move hits enemy players, Buzzwole's Attack increases by 10% for 2s for each player hit (up to a max of 5 stacks).

rsb.name: Smack Down
rsb.label: Damage - Initial Hit
rsb.true_desc: Deliver an uppercut punch in the designated direction, dealing damage and throwing the first Pokémon hit into the air. While the target is airborne, Buzzwole can activate this move again to perform a follow-up attack that smacks the target to the ground, dealing damage to all enemies in an area centered on the airborne enemy. When this move deals damage, muscle gauge increases by 1 increment for each enemy hit.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Widens the area-of-effect in which damage is dealt when the grappled enemy slams the ground. Additionally, muscle gauge will now increase by 2 increments for each enemy player hit from the slam.

rsb.name: Fell Stinger
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Consumes the entire muscle gauge and has the user deal damage to an enemy in the designated direction, briefly shoving and stunning them for .2s. The damage dealt by this move increases for each muscle gauge increment consumed at a rate of 12.5% per increment. If this move knocks out an enemy, the user recovers 10% of maximum HP.

rsb.name: Leech Life
rsb.label: Damage - per Tick
rsb.true_desc: Grab and restrain an enemy in the designated direction, becoming unstoppable and dealing damage-over-time while restoring Buzzwole's HP. When this move is used, consume the user's entire muscle gauge. The number of hits and the amount of damage dealt per hit increases for each muscle gauge increment consumed. Number of hits starts at 4 and increases by 1 per 2 increments of muscle gauge consumed. Initial damage increases by 1.5% per muscle gauge increment. This move ends if Buzzwole becomes unable to act for any reason or if the restrained enemy escapes by using an Eject Button or through some other means.
rsb.notes: Against Unstoppable Targets: Only 1 instance of damage and healing will occur, equal to 5 hits.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Also causes each instance of damage dealt by this move to be stronger than the last by 5% additively.

rsb.name: Superpower
rsb.label: Damage - Initial
rsb.true_desc: Consumes the entire muscle gauge and has the user run in the designated direction and grab an enemy. The user then slams the target down on the ground at full strength, dealing damage to all enemies in the area. If Buzzwole is successful in grabbing a target, Buzzwole receives a shield that lasts for 2s. Buzzwole is unstoppable during this move.
rsb.notes: The damage dealt by this move is increased at a rate of 12.5% per muscle gauge increment.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Reduces the cooldown of this move by 3s when the user's muscle gauge reaches maximum.

skills.name: Ultra Swole Slam
skills.buffs: 30% Movement Speed, 30% CDR, 20% Max HP Shield

rsb.name: Ultra Swole Slam
rsb.label: Damage - Sweep
rsb.true_desc: Buzzwole flies at high speed, dealing damage to enemies in the area-of-effect. Afterward, the user targets the enemy with the lowest percentage of HP remaining among those hit and charges down at them from the sky, dealing area damage once again and additional damage to the targeted enemy based on their missing HP. Buzzwole is Unstoppable during this move.
rsb.notes: Against Wild Pokemon: Missing HP damage is not dealt.

name: Ceruledge

builds.name: Psycho Force
builds.explanation: All listed items have high value on Ceruledge and can be used interchangably without much priority shift.

builds.name: Psycho Charge
builds.explanation: Energy Amplifier can replace Razor claw if guaranteeing always having Escavalier buff. Energy Amplifier can replace Curse Bangle if another ally has Curse items as a default slot in. Accel Bracer can be used with Energy Amplifier if Escavalier buff is guaranteed and Curse item effect is covered by allies.

notes: Only auto attacks can critically strike. Ceruledge's Critical-Hit rate increases at levels 5 and 9.

rsb.name: Flame Body
rsb.label: Damage - Flame Body
rsb.true_desc: When Charcadet hits an enemy with an auto attack, Charcadet deals damage around themself with flames. This ability goes on a 4s cd after it's triggered.

rsb2.name: Weak Armor
rsb2.label: Damage - First Stack
rsb2.true_desc: When the user takes Attack-based damage, Ceruledge's movement speed is increased by 10% for 3s. This effect can stack up to 2 times. If Ceruledge deals damage to enemies with basic attacks or moves, the enemy hit receives a wound. Life energy leaks out of these wounds for 3s, causing damage on hit and then every 0.5s. This effect can stack up to 6 times, each stack after the first adding 50% of the first stack's damage and refreshing the duration of the damage over time. If the effect stacks 6 times on an enemy, that Pokémon takes 15% increased damage from Ceruledge.

skills.name: Attack - Charcadet
skills.description: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, dealing increased damage.
skills.basic2_description: Becomes a boosted attack every 4 attacks, dealing damage twice. The next basic attack after using a move becomes a boosted attack. After evolving to Ceruledge, basic and boosted attacks have an additional 20% lifesteal.

rsb.name: Lava Plume
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Torch the area around the user with an inferno of scarlet flames, dealing damage to enemies hit. The user's next basic attack deals 15% increased damage.

rsb.name: Bitter Blade
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Ceruledge focuses bitter feelings towards the world of the living into a slashing attack. The user recovers HP equals to 40% of the damage dealt with this move. Damage dealt to wild Pokémon only heals for half of the normal amount. Any HP recovered that exceeds the user's max HP is converted into a shield.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases the amount of HP recovered to 55% of damage dealt.

rsb.name: Psycho Cut
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Ceruledge launches a blade formed by psychic power in the designated direction, dealing damage and slowing enemies hit by 30% for 3s, and reducing their Defense for 4s. If Ceruledge hits enemies with a basic attack, this move's cooldown is reduced by 0.5s.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases the Defense reduction of enemies hit by this move.

rsb.name: Take Down
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Has the user charge recklessly in the designated direction, dealing damage to enemies hit. The user's basic attack speed is increased by 20% for 3s.

rsb.name: Phantom Force
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Dash and disappear into darkness, where Ceruledge hides for 1s. While hiding, Ceruledge cannot move. When this move is used again or after 1s has passed, the user appears in the designated direction while slashing around themself, dealing damage that ignores Defense and shields of enemies and applies a 60% slow to them. If this move hits an enemy, this move's cooldown is reduced by 40% of the max cooldown.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Reduces this move's cooldown by 2s.

rsb.name: Flame Charge
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Ceruledge cloaks themself in flame and charges in the designated direction, dealing damage to enemies hit. Ceruledge's basic attack speed is increased by 30% for 3s after using this move. A maximum of 2 uses can be kept in reserve for this move.
rsb.notes: There is a 1 second cooldown between each use, which is reduced with cooldown reduction.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Ceruledge's basic attack speed is instead increased for 5s after using this move.

skills.name: Revenant Rend
skills.buffs: 30% Movement Speed, 30% CDR, 20% Max HP Shield

rsb.name: Revenant Rend
rsb.label: Damage (x3)
rsb.true_desc: Ceruledge charges both of their arm blades gaining unstoppable for 0.5s before slashing through to the designated location faster than the eye can track. Ceruledge leaves enemies hit unable to act for 0.7s and applies a mark to them. After 0.7s, Ceruledge slices marked enemies with three slashing blows. The mark can be cleansed, preventing the damage.

name: Chandelure

builds.name: Flame Geist
builds.explanation: Curse Incense should replace Wise Glasses if enemy has kit recovery or healers.

builds.name: Heat Prison
builds.explanation: Curse Incense should replace Choice Specs if enemy has kit recovery or healers.

builds.name: Flame Prison
builds.explanation: Curse Incense should replace Wise Glasses if enemy has kit recovery or healers.

builds.name: Heat Geist
builds.explanation: Curse Incense should replace Wise Glasses if enemy has kit recovery or healers.

notes: Only auto attacks can critically strike, but Chandelure has 0% base Critical-Hit rate at all levels.

rsb.name: Infiltrator
rsb.true_desc: When this Pokémon deals damage, receive a stacking buff that makes Special damage dealt by this Pokémon ignore 2.5% of Special Defense per stack. This buff lasts 4s, can stack up to 8 times, and the duration refreshes when gaining a new stack.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Gains a Boosted Attack every 5s, dealing increased damage, slowing enemies by 30% for 2s and burning enemies hit for 2.5s.

boosted_rsb.name: Boosted
boosted_rsb.label: Damage - Boosted
boosted_rsb.true_desc: Burns tick every 0.5s and on application for 6 damage ticks.
boosted_rsb.notes: Burns tick every 0.5s for 5 damage ticks.

rsb.name: Ember
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Shoot out a small flame, dealing damage to Pokémon it hits, slowing them by 30% for 2s and leaving them burned for 2.5s. After the first cast, this move may be used again within 5s before going on full cooldown.
rsb.notes: Burns tick every 0.5s for 5 damage ticks.

rsb.name: Flamethrower
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Shoot an intense blast of fire in the designated direction, dealing damage to Pokémon and leaving them burned for 2.5s. The end of the blast explodes, dealing increased damage. If the explosion hits a Pokémon, this move's cooldown is reduced by 65% of its current cooldown.
rsb.notes: Burns tick every 0.5s for 5 damage ticks.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: If the explosion hits a Pokémon, Chandelure deals 20% increased damage for 3s. This effect also applies to the triggering explosion itself.

rsb.name: Overheat
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Throws consecutive flames in an arc into designated areas up to 3 times by holding the move input down. Pokémon in the area are hit and are left burned. The area may be aimed and changed during the use of this move. When one of the flames hits a Pokémon, the user gains one heat energy. If this move is used again, an exploding flame is shot out, dealing damage to Pokémon based on the heat energy and leaves them burned. The exploding flame hitting with 0, 1 or 2 heat energy reduces the cooldown of this move by 75%, 50% or 30% respectively. After the follow-up attack, the user cannot use basic attacks for a short time.
rsb.notes: Burns tick every 0.5s for 5 damage ticks.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: This move's cooldown is reduced by 1s.

rsb.name: Night Shade
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Makes Pokémon in the area of effect see a frightening mirage, dealing damage to them and marking them. When Chandelure deals damage again to the marked Pokémon, the marked Pokémon are stunned for 1s.

rsb.name: Poltergeist
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Create a zone of mysterious power and mirages of floating furniture.  Pokémon that come in contact with a mirage take damage.  Pokémon that come in contact with a mirage or the edge of the zone are slowed by 65% decaying to a 40% slow over 1s. Then the 40% slow lingers for an additional second.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases the slow to 80% for 1s decaying to 50% for 1s.

rsb.name: Imprison
rsb.true_desc: Creates a zone in front of itself lasting 4s. The first enemy caught in the zone will be immobilized for 0.7s. Furthermore, all enemy Pokémon in the zone or enter the zone become imprisoned and cannot use Moves.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Changes the Imprison to briefly immobilize all Pokémon caught in the zone on creation.

skills.name: Ignite Midnight
skills.buffs: 30% Movement Speed, 40% Max HP Shield

rsb.name: Ignite Midnight
rsb.label: Damage (6x)
rsb.true_desc: Reduce the vision of enemies around itself by 30% for 3s. If this Unite Move is used again, Chandelure continuously fires a beam of fire in a designated direction, dealing damage to Pokémon it hits. The beam may be redirected while firing and its final blast deals increased damage. Ignite Midnight can be cancelled early.

name: Charizard

builds.name: Flame Blitz
builds.explanation: X-Attack is a consideration purely for damage amplification but loses value on attack speed not affecting Charizard at all. Curse Bangle should replace Attack Weight if enemy has kit recovery or healers.

builds.name: Flame Blast
builds.explanation: X-Attack is a consideration purely for damage amplification but loses value on attack speed not affecting Charizard at all. Curse Bangle should replace Attack Weight if enemy has kit recovery or healers.

builds.name: Fire Blitz
builds.explanation: Curse Bangle should replace Attack Weight if enemy has kit recovery or healers.

notes: Only auto attacks can critically strike. Charizard's Critical-Hit rate increases at levels 5 and 9. CHARIZARD'S BASIC ATTACKS ARE A SET ANIMATION LENGTH. ATTACK SPEED HAS NO EFFECT ON THEM. DO NOT USE RAPID FIRE SCARF ON CHARIZARD.

skills.name: Blaze
skills.description: While at half HP or less, critical-hit rate is increased.

rsb.name: Blaze
rsb.true_desc: While at 50% max HP or below, this Pokémon's critical-hit rate is increased by 20%.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage  - Basic (4x)
rsb.true_desc: Breathes fire at opposing Pokémon, dealing damage 4 times per basic attack. Charizard may move while attacking but is slowed by 5% while breathing fire. Charizard deals additional damage to opposing Pokémon that have been burned by the user's moves. This additional damage cannot land critical hits; additional damage benefits from regular lifesteal. Basic attacks gain increased range upon evolving into Charmeleon and into Charizard.
rsb.notes: Against wild Pokémon: total damage is capped at 250 per hit. CHARIZARD'S BASIC ATTACKS ARE A SET ANIMATION LENGTH. ATTACK SPEED HAS NO EFFECT ON THIS POKÉMON. DO NOT USE RAPID FIRE SCARF ON CHARIZARD.

boosted_rsb.name: Boosted
boosted_rsb.label: Damage - Flamethrower & Fire Punch Additional (4x)
boosted_rsb.notes: Lifesteal will account for this damage.
boosted_rsb.add1_label: Damage - Flame Burst & Seismic Slam Additional (4x)

skills.name: Flame Burst
skills.description: Attack with a bursting flame. When this move hits, it leaves enemies burned and increases the user's movement speed for a short time.

rsb.name: Flame Burst
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: The user attacks with a flame in the designated direction which bursts on the first opposing Pokémon hit or after traveling max distance, damaging opposing Pokémon in the area of effect and burning them for 4s (dealing damage 5 times). When this move hits, the user's movement speed is increased by 20% for 3s.
rsb.notes: The Attack of opposing Pokémon burned by this move is decreased by 5%.

upgrades.name: Flamethrower
upgrades.description1: Attack with an intense blast of fire. When this move hits, it leaves enemies burned and increases the user's movement speed for a short time.
upgrades.description2: Increased damage and the damage caused by burning.

rsb.name: Flamethrower
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: The user attacks with a blast of fire in the designated direction, damaging opposing Pokémon in a line and burning them for 4s (dealing damage 5 times). When this move hits, the user's movement speed is increased by 40% for 4s. The user is able to move freely when using this move.
rsb.notes: The Attack of opposing Pokémon burned by this move is decreased by 5%.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases the damage of this move and its burns.

upgrades.name: Fire Punch
upgrades.description1: Punch with a fiery fist, dealing damage and shoving enemies when it hits. Also leaves the enemies it shoves burned.
upgrades.description2: Reduced cooldown every time a basic attack hits.

rsb.name: Fire Punch
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: The user dashes with a fiery fist forward, damaging opposing Pokémon hit and shoving them, and burning the first opposing Pokémon hit for 4s (dealing damage 5 times).
rsb.notes: The Attack of the target burned by this move is decreased by 5%.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Reduces this move's cooldown by 0.4s per target hit every time the user's basic attack hits an opposing Pokémon. (1.6s total for an entire basic attack animation on a single target).

skills.name: Fire Spin
skills.description: Encircles enemies in the area of effect in a vortex of fire. After this move hits, it deals damage over time and decreases the movement speed of enemies for a short time.

rsb.name: Fire Spin
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: The user shoots fire in the designated direction which bursts into a vortex of fire on the first opposing Pokémon hit or after traveling max distance, damaging opposing Pokémon in the area of effect. The vortex of fire remains for 5s, dealing damage over time to opposing Pokémon in the area of effect every 0.5s (up to 10 times) and decreasing their movement speed by 25% for 1s when hit.

upgrades.name: Fire Blast
upgrades.description1: Blasts intense, all-consuming fire, dealing damage over time to enemies while the flames continue to burn on the ground and decreasing the movement speed of enemies for a short time.
upgrades.description2: Increased damage.

rsb.name: Fire Blast
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: The user shoots an intense blast of fire in the designated direction which explodes on the first opposing Pokémon hit or after traveling max distance, damaging opposing Pokémon in the area of effect. The blast of all-consuming fire remains on the ground for 5s, dealing damage over time to opposing Pokémon in the area of effect every 0.5s (up to 10 times) and decreasing their movement speed by 30% for 1s when hit. The user is able to move freely when using this move.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases the damage of this move and the damage over time.

upgrades.name: Flare Blitz
upgrades.description1: Charge forward cloaked in fire, granting the user a shield and throwing enemies hit.
upgrades.description2: Decreases movement speed of enemies for a short time when they are thrown.

rsb.name: Flare Blitz
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: The user charges at the designated opposing Pokémon cloaked in fire, damaging opposing Pokémon, throwing the target, and granting the user a shield for 5s when this move hits.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Decreases the movement speed of the target by 40% for 3s when this move hits.

skills.name: Seismic Slam
skills.buffs: 50% Movement Speed, 20% Max HP Shield
skills.description: Fly up into the air, allowing the user to move freely over obstacles. While this move is being used, basic attacks deal increased damage and leave enemies burned. In addition, when dealing damage to an enemy, recover HP. Using this move again on an enemy will grab it and slam it onto the ground.

rsb.name: Seismic Slam
rsb.label: Damage - Burning (2x)
rsb.true_desc: The user briefly becomes unstoppable and grabs the designated Pokémon from the opposing team. The target is bound, and the user and the target become invincible as the user flies up then slams them onto the ground, damaging the target and nearby opposing Pokémon, dealing an additional 8% max HP damage to each opposing Pokémon hit. The user gains hindrance resistance the moment they slam into the ground and fly up into the air for 7.5s. While flying in the air, the user is able to use basic attacks and move freely over obstacles. Unite Move basic attacks burn opposing Pokémon for 1s (dealing damage 2 times). The user restores HP for 80% of the damage dealt with Unite Move basic attacks (excluding burns or additional damage). Damage dealt by burns from Unite Move basic attacks also benefit from regular lifesteal.
rsb.notes: The Attack of opposing Pokémon burned by Unite Move basic attacks is decreased by 5%.

name: Cinderace
notes: Only Blaze Kick and auto attacks can critically strike. Cinderace's Critical-Hit rate increases at levels 5 and 9.

skills.name: Blaze
skills.description: When using a move, the next basic attack becomes a boosted attack. When hitting an enemy with a basic attack or move, a cinder is placed on that enemy. Attacking a cindered enemy a certain number of times will cause the cinder to flare, dealing damage to the enemy. When at half HP or less, critical-hit rate is increased by 10% and basic attack speed is increased by 20% for a short time.

rsb.name: Blaze
rsb.true_desc: When at 50% max HP or below, increases critical-hit rate by 10% and auto attack speed by 20% for 5s (30s CD).
rsb.notes: When hitting an opposing Pokémon with an auto attack or move, places a cinder on the target for 5s; applies 2 cinders with boosted attacks and moves. When placing a 5th cinder on a target, consumes the cinders, dealing additional damage to the target.
rsb.add1_notes: Against Wild Pokémon: The additional damage from maximum HP is capped at 500.

skills.name: Attack
skills.description: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, dealing increased damage when it hits.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack or after using a move, dealing increased damage. Boosted attacks remain readied until used.
rsb.notes: Against wild Pokémon: basic attack damage is capped at 1000; boosted attack damage is capped at 1300.

skills.name: Ember
skills.description: Shoot out a small flame, dealing damage to enemies, leaving them burned and decreasing their Attack for a short time.

rsb.name: Ember
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Shoots a small flame at the designated opposing Pokémon, damaging the target and burning them for 3s (dealing damage 3 times).
rsb.notes: The Attack and Sp. Atk of the burned target are decreased by 5% for 2s.

upgrades.name: Pyro Ball
upgrades.description1: Kick a ball of flame in the designated direction, dealing damage to enemies and leaving them burned for a short time when this move hits.
upgrades.description2: Reduces the cooldown of Flame Charge or Feint when this move hits.

rsb.name: Pyro Ball
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Kicks up a stone and ignites it, then kicks the ball of flame in the designated direction, damaging opposing Pokémon hit and burning them for 3s (dealing damage 3 times).
rsb.notes: The Attack and Sp. Atk of burned opposing Pokémon are decreased by 5% for 2s.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Reduces the cooldown of Flame Charge or Feint by 3.5s when this move hits.

upgrades.name: Blaze Kick
upgrades.description1: Perform a fiery flying kick. This move is always a critical hit, and it shoves enemies and leaves them burned for a short time. In addition, become immune to hindrances while using this move.
upgrades.description2: Increases basic attack speed for a short time when this move hits.

rsb.name: Blaze Kick
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Becomes unstoppable and performs a fiery flying kick dashing toward the designated opposing Pokémon, damaging the target with a guaranteed critical hit, shoving them, and burning them for 3s (dealing damage 3 times); then jumps back a set distance from the target or in the direction of movement and becomes vulnerable to hindrances when they land.
rsb.notes: The Attack and Sp. Atk of the burned target are decreased by 5% for 2s.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases basic attack speed by 65% for 3s when this move hits.

skills.name: Low Sweep
skills.description: Make a swift low sweep in the designated direction, dealing damage to any enemy it hits.

rsb.name: Low Sweep
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Dashes forward with a low sweep, damaging opposing Pokémon in their path.

upgrades.name: Flame Charge
upgrades.description1: Charge forward cloaked in flame, dealing damage to any enemy hit.
upgrades.description2: The next boosted attack after this move ends also decreases the movement speed of enemies hit for a short time.

rsb.name: Flame Charge
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Dashes forward cloaked in flame, damaging opposing Pokémon in their path.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: The next boosted attack after this move ends decreases the movement speed of the opposing Pokémon hit by 30% for 2s.

upgrades.name: Feint
upgrades.description1: Increases movement speed for a short time and become invincible.
upgrades.description2: After this move is used, basic attacks that hit enemies restore HP (up to 3 times).

rsb.name: Feint
rsb.true_desc: Becomes invincible for 0.73s while dodging and increases their movement speed by 40% for 2s.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: The next 3 auto attacks after dodging restore HP for 30% of damage dealt.

skills.name: Blazing Bicycle Kick
skills.buffs: 30% Movement Speed, 35% Attack Speed, 20% Max HP Shield
skills.description: Create a giant ball of flame and kick it toward the designated location. The ball releases a fierce shock wave that deals damage to enemies in the area of effect. Also increases movement speed by 10% (stacks with the Unite Buffs) for 5s when it hits.

rsb.name: Blazing Bicycle Kick
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Becomes unstoppable and kicks up a giant ball of flame, then kicks it toward the location of the designated opposing Pokémon. The ball releases a fierce shock wave upon impact, damaging opposing Pokémon in the area of effect, dealing additional missing HP damage to those hit; and increasing movement speed by 10% for 5s when this Unite Move hits.

name: Clefable

builds.name: Moonlight w Any
builds.explanation: Either secondary move may be taken. Energy Amplifier use prefers the Unite more aggressively rather than reactively to heal and reduced cooldown increases the frequency of Moonlight to keep allies topped off.

notes: Only auto attacks can critically strike, but Clefable has 0% base Critical-Hit rate at all levels.

skills.name: Magic Guard
skills.description: This Pokémon receives a shield when restoring an ally Pokémon's HP. The strength of this shield is proportional to the amount of HP restored.

rsb.name: Magic Guard
rsb.true_desc: This Pokémon receives a shield when restoring an ally Pokémon's HP. The strength of this shield is proportional to 50% of the amount of HP restored.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, dealing increased damage.

skills.name: Heal Pulse
skills.description: Has the user immediately restore HP to itself and nearby allies.

rsb.name: Heal Pulse
rsb.label: Heal
rsb.true_desc: Immediately restores HP to itself and nearby allies.

upgrades.name: Moonlight
upgrades.description1: Clefable continually restores HP to themself and nearby allies for a short time. Clefable's movement speed is increased while this move is active.
upgrades.description2: Widens this move's area-of-effect and increases the duration of its effects.

rsb.name: Moonlight
rsb.label: Heal - per Tick (per half second)
rsb.true_desc: Continually restores HP to Clefable and nearby allies for 3s at one tick per half second excluding activation at 0s. Clefable’s movement speed is increased by 20% while this move is active.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Widens this move’s area-of-effect and increases the duration of its effects by 1s.

upgrades.name: Draining Kiss
upgrades.description1: Clefable attacks nearby enemies with an energy-draining kiss. Each enemy hit by the kiss receives damage and releases an air kiss. These air kisses will travel to a nearby ally with the lowest HP and restore their HP. If no allies are nearby, the air kisses will return to the user and restore Clefable's HP instead.

rsb.name: Draining Kiss
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Attacks nearby enemies with an energy-draining kiss. Each enemy hit by the kiss receives damage and releases an air kiss. These air kisses will travel to a nearby ally with the lowest HP and restore their HP. If no allies are near, the air kisses will return to Clefable and restore its HP for 140% of the damage dealt.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Widens this move’s area-of-effect and increases the amount of HP restored to 160% of the damage dealt.

skills.name: Disarming Voice
skills.description: Has the user let out a charming cry, dealing damage to nearby enemies and decreasing their movement speed for a short time.

rsb.name: Disarming Voice
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Let out a charming cry, dealing damage to nearby enemies and decreasing their movement speed by 40% for 2s.

upgrades.name: Gravity
upgrades.description1: Has the user create a gravity zone centered on itself that persists for a set amount of time. Inside the gravity zone, Clefable's auto attacks change and deal increased damage. Enemies in the zone have their movement speed decreased which becomes stronger whenever a set amount of time passes. These enemies are also unable to use dash moves. If an enemy attempts to enter the zone with a dash move, the dash move is stopped and that enemy is left unable to act for a short time.
upgrades.description2: Widens the area-of-effect and increases the duration of its effects.

rsb.name: Gravity
rsb.label: Damage - Auto Attacks
rsb.true_desc: Create a gravity zone centered on Clefable that persists for 3s. Inside the gravity zone, auto attacks change and deal increased damage. Enemies in the gravity zone have their movement speed decreased by 15% stacking up to 3 times gaining a stack whenever a set amount of time passes. These enemies are also unable to use Dash moves. If an enemy attempts to enter the gravity zone with a dash move, the dash move is stopped and that enemy is left unable to act for 1s.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Widens this move’s area-of-effect and increases the duration of its effects to 4s.

rsb.name: Follow Me
rsb.label: Shield
rsb.true_desc: Clefable moves to the designated location while waving its finger receiving a 3s shield. Attention of enemies hit and enemies near the designated location are drawn. These drawn enemies are forced to approach the user and attack Clefable with their auto attacks for 2s.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases Clefable's Defense by 150 for 3s and Sp. Def by 100 for 3s when this move is used.

skills.name: Wonder Wish
skills.buffs: 30% Movement Speed, 30% CDR, 20% Max HP Shield

rsb.name: Wonder Wish
rsb.true_desc: Clefable waggles their finger, restoring HP to allies in the area-of-effect. The lower an ally's HP is, the more HP this move restores to that ally. Afterward, Clefable gets a random move that can be performed by using the Unite Move again within 10s.
rsb.notes: Note: Some random moves will activate immediately.

secondary_unite_rsb.name: Splash
secondary_unite_rsb.true_desc: Hops but nothing happens. Activates immediately and refunds 90% Unite Charge.

secondary_unite_rsb.name: Explosion
secondary_unite_rsb.label: Damage
secondary_unite_rsb.true_desc: Activates immediately, becoming unstoppable and dealing massive damage in an area at the cost of 40% of your maximum HP. This cost is unmitigable but will not KO you, instead leaving you at 1 HP.

secondary_unite_rsb.name: Hydro Pump
secondary_unite_rsb.label: Damage - per Hit (3 Hits)
secondary_unite_rsb.true_desc: Spits a powerful stream of water hitting three times and shoving targets back.

secondary_unite_rsb.name: Hyper Beam
secondary_unite_rsb.label: Damage
