secondary_unite_rsb.true_desc: Stands still and fires a targeted piercing beam dealing major damage. Firing rate is quick.
secondary_unite_rsb.notes: Against Wild Pokémon: The additional damage from max HP is capped at 2400.

secondary_unite_rsb.name: Block
secondary_unite_rsb.true_desc: Creates and holds a wall in a target direction, gaining a shield, becoming unstoppable and reducing all damage taken by 25% for 4s. Enemies that contact the wall are knocked back and stunned for 0.8s. Other abilities may not be activated during the block but existing moves may continue.

secondary_unite_rsb.name: Close Combat
secondary_unite_rsb.label: Damage - per Hit (7 Hits)
secondary_unite_rsb.true_desc: Launches a flurry of blows dealing damage and healing per target hit. Clefable is unstoppable during this move.

secondary_unite_rsb.name: Fly
secondary_unite_rsb.label: Damage
secondary_unite_rsb.true_desc: Leaps up into the air becoming untargetable, granted free movement, and increasing movement speed by 65% for 3s. After 3s or upon early activation, land in the area beneath dealing damage to enemies in the landing area.

name: Comfey

builds.name: Floral Knot
builds.explanation: This set stays attached 20 seconds ahead of an engagement at full HP trying to maintain the Floral Healing overheal shield

notes: Only auto attacks can critically strike, but Comfey has 0% base Critical-Hit rate at all levels.

rsb.name: Triage
rsb.true_desc: Increases movement speed by 25% when near ally Pokémon at 50% max HP or below. Stores up to 8 flowers; consumes all flowers when using Synthesis, Floral Healing, or Sweet Kiss while attached, boosting their effects. Gains 1 flower every 1.5s. Gains 4 flowers when entering tall grass while detached (5s CD). Attaches to a designated ally Pokémon when using Synthesis, Floral Healing, or Sweet Kiss while detached, granting a Triage shield effect to the ally based on Comfey's max HP.
rsb.notes: While attached: becomes untargetable, restores 1% max HP every 1s; takes Aeos energy gained in excess of the maximum the ally can hold, and scores the same amount of Aeos energy into a goal as the ally if not using a move while the ally channels the score. Detaches from the ally in the designated direction when the button to return to base is used (or a separate detach button on mobile). When detaching: removes the Triage shield effect from the ally; becomes invincible for 0.5s, and readies a boosted attack.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, dealing increased damage and gaining 2 flowers when it hits.

rsb.name: Synthesis
rsb.label: Healing
rsb.true_desc: If detached attaches to the designated ally Pokémon and grants them a Triage shield effect.
rsb.notes: If attached to an ally Pokémon: restores the HP of the ally. Restores additional HP with for each flower that is consumed (up to 8 flowers).

rsb.name: Floral Healing
rsb.label: Healing
rsb.true_desc: If detached: attaches to the designated ally Pokémon and grants them a Triage shield effect.
rsb.notes: If attached to an ally Pokémon: restores the HP of the ally; restores additional HP for each flower that is consumed (up to 8 flowers). Converts any HP restored in excess of the ally Pokémon’s max HP into an overheal shield effect for 5s when this move is used (up to 4 times, refreshing duration with additional uses); adds additional value to the overheal shield effect for each additional flower that is consumed.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: While attached: increases the movement speed of the ally Pokémon by 30% for 2s.

rsb.name: Sweet Kiss
rsb.label: Additional Shield
rsb.true_desc: If detached: attaches to the designated ally Pokémon and grants them a Triage shield effect; adds additional shield value to the Triage shield effect with Sweet Kiss.
rsb.notes: If attached to an ally Pokémon: charges power for up to 2.5s, reaching maximum charge after 1.5s; then infatuates opposing Pokémon in the area of effect when released for a minimum of 0.6s. Increases the range of this move with charging. Infatuated Pokémon are unable to act and approach the user against their will. Infatuates opposing Pokémon hit for an additional 0.1s for each flower that is consumed (up to an additional 0.8s with 8 flowers; maximum 1.4s). (Note: it is impossible to use Sweet Kiss with fewer than 2 flowers due to the rate of gaining flowers and the cooldown reduction cap.)
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: While attached: increases the movement speed of the ally Pokémon by 40% for 2s while charging power.

rsb.name: Vine Whip
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Strikes out with whiplike vines in the designated direction, damaging opposing Pokémon in the line area of effect and decreasing their movement speed by 40% for 2s when it hits.
rsb.notes: While attached to an ally: increases this move's range.

rsb.name: Magical Leaf
rsb.label: Damage - per leaf
rsb.true_desc: Launches 3 curious, scattering leaves every 1s for 5s (up to 18 leaves) at random opposing Pokémon in the area of effect (even when in tall grass or in stealth), prioritizing Pokémon from the opposing team; damaging opposing Pokémon and applying a mark to them for 4s when hit by a leaf. When a marked target is damaged by 6 leaves, stuns them for 0.5s.
rsb.notes: While attached to an ally: increases this move's range of targeting.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases the number of leaves launched to 4 leaves every 1s (maximum 24 leaves).

rsb.name: Grass Knot
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Unleashes vines in the designated direction, damaging up to two opposing Pokémon hit and immobilizing them. If this move hits two opposing Pokémon within 75% of the full range; pulls the second target to the first target's location and deals additional damage to both.
rsb.notes: While attached to an ally: increases this move's range.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases this move’s area of effect.

skills.name: Flowery Fields Forever
skills.buffs: 30% Movement Speed, 30% CDR, 20% Max HP Shield

rsb.name: Flowery Fields Forever
rsb.label: Heal - per tick
rsb.true_desc: Briefly becomes unstoppable and creates a large area of tall grass around their location for 6s. Pokémon in this tall grass cannot be seen, just as with other tall grass on the map. Restores the HP of teammates in this Unite Move's tall grass every 0.5s.
rsb.notes: Gains special flowers from this tall grass, which grant access to an empowered use of Floral Healing or Sweet Kiss.
rsb.add2_label: Empowered Floral Healing Healing - Additional Per Flower
rsb.add4_label: Empowered Floral Healing Overheal Shield - Additional Per Flower

name: Cramorant
notes: Only auto attacks can critically strike, but Cramorant has 0% base Critical-Hit rate at all levels. At level 9, Cramorant gains 12.5% spell vamp (restores HP when dealing Special Attack damage).

skills.name: Gulp Missile
skills.description: When Cramorant uses a move, it catches some form of prey in its mouth. Afterward, when Cramorant receives damage, it spits the prey out as a counterattack at an enemy. The type of prey and effect differ based on the user's HP.

rsb.name: Gulp Missile
rsb.true_desc: This Pokémon can catch some form of prey in their mouth when entering Whirlpool, Surf, or Dive. When receiving damage, counterattacks by spitting the prey in their mouth at an opposing Pokémon, damaging them and bouncing to 1 other opposing Pokémon nearby.
rsb.notes: When above 50% max HP, catches Arrokuda as prey, which also decrease opposing Pokémon's Defense by 20% and Sp. Def by 5% for 3s. When below 50% max HP, instead catches Pikachu as prey, which decrease opposing Pokémon's movement speed by 50% and attack speed by 10% for 1s.

skills.name: Attack
skills.description: Becomes a boosted attack with every fourth attack. This boosted attack spits Arrokuda or other Pokémon at the enemy and deals area damage near the target when it hits.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Becomes a boosted attack with every fourth attack, catching some form of prey. This boosted attack spits prey at an opposing Pokémon, damaging them and bouncing to 1 other opposing Pokémon nearby.

skills.name: Whirlpool
skills.description: Creates a whirlpool that deals damage to enemies in the area of effect. The area of effect slowly shrinks, but the damage dealt slowly increases. Just before the whirlpool disappears, it decreases the movement speed of enemies in the area of effect for a short time. The user can also catch Arrokuda or other prey by entering the whirlpool.

rsb.name: Whirlpool
rsb.label: Damage - Initial (2 Ticks)
rsb.true_desc: The user creates a whirlpool at a designated location, damaging opposing Pokémon in the area of effect over 1.8s (up to 10 times). The area of effect shrinks in size over the duration; opposing Pokémon standing at the outer edge of the whirlpool are hit only up to 3 times. The movement speed of opposing Pokémon in the area of effect is decreased by 50% for 0.2s when hit.
rsb.notes: The user can enter the whirlpool to catch prey for Gulp Missile (up to 2 times).

upgrades.name: Surf
upgrades.description1: Attacks with a wave that deals damage to enemies. Once the wave has traveled its full distance, it returns the way it came, dealing damage to enemies once again and pulling them back with the wave. The user can also catch Arrokuda or other prey by entering the wave.
upgrades.description2: When the first wave hits enemies, it also decreases their movement speed for a short time.

rsb.name: Surf
rsb.label: First Hit
rsb.true_desc: The user sends a wave in the designated direction, damaging opposing Pokémon in the wave. The wave reaches its maximum distance after 0.8s, then returns to its starting point at the same speed, damaging opposing Pokémon and pulling them with the returning wave, stunning them for 0.4s during the pull.
rsb.notes: The user catches prey with the first wave, and can enter the returning wave to catch more prey for Gulp Missile.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: The first wave decreases the movement speed of opposing Pokémon hit by 40% for 3s.

upgrades.name: Dive
upgrades.description1: Changes the designated area into a puddle and has the user dive to that area, dealing damage to enemies and shoving them when they're hit. The user also catches Arrokuda or other wild Pokémon as they emerge from the puddle. A maximum of 3 uses can be kept in reserve for this move.
upgrades.description2: Increased damage.

rsb.name: Dive
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: The user becomes unstoppable for 0.5s as they change the designated location into a puddle then dive to the puddle, damaging opposing Pokémon and shoving them for 0.5s when the user emerges from the puddle. The next boosted attack within 5s deals additional damage; boosted attacks after 5s have passed become regular boosted attacks. A maximum of 3 uses can be kept in reserve for this move, and there is a 2s cooldown between uses.
rsb.notes: The user catches prey for Gulp Missile as they emerge from the puddle.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases the damage of the dive.

skills.name: Feather Dance
skills.description: Decreases the Attack and movement speed of enemies for a short time.

rsb.name: Feather Dance
rsb.true_desc: The user throws a circle of feathers at the designated area, decreasing the Attack of opposing Pokémon in the area of effect by 30% and their movement speed by 20% for 4s.

upgrades.name: Hurricane
upgrades.description1: Creates a fierce wind, dealing damage to enemies that get caught in it and throws them.
upgrades.description2: Increases the user's movement speed for a short time.

rsb.name: Hurricane
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: The user creates a fierce wind at the designated location. After 0.5s, a hurricane catches opposing Pokémon in the area of effect, damaging them and throwing them for 1s.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases the user's movement speed by 20% for 3s.

upgrades.name: Air Slash
upgrades.description1: Shoot out many blades of air while moving backward to create distance. Deals damage to enemies in the area of effect and reduces this move's cooldown when it hits.
upgrades.description2: Restores the user's HP every time a blade of air hits an enemy.

rsb.name: Air Slash
rsb.label: Damage - per Blade (5 blades)
rsb.true_desc: The user shoots out 5 blades of air in a cone in the designated direction, damaging the first opposing Pokémon hit with each blade. The user also hops backward to create distance. This move's cooldown is reduced by 0.5s for each blade that hits (up to 2.5s).
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Restores the user's HP for each blade of air that hits an opposing Pokémon.

skills.name: Gatling Gulp Missile
skills.buffs: 30% Max HP Shield granted at the start of the Move, 30% Movement Speed granted at the end of the turret
skills.description: Creates a puddle at the user's current location. The user continuously uses its mouth to grab Arrokuda from the puddle and spits them out to attack the nearest enemy. The user cannot move or use other moves while this move is in effect.

rsb.name: Gatling Gulp Missile
rsb.label: Damage (10x)
rsb.true_desc: The user becomes unstoppable for up to 6.5s and catches a series of prey to spit at the nearest Pokémon from the opposing team or wild Pokémon up to 10 times. The user cannot move or use moves while using Gatling Gulp Missile. The user can use this Unite Move again to cancel it early. The prey caught for each Gatling Gulp Missile attack depends on the user's current HP.
rsb.notes: If a boosted attack is readied when this Unite Move is used, the user spits out this prey out first as a regular boosted attack before catching and spitting out up to 10 Gatling Gulp Missile prey.

name: Crustle

builds.name: Scissor Tomb
builds.explanation: Avoid playing Buddy Barrier if there is an enemy Umbreon

builds.name: Rocks
builds.explanation: Avoid playing Buddy Barrier if there is an enemy Umbreon. Curse Bangle may be substituted in as a utility slot.

builds.name: Scissor Smash
builds.explanation: Avoid playing Buddy Barrier if there is an enemy Umbreon

notes: Only auto attacks and X-Scissor can critically strike, but Crustle has 0% base Critical-Hit rate at all levels.

skills.name: Sturdy
skills.description: Gains a stacking Def/SpDef buff for every 7% HP missing. Stacks up to 10 times.

rsb.name: Sturdy
rsb.label: Def & Sp. Def - Increase (Stacks 10x)
rsb.true_desc: For every 7% missing HP, this Pokémon's Defense and Sp. Def are increased (up to 10 times; maximum at 70% missing HP or more).

skills.name: Attack
skills.description: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack. When this boosted attack hits, it deals damage to enemies in the area of effect and decreases their movement speed for a short time.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, damaging opposing Pokémon in the area of effect and decreasing their movement speed by 40% for 2s.

skills.name: Rock Slide
skills.description: Drops large rocks on the designated area. When this move hits, it deals damage to enemies in the area of effect and leaves them unable to act for a short time.

rsb.name: Rock Slide
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: The user drops large rocks at the designated location, damaging opposing Pokémon in the area of effect and stunning them for 1s.

upgrades.name: Rock Tomb
upgrades.description1: Splits open the ground toward the designated area, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and creating a barricade of rock. Activating this move again removes the barricade.
upgrades.description2: Decreases the movement speed of enemies for a short time when this move hits.

rsb.name: Rock Tomb
rsb.label: Damage - Projectile
rsb.true_desc: The user splits open the ground in a line towards the designated location, damaging opposing Pokémon in the path and decreasing their movement speed by 60% for 2s. A curved wall of rock is then created at the designated location that remains for up to 3s. When the wall of rock is created or destroyed, opposing Pokémon near the wall are damaged and their movement speed is decreased by 60% for 2s.
rsb.notes: The user can use this move again to destroy the wall of rock early.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Strengthens the movement speed decrease from this move to 80%.

upgrades.name: Shell Smash
upgrades.description1: Convert a set percentage of Defense and Sp. Defense into Attack and Sp. Attack and increase movement speed for a short time.
upgrades.description2: Increased conversion rate.

rsb.name: Shell Smash
rsb.true_desc: The user becomes unstoppable as they smash their shell over 0.8s, reducing their base Defense and Sp. Def stats to 0 and converting 40% of the value lost to bonus Attack and Sp. Atk respectively for 4.5s. The user's movement speed is increased by 75% for the duration of the buff (decaying by 5% every 1s; minimum 55% increased movement speed before the buff ends).
rsb.notes: All modifiers (except emblem color bonuses) work with 0 base Defense and Sp. Def for the duration of this buff.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Strengthens the conversion rate from lost Defense and Sp. Def to bonus Attack and Sp. Atk to 50%.

skills.name: Fury Cutter
skills.description: Slashes enemies with claws, dealing damage to them. Hitting the same enemy multiple times in succession with this move increases the damage dealt.

rsb.name: Fury Cutter
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: The user slashes once with their claw while dashing slightly in the designated direction, damaging opposing Pokémon hit. Targets hit by Fury Cutter receive a mark for 9s that stacks with subsequent Fury Cutter hits (up to 3 times). Subsequent hits of this move on marked targets have 20% increased damage (maximum 40% increased damage on the third and subsequent hits from this move).
rsb.notes: Additional stacking damage from this move is always rounded up.

upgrades.name: Stealth Rock
upgrades.description1: Throws many small rocks. When a rock hits an enemy or when the rocks have flown their full distance, a zone of many levitating rocks is created dealing slowly-increasing damage over time to enemies in the area of effect.
upgrades.description2: Increases the duration of this move's effects and decreases the movement speed of enemies for a short time when this move hits.

rsb.name: Stealth Rock
rsb.label: Damage (8 Ticks)
rsb.true_desc: The user launches a cluster of rocks in the designated direction which expands into a trap of levitating rocks on the first opposing Pokémon or wall hit, or after traveling their max distance. This trap deals damage to opposing Pokémon in the area of effect every 0.5s over 4s (up to 8 times). Subsequent hits on targets hit by the trap within 1.5s have 15% increased damage; this damage increase stacks with subsequent hits from that trap (maximum 105% increased damage on the eighth hit).
rsb.notes: Additional stacking damage from subsequent hits for each trap is always rounded up.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: The trap of levitating rocks remains for 1s longer; this move can hit up to 10 times (maximum 135% increased damage on the tenth hit). Also decreases the movement speed of opposing Pokémon hit by 35% for 1s.

upgrades.name: X-Scissor
upgrades.description1: Dash forward with crossed claws, dealing damage to enemies multiple times and shoving them. Leaves enemies unable to act if they hit an object when shoved.
upgrades.description2: Reduced cooldown.

rsb.name: X-Scissor
rsb.label: Damage - First Hit
rsb.true_desc: The user dashes and attacks with crossed claws three times in the designated direction, damaging opposing Pokémon and shoving them for 0.2s with each attack. The third hit stuns opposing Pokémon for 1.5s if they are shoved into a wall.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Reduces this move's cooldown by 1s.

skills.name: Rubble Rouser
skills.buffs: 30% Movement Speed, 40% Max HP Shield
skills.description: Gain a shield for a short time and leave nearby enemies unable to act, dealing damage over time to them. If the user receives damage while this move is in effect, the move deals additional hits to nearby enemies.

rsb.name: Rubble Rouser
rsb.label: Damage - Revenge
rsb.true_desc: The user becomes unstoppable as they summon a whirlwind of rocks around them, gaining a shield, damaging nearby enemies and stunning them for 1s. For 10s after, the whirlwind of rocks damage nearby opposing Pokémon every 1s. If the user receives damage during Rubble Rouser, the user deals additional revenge damage to nearby opposing Pokémon (2s CD).
rsb.notes: The value of the shield gained from Rubble Rouser is equal to 40% max HP + 600.

name: Darkrai

builds.name: Dark Plot
builds.explanation: Curse Incense can replace Wise Glasses into enemy compositions that have sustain through healing. Energy Amplifier advised to be played when enemy composition has high quantities of unstoppable or hindrance resistance to refund Unite Charge upon being cancelled or diligence in using Unite on non-unstoppable targets. Choice Specs may be considered for last hitting however majority of the time Darkrai last hits using Boosted Attacks to which Choice Specs will not proc.

builds.name: Dark Dark
builds.explanation: Curse Incense can replace Wise Glasses into enemy compositions that have sustain through healing. Energy Amplifier can be played when enemy composition has high quantities of unstoppable or hindrance resistance to refund Unite Charge upon being cancelled or diligence in using Unite on non-unstoppable targets.

builds.name: Shadow Pulse
builds.explanation: Curse Incense can replace Wise Glasses into enemy compositions that have sustain through healing. Energy Amplifier can be played when enemy composition has high quantities of unstoppable or hindrance resistance to refund Unite Charge upon being cancelled or diligence in using Unite on non-unstoppable targets.

notes: Darkrai cannot critically strike.

rsb.name: Bad Dreams
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: When an enemy is forcibly put to sleep near Darkrai, Darkrai deals damage to the target and gains a boosted attack. When Darkrai uses this boosted, every enemy that has been marked with bad dreams in the last 2.7s is attacked simultaneously.  Sleeping enemies near Darkrai take damage over time, and Darkrai deals 10% more damage to them while they remain asleep. Damage from this Ability doesn't wake up sleeping enemies.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Basic attacks made against sleeping enemies will become boosted attacks with greatly increased range. Boosted attacks deal damage to enemies with an attack from a void and restore Darkrai's HP. Darkrai does not require vision to perform a boosted attack against a sleeping target.

rsb.name: Hypnosis
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Send a hypnotic suggestion in the designated direction, dealing damage to the first enemy it hits. After 1s, the enemy will fall asleep for 2s.

rsb.name: Dark Void
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Fire a ball of darkness at an enemy. Additional balls of darkness will be thrown at each enemy within in the area of effect. Enemies hit will be dealt damage and marked. The mark lasts 5s. When Darkrai deals damage to marked enemy, the marks are removed and the Enemy falls asleep for 2s.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Applies a 40% slow for 3s when applying a mark to an enemy.

rsb.name: Shadow Claw
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Slash in a designated direction with sharp claws made from shadows, dealing damage in a line, applying a 40% slow for 3s and marking enemies hit. When the user deals damage twice to marked enemies, that marked enemy falls asleep for 2s and has their mark removed. When this move hits, this move can be used again. The second use of this move hits a designated target with huge claws, dealing damage. If there are any opposing Pokémon suffering from Bad Dreams, the second use of this move will deal increased damage.
rsb.add2_label: Damage - Huge Claw (A Pokémon has Bad Dreams)
rsb.add4_label: Damage - Huge Claw In Dark Pulse
rsb.add5_label: Damage - Huge Claw In Dark Pulse (A Pokémon has Bad Dreams)
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases the damage dealt by this move.
rsb.enhanced_add2_label: Damage - Huge Claw (A Pokémon has Bad Dreams)
rsb.enhanced_add4_label: Damage - Huge Claw In Dark Pulse
rsb.enhanced_add5_label: Damage - Huge Claw In Dark Pulse (A Pokémon has Bad Dreams)

rsb.name: Calm Mind
rsb.true_desc: The user focuses their mind, increasing their Special Attack and Special Defense by 30% for 3s and Movement Speed by 50% for 3s, decaying by 10% every 0.5 seconds to a minimum of 10%.

rsb.name: Nasty Plot
rsb.label: Damage - Additional (Per Counter)
rsb.true_desc: Dash a short distance, gaining a Nasty Plot counter for 7s and refreshing the duration of all current counters. Upon using a basic attack, consume all nasty plot counters to deal damage to one of the targets hit. Upon using a boosted attack, turn the boosted and all nasty plot counters into a series of projectiles, hitting every target of Darkrai's boosted.
rsb.notes: A maximum of two counters may be held. Nasty Plot has no cooldown between dashes.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Gain one charge of this move in reserve when an enemy falls asleep.

rsb.name: Dark Pulse
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Hide in a shadow and create additional shadows around the hiding spot. Darkrai may freely move between the shadows. When this move is used again and held, the move ends and Darkrai appears from the shadow it dealt damage from. When this move is used again but is not held or after 4s elapses, Darkrai appears from the shadow they are currently hiding in, deals damage to enemies hit, then returns to the original shadow. Dark Pulse may then be used one more time if the move was only tapped. Darkrai will leave the shadow after 4s, dealing damage to all enemies in the shadow that Darkrai appears from.
rsb.notes: While hiding, Shadow Claw may be used to attack from the shadow that is being hidden in. Shadow Claws used this way will not apply the Shadow Claw mark to targets hit and deals reduced damage.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Dealing damage with this move causes Darkrai to gain a shield for 2.5 seconds.

skills.name: Worst Nightmare
skills.buffs: 80% Movement Speed, 20% Max HP Shield

rsb.name: Worst Nightmare
rsb.true_desc: The user becomes unstoppable and casts a sleeping spell on the designated Pokémon from the opposing team. If the target is successfully put to sleep, the user's moves' cooldowns are reset, the target is marked to receive 3% max HP damage over time every 0.5s over 10s (up to 21 times; maximum 63% max HP damage as Sp. Atk-based damage), and the user sends that target into a nightmare realm centered on their initial location for up to 8s. The user follows the target into the nightmare realm. While inside the nightmare realm, Darkrai and the target are unaffected by goal zones, jump pads, and Berries. Other Pokémon outside of the nightmare realm cannot target Darkrai or their target while they're inside.
rsb.notes: If the designated Pokémon from the opposing team cannot be put to sleep, this Unite Move is canceled and 90% of the Unite Move gauge is refunded. This energy regeneration is affected by Energy Amplifier.

name: Decidueye
notes: Only Razor Leaf and auto attacks can critically strike. Decidueye's Critical-Hit rate increases at levels 5 and 9.

skills.name: Long Reach
skills.description: Deals increased damage to distant enemies.

rsb.name: Long Reach
rsb.true_desc: Deals 20% increased damage to distant enemies.

skills.name: Attack
skills.description: Increases the speed of basic attacks by 3% for a short time after one hits. This effect can stack up to 4 times, and with every third activation of this effect, basic attacks become boosted attacks for a short time. These boosted attacks fire more quills, but the damage dealt by each quill is decreased.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Increases the speed of auto attacks by 3% for 2.5s after one hits. This effect can stack up to 4 times, and with every third activation of this effect, auto attacks become boosted attacks for a short time. These boosted attacks fire more quills, but the damage dealt by each quill is decreased.

skills.name: Leafage
skills.description: Pelts leaves in the designated direction, dealing damage to enemies hit. For a short time after using this move, Decidueye’s Attack and basic attack speed are increased.

rsb.name: Leafage
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Pelts leaves in the designated direction, dealing damage in a cone to enemies hit (only hits once). For a short time after using this move, Decidueye’s Attack is increased by 10% (this also affects Leafage) and auto attack speed is increased by 25% for 3s.

upgrades.name: Razor Leaf
upgrades.description1: Summons whirling razor leaves. For a short time after using this move, Decidueye’s Attack and basic attack speed are increased, and basic attacks can target multiple enemies for a short time.
upgrades.description2: Increases the basic attack damage the higher the enemies remaining HP is.

rsb.name: Razor Leaf
rsb.label: Damage - Main Target (Unboosted)
rsb.true_desc: Summons whirling razor leaves.  While active, Decidueye's auto attack is replaced by a new auto attack that targets up to 2 additional enemies in range, as well as increasing Attack by 10% and auto attack speed. This buff lasts for 5.5s.
rsb.add3_true_desc: Increases Attack Speed by 1% x (Level -1) + 40% for 5.5s.
rsb.enhanced_notes: Increases auto attack damage by 2% of the primary target's remaining HP and 1% for secondary targets. This damage only applies once per attack, not on each of the 3 boosted quills.
rsb.enhanced_rsb_info: Against All Enemies: The additional damage from remaining HP is capped at 240 on the primary target and 120 on secondary targets.

upgrades.name: Spirit Shackle
upgrades.description1: Charges power before firing quills in the designated direction. Damage dealt increases the longer power is charged, but movement speed is decreased while charging. If this move hits after power is charged to the maximum, it can stitch enemies to the ground. The affected Pokémon receives damage upon moving a set distance from that location, and their movement speed is decreased for a short time.
upgrades.description2: Deals increased damage to enemies with low remaining HP.

rsb.name: Spirit Shackle
rsb.label: Damage - Min Charge
rsb.true_desc: Charges power before firing a large arrow in the designated direction. Damage dealt increases the longer power is charged (with 6 breakpoints), but movement speed is decreased by 25% while charging. If this move hits after power is charged to the maximum, it can stitch enemies to the ground. The affected enemy has their movement speed decreased by 80% for a short time when exiting the area, and receives damage upon leaving the area. A maximum of 3 uses can be kept in reserve for this move. There is a 2s cooldown between uses.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Deals 15% increased damage to enemies with less than 50% remaining HP.

skills.name: Astonish
skills.description: Deals damage to enemies and decreases their movement speed for a short time.

rsb.name: Astonish
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Deals damage to enemies and decreases their movement speed by 80% for a short time.

upgrades.name: Leaf Storm
upgrades.description1: Creates a tempest of sharp leaves, dealing damage to enemies it hits and decreases their movement speed for a short time. At point-blank range, it also shoves enemies hit.
upgrades.description2: Increases the length of time that the movement speed of enemies is decreased.

rsb.name: Leaf Storm
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Creates a tempest of sharp leaves, dealing damage to enemies it hits and decreases their movement speed by 60% for 2.5s. The slow decays at 10% per 0.5s up to four times. At point-blank range, it also shoves and stuns enemies hit.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Movement speed decrease now lasts 3.5s but still decaying up to four times at 10% per 0.5s.

upgrades.name: Shadow Sneak
upgrades.description1: Creates a shadow that takes hold of one enemy in the area of effect, dealing damage and decreasing their movement speed and Defense for a short time. Also increases Decidueye’s movement speed for a short time.
upgrades.description2: Further decreases Defense.

rsb.name: Shadow Sneak
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Creates a shadow that stays with Decidueye for up to 5s and increasing Decidueye's movement speed by 70% for 2s, decreasing by 20% every 0.5s. If an enemy player is within the shadow's detection range, it will detach from Decidueye and latch on to the player, dealing damage and decreasing their movement speed by 30% for 1s. If the shadow is attached to a Pokémon that is not Decidueye, the shadow decreases their Defense by 60% for 1.5s. Wild Pokémon may also be latched onto but Decidueye must be engaged in combat with that Wild Pokémon.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Defense reduction of enemies is increased to 80%.

skills.name: Nock Nock
skills.buffs: 30% Max HP Shield granted at the start of the Move, 30% Movement Speed granted at the end of the turret
skills.description: Fires quills in the designated direction, dealing damage to enemies. The move ends by unleashing a particularly large quill that deals damage to all enemies it hits. This move deals increased damage if the enemies remaining HP is low. While using this move, Decidueye becomes immune to hindrances but is unable to move.

rsb.name: Nock Nock
rsb.label: Damage - per Quill (30 Quills)
rsb.true_desc: Fires quills in the designated direction, dealing damage to enemies but does not pierce through them. The move ends by unleashing a large quill that deals damage to all enemies it hits (30% more damage if the target is below 50% HP) but Nock Nock can be cancelled early. While using this move, Decidueye becomes unstoppable but is unable to move.

name: Delphox

builds.name: Blast Spin
builds.explanation: Replacements for Slick Spoon are situational: Choice Specs for lane secure is prefered, Wise Glasses for generic, Curse Incense to double down on Anti-Heal

builds.name: Mystical Charge
builds.explanation: Replacements for Shell Bell are situational: Choice Specs for lane secure is prefered, Wise Glasses for generic, Curse Incense to double down on Anti-Heal. However, this build is based upon the purpose of constant damage through repeated casts.

builds.name: Mystical Spin
builds.explanation: Replacements for Shell Bell are situational: Choice Specs for lane secure is prefered, Wise Glasses for generic, Curse Incense to double down on Anti-Heal. However, this build is based upon the purpose of constant disruption through Fire Spin casts.

notes: Only auto attacks can critically strike, but Delphox has 0% base Critical-Hit rate at all levels.

skills.name: Blaze
skills.description: When using a move while at low remaining HP, deal additional damage with a fireball to enemies. This Ability goes on cooldown after it’s triggered.

rsb.name: Blaze
rsb.label: Damage - Fireball
rsb.true_desc: When using a move when below 50% max HP, that move deals additional damage with a fireball to enemies (15s CD).

skills.name: Attack
skills.description: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, dealing increased damage when it hits.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, dealing increased damage when it hits.

skills.name: Ember
skills.description: Shoot a small flame in front of itself, dealing damage to enemies hit.

rsb.name: Ember
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Shoot a small flame in front of itself, dealing damage to enemies hit.

upgrades.name: Fire Blast
upgrades.description1: Launch an intense, all-consuming fire in a forward direction; dealing damage to enemies hit. As the fire travels, it leaves behind a zone of flames in which a delayed explosion will occur, dealing damage to enemies in the area-of-effect.
upgrades.description2: Increased damage.

rsb.name: Fire Blast
rsb.label: Damage - Initial
rsb.true_desc: Delphox launches an intense, all-consuming fire in a forward direction; dealing damage to enemies hit. As the fire travels, it leaves behind a zone of flames in which a delayed explosion will occur; dealing damage to enemies in the area-of-effect.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Damage increased.

upgrades.name: Mystical Fire
upgrades.description1: Unleash a special, hot ball of fire in a forward direction. If it hits an enemy, the fire will explode; dealing damage to enemies in the area-of-effect.
upgrades.description2: Also reduces cooldowns of all moves if this move hits. If it hits an enemy from the opposing team, cooldowns are reduced even further.

rsb.name: Mystical Fire
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Delphox unleashes a special, hot ball of fire in a forward direction. If it hits an enemy, the fire will explode; dealing damage to enemies in the area-of-effect.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Also reduces cooldowns of all moves if this move hits by 1s. If it hits an enemy player, cooldowns are reduced even further (1.5s).

skills.name: Will-o-Wisp
skills.description: Conjure up three sinister flames and launch them toward the designated area. These flames then explode; dealing damage to enemies hit by the explosion and decreasing their movement speed by 30% for 2s.

rsb.name: Will-o-Wisp
rsb.label: Damage - Flames
rsb.true_desc: Conjure up sinister flames and launch them toward the designated area. These flames then explode, dealing damage to enemies hit by the explosion and decreasing their movement speed by 30% for 2s. An enemy will only be counted as being hit by one flame and one explosion, even if all 3 flames visually hit.

upgrades.name: Fire Spin
upgrades.description1: Create a vortex of fire in the designated area. The vortex automatically moves toward the nearest enemy, dealing damage-over-time to all enemies caught in the area for a short time and decreasing their movement speed by 30% for 5s. After 4.5s passes or an enemy is caught in the center of the vortex; the flames increase in intensity. This increases the rate at which the flames deal damage and also leaves the enemies unable to act for 1s. This trapped damage ticks four times total. The Fire Spin will otherwise deal damage as it travels. Move placement on top of enemies will apply a "searching" tick and then apply "trapped" damage. A maximum of 9 ticks is possible.
upgrades.description2: Applies a debuff on trap activation that increases all damage dealt by Delphox by 15% while enemies are trapped. Debuff is only cleansable after the first tick of trap damage and does not re-apply the debuff.

rsb.name: Fire Spin
rsb.label: Damage - per Tick
rsb.true_desc: Create a vortex of fire in the designated area. The vortex automatically moves toward the nearest enemy, dealing damage-over-time to all enemies caught in the area for a short time and decreasing their movement speed by 30% for 4s. After 3.5s passes or an enemy is caught in the center of the vortex; the flames increase in intensity causing a trap activation. This increases the rate at which the flames deal damage and also leaves the enemies unable to act for 1s. This trapped damage ticks four times total. The Fire Spin will otherwise deal damage as it travels. Move placement on top of enemies will apply a 'searching' tick and then apply 'trapped' damage. A maximum of 9 ticks is possible.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Applies a debuff on trap activation that increases all damage dealt by Delphox by 15% for 3s. Debuff is only cleansable after the first tick of trap damage and does not re-apply the debuff.

upgrades.name: Flame Charge
upgrades.description1: Charge forward in the designated direction. If there are any enemies in range when the charge ends, summon three flames to attack. The flames deal damage and decrease enemy movement speed for a short time. This move can be used while also using Fire Blast or Mystical Fire.
upgrades.description2: Increases Delphox's movement speed for a short time when this move is used.

rsb.name: Flame Charge
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Delphox charges forward in the designated direction. If there are any enemies within auto attack range when the charge ends, summon three flames to attack. These flames deal damage and decrease enemy movement speed by 30% for 2s. This move can be used while also using Fire Blast or Mystical Fire. Each subsequent flame that hits deals 70% less.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases Delphox's movement speed by 30% for 1.5s when this move is used.

skills.name: Fanciful Fireworks
skills.buffs: 30% Movement Speed, 30% CDR, 20% Max HP Shield
skills.description: Deals damage-over-time to enemies in the designated area-of-effect. Enemies that are hit have decreased movement speed and weakened HP recovery effects for a short time.

rsb.name: Fanciful Fireworks
rsb.label: Damage - per Tick
rsb.true_desc: Deals damage-over-time to enemies in the designated area for 8s. Enemies that are hit have 50% decreased movement speed and 50% reduced HP recovery effects for 1.75s. Recovery effects are weakened within the zone and cannot be cleansed while in the zone. Leaving the zone will have the weakened HP recovery effects linger for 1.75s and may be cleansed after leaving the zone. 8s duration (ticks at 0.5s intervals).

name: Dodrio

builds.name: Drill Kick
builds.explanation: Charging Charm focuses more on damage where as Float Stone allows for more map play in the later stages of the game.

builds.name: Tri Jump
builds.explanation: Energy Amplifier along with Accelgor buff creates a potential stun lock loop when using Jump Kick and Tri Attack

notes: Only auto attacks can critically strike (but full sprint gauge boosted attacks cannot). Dodrio's Critical-Hit rate increases at levels 5 and 9.

skills.name: Run Away
skills.description: Movement speed is increased when enemies are nearby. While the Pokémon is moving, their sprint gauge charges. While the sprint gauge is full, movement speed is increased. If the Pokémon's movement speed decreases below a set speed, the sprint gauge will rapidly deplete. When this Pokémon scores a goal, the amount of Aeos energy deposited is evenly divided into equal portions for each head the Pokémon has.

rsb.name: Run Away
rsb.true_desc: This Pokémon receives 10% increased movement speed when within a radius of enemy Pokémon. While moving, the sprint gauge charges from 0 to 10 (2% increased movement speed per increment). At full, Dodrio runs at 20% increased movement speed. If movement speed is decreased below a threshold, the sprint gauge will rapidly deplete. When Doduo scores a goal, it evenly divides its collected Aeos energy into two portions and deposits them into the goal one at a time. As Dodrio, this is split into three portions to deposit in the goal one at a time. Only goals made by a full emptying of the Aeos Ball will count towards stacking items.

skills.name: Attack
skills.description: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, dealing consecutive blows with each of the user's heads. When the sprint gauage is full, basic attacks will cause the Pokémon to charge in the direction they're facing and consume all of the sprint gauge. If this charging attack hits an enemy, all of the user's move cooldowns are reduced.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack. Attacking with a full sprint gauge turns the attack into a charge in the facing direction. If the sprint gauged attack hits an enemy, all cooldowns are reduced by 1s.

skills.name: Peck
skills.description: Move forward while jabbing with beaks. When the sprint gauge is full, instead charge forward while jabbing with beaks. Using this move fully consumes the sprint gauge.

rsb.name: Peck
rsb.label: Damage (No Gauge)
rsb.true_desc: Jabs forward with Doduo's beaks. When using the move, Doduo stops moving and loses sprint gauge due to dropping below the sprint gauge gaining threshold. When the sprint gauge is full, Doduo charges forward to jab the in the facing direction and fully consumes the sprint gauge.

upgrades.name: Tri Attack
upgrades.description1: Dodrio attacks with their beaks in a cone in front of themself, dealing damage to enemies and applying one of the following random effects to enemies hit: decrease Attack and deal damage-over-time for a set amount of time, deacrease auto attack speed, or decrease movement speed. When the sprint gauge is full, Dodrio instead shoots out 3 projectiles in a designated direction. If a projectile hits an enemy, the project deals damage and applies one of the aforementioned effects based on its color. After this move is used, Dodrio's next auto attack deals additional damage and restores HP. Holds 2 uses in reserve and cannot be used more than once every 1s.
upgrades.description2: When the sprint gauge is full, this move's cooldown is reduced.

rsb.name: Tri Attack
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Dodrio attacks with their beaks in a cone in front of themself, dealing damage to enemies and applying one of the following random effects to enemies hit: Burn, Paralyze, or Freeze. When the sprint gauge is full, Dodrio instead shoots out 3 projectiles in the facing direction. If a projectile hits an enemy, the projectile deals damage but only the first projectile of random colour/type applies one of the following enhanced random effects to enemies hit: Burn, Paralyze, or Freeze corresponding to the colour/type. After this move is used, Dodrio's next basic attack deals additional damage and restores HP. Holds 2 uses in reserve and cannot be used more than once every 1s.
rsb.notes: Burn: 8% Attack decrease for 2s, 12% Attack decrease if Sprint empowered. Paralyze: 8% Attack Speed decrease and 10% Movement speeed decrease for 2s, 12% Attack Speed decrease and 15% Movement speed decrease if Sprint empowered. Freeze: 20% Movement speed decrease for 2s, 40% if Sprint empowered.
rsb.add3_true_desc: Also heals Dodrio for 7% max HP.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: The next auto attack gains additional healing by 3% of max HP. When using full sprint gauge attack the charge time for this move is additionally reduced by 1s.

upgrades.name: Drill Peck
upgrades.description1: Dodrio moves forward while striking with their sharp beaks multiple times, dealing damage to enemies hit. When the sprint gauge is full, Dodrio instead dashes forward while striking with their sharp beaks multiple times, dealing damage to enemies hit and shoving them. Using this move fully consumes the sprint gauge.
upgrades.description2: Reduces this move's cooldown. Also, when this move hits enemies, restore a portion of Dodrio's HP based on the amount of damage dealt.

rsb.name: Drill Peck
rsb.label: Damage - 3x (No Gauge)
rsb.true_desc: Dodrio strikes forward with their sharp beaks multiple times, dealing damage to enemies hit. If used with a full sprint gauge, consume the sprint gauge and dash forward while striking with their sharp beaks multiple times, dealing damage to enemies hit and shoving them. During this dash, Dodrio receives 20% reduced damage.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Reduces base cd by 2s and restores a portion of Dodrio's HP equal to 30% of damage dealt by the flat damage (percent damage excluded).

skills.name: Quick Attack
skills.description: Dash forward, increasing the user's movement speed for a short time and deal damage to enemies hit. This move's cooldown is reduced if it hits an enemy.

rsb.name: Quick Attack
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Dash forward, increasing the user's movement speed by 30% for 2s and dealing damage to enemies hit. This move's cooldown is reduced by 1.5s if it hits an enemy.

upgrades.name: Agility
upgrades.description1: Become immune to hindrances for a short time and fully charge the sprint gauge. Afterward, movement speed is increased for a short time, and the sprint gauge charges faster.
upgrades.description2: After this move is used, the sprint gauge becomes fully charged.

rsb.name: Agility
rsb.true_desc: Become immune to hindrances for 0.5s and adds to the sprint gauge. Afterward, movement speed is increased by 20% for 4s, and the sprint gauge charges faster.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Fully charges the sprint gauge on use.

upgrades.name: Jump Kick
upgrades.description1: Dodrio leaps forward while kicking. If this move makes contact with an enemy or obstacle, Dodrio leaps over it and stomps the ground when landing, dealing damage to enemies in the area-of-effect and decreases their movement speed for a short time and the sprint gauge charges. If this move makes contact with an enemy, this move's cooldown is reduced.
upgrades.description2: When stomping the ground after leaping, enemies in the area are also left unable to act.

rsb.name: Jump Kick
rsb.label: Damage - Initial
rsb.true_desc: Dodrio leaps forward while kicking. If this move makes contact with an enemy or obstacle, Dodrio leaps over it, stunning enemies by 0.5s, and stomps the ground when landing, dealing damage to enemies in the area-of-effect, slowing by 25% for 2s, and the sprint gauge charges by 75%. If this move makes contact with an enemy, that enemy is stunned briefly from getting kicked in the head and this move's cooldown is reduced by 3s.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Enemies in the area of the landing are also stunned for 1s.

skills.name: Triple Trample
skills.buffs: 80% Movement Speed, 20% Max HP Shield
skills.description: Dodrio runs to a designated location. While running, Dodrio is immune to hindrances. If Dodrio makes contact with an enemy while running, they are dealt damage and thrown into the air. When Dodrio arrives at the designated location, Dodrio gains increased Attack for a short time, is granted a shield, and the sprint gauge charges faster for a short time.

rsb.name: Triple Trample
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Dodrio runs to a designated location. If Dodrio makes contact with an enemy while running, they are dealt damage and thrown into the air for 1s. When Dodrio arrives at the designated location, Dodrio gains 25% increased Attack and loses 5% Sp. Attack for 3s, is granted a 10% Max HP shield for 3s, and the sprint gauge charges faster for 6s. Damage dealt at the designated location is affected by the Attack bonus. Dodrio is unstoppable during this move.

name: Dragapult
notes: Only auto attacks and Dragon Dance can critically strike. Dragapult's Critical-Hit rate increases at levels 5 and 9.

skills.name: Clear Body
skills.description: Reduces the duration of debuff effects inflicted on Dragapult by 50%

rsb.name: Clear Body
rsb.true_desc: Reduces the duration of debuffs inflicted on this Pokémon.

skills.name: Attack
skills.description: Each time damage is dealt to enemies, boosted basic attack gauge increases. When the boosted basic attack gauge is full (after 8 instances of damage), the Pokémon's basic attacks become boosted attacks.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Becomes boosted attacks when the boosted attack gauge is full, dealing increased damage in an area of effect centered on the opposing Pokémon they hit.
rsb.notes: Each time the user deals damage to opposing Pokémon, the boosted attack gauge increases by 1, becoming full when the user deals damage 8 times. After not dealing damage for 3s, the boosted attack gauge decreases by 2 every 0.5s.

skills.name: Astonish
skills.description: Lets out a sound blast in a forward direction. The shout explodes when it hits an enemy or after traveling a set distance, dealing damage in the area and decreasing their movement speed for a short time

rsb.name: Astonish
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Lets out a sound blast in a forward direction. The shout explodes when it hits an enemy or after traveling a set distance, dealing damage in an area and decreasing enemy movement speed by 30% for 2s.

upgrades.name: Dragon Breath
upgrades.description1: Exhales a mighty gust in the designated direction, dealing damage to Pokémon in the area of effect and decreasing their movement speed. The gust also leaves the ground burning for a set amount of time. Pokémon in this area of effect take damage over tim and have their movement speed decreased for a short time. If this move is used while the uesr is flying with Dragon Dance, the mighty gust is exhaled along Dragon Dance's flight path, dealing damage to opposing Pokémon in the area of effect and the decreasing their movement speed for a short time.
upgrades.description2: Deals increased damage and further decreases their movement speed

rsb.name: Dragon Breath
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Exhales a mighty gust in the designated direction, dealing damage to enemies in the area-of-effect and decreasing their movement speed by 30% for 2s. The gust also leaves the ground burning for 3s. Enemies in this area take damage-over-time and have their movement speed decreased for a short time. If this move is used while the user is flying with Dragon Dance, the mighty gust is exhaled along Dragon Dance's flight path, dealing damage to enemies in the area and decreasing their movement speed for a short time.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Deals increased damage and increases the slow to 45% for 2s.

upgrades.name: Shadow Ball
upgrades.description1: Hurls a shadowy blob in the designated direction, dealing damage to Pokémon it touches and applying a mark to them. When marked Pokémon are hit by Dragapult, they receive additional damage. The fourth time the marked Pokémon is hit, the mark is removed, but the damage dealt by the attack is further increased and the user recovers HP. After using this move, the user moves a short distance in a designated direction.
upgrades.description2: Increased Damage

rsb.name: Shadow Ball
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: The user hurls a shadowy blob in the designated direction, damaging opposing Pokémon hit and applying a marker with 4 parts to them for 5s; then dashes in the chosen direction forward. When the user hits a marked target, one part of the marker is consumed to deal additional damage. The fourth part of the mark deals increased additional damage and removes the mark when consumed, and the user restores 15% max HP.
rsb.add2_label: Damage - Final Mark Proc Additional Damage
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases the damage of this move and the additional damage from marks.
rsb.enhanced_add2_label: Damage - Final Mark Proc Additional Damage

skills.name: Quick Attack
skills.description: Dashes in the designated direction, increasing its basic attack speed for a short time

rsb.name: Quick Attack
rsb.true_desc: Dashes in the designated direction, increasing basic attack speed by 40% for 2s.

upgrades.name: Dragon Dance
upgrades.description1: Flies in a circular pattern in the designated direction. While flying, it continuously deals damage to nearby enemies with basic attacks that deal less damage but have increased attack speed. If this move is used again while the user is flying, the user stops flying and moves a short distance in the designated direction. If the user knocks out an enemy, this move's cooldown is reset. If the user assists in a knock out, this move's cooldown is reduced by half. When this move is used, Dragon's Breath's cooldown is reset
upgrades.description2: While the user is flying, its attacks also restores HP when they hit

rsb.name: Dragon Dance
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: The user prepares a circular flight path in the designated direction, then moves into a direction either side to fly on the path; the flight path takes 3.5s to complete. While flying, the user increases their basic attack speed by 200% and they continuously use auto attacks, dealing 10% reduced damage to opposing Pokémon hit. If this move is used again while the user is flying, the user stops flying, becomes briefly invincible and dashes a short distance forward. If the user knocks out a Pokémon from the opposing team, this move's cooldown is reset. If the user assists in knocking out a Pokémon from the opposing team instead, this move's cooldown is reduced by 50%.
rsb.notes: When this move is used, Dragon Breath's cooldown is reset.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: While the user is flying, auto attacks restore the user's HP for an additional 25% of damage dealt.

upgrades.name: Phantom Force
upgrades.description1: For a short time, increases the user's movement speed and enters stealth. While the user is in stealth, the boosted basic attakck gauge increases. When stealth ends, Dragapult's basic attack speed is increased for a short time. After this move is learned, if the user knocks out an enemy, this move's cooldown is reset and Dragapult's Attack is increased by 6 until the end of battle. This Attack increase can stack up to 8 times.
upgrades.description2: Reduces this move's cooldown by 0.5s when the user deals damage to enemies with basic attacks.

rsb.name: Phantom Force
rsb.true_desc: The user enters stealth for up to 6s or until using an attack, increasing their movement speed by 30% and increasing the boosted basic attack gauge by 1 every 1s. When the user exits stealth, the user's basic attack speed is increased by 85% for 3s.
rsb.notes: When this move is learned, if the user knocks out a Pokémon from the opposing team, this move's cooldown is reset and the user's Attack is increased by 8 until the end of the battle (up to 10 times; maximum 80 bonus Attack).
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Reduces this move's cooldown by 0.5s per opposing Pokémon hit by the user's auto attacks.

skills.name: Dreep and Destroy
skills.buffs: 10% Max HP Shield, 10% Movement Speed for 3s; Has an internal cooldown of 30s to activate Energy Amplifier; Has an internal cooldown of 60s to activate Buddy Barrier;
skills.description: Launches two Dreepy and each deals damage to different Pokémon in the area of effect. The lower the opposing Pokémon's remaining HP is, the more damage the Dreepy deal. If there is only one target in the area of effect, both Dreepy target that Pokémon and deal damage to it. A maximum of 2 uses can be kept in reserve for this move. Dreepy may be fired once every 2 seconds. Neither Cooldown Reduction nor gaining Aeos Energy reduce the cooldown of Dreep and Destroy.

rsb.name: Dreep and Destroy
rsb.true_desc: The user launches two Dreepy at up to 2 different opposing Pokémon in range, damaging them and dealing additional missing HP damage to each target. If there is only one target in range, the second Dreepy deals 30% of the full damage to the target. A maximum of 2 uses can be kept in reserve for this Unite Move; there is a 2s cooldown between uses for this move.
rsb.notes: Against wild Pokémon: additional missing HP damage is capped at 1200.
rsb.add1_notes: Also deals 10% of enemy missing HP.

name: Dragonite
notes: Only auto attacks can critically strike. Dragonite's Critical-Hit rate increases at levels 5 and 9.

skills.name: Marvel Scale
skills.description: Increases Defense by 100 for 1.5s when afflicted by a status condition (Dratini and Dragonair only).
skills.passive2_description: When damaged by an enemy player, gain a buff that reduces damage taken by 30% for 2.5 seconds. This ability has a 15 second cooldown.

skills.name: Attack - Dratini
skills.description: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, blasting water in front of Dratini, dealing increased damage, reducing the cooldown of Dratini's moves by 1s, and recover 5% max HP when this hits.
skills.basic2_description: The boosted attack alternates between water and electric with every use of a boosted attack. If the water attack hits, it triggers the same effects as Dratini's boosted attack. If the electric attack hits, it leaves enemies unable to act for 0.5s and reduces the cooldown of Dragonair's moves by 1s when this hits.
skills.basic3_description: The boosted attack alternates between water, electric, and fire with every use of a boosted attack. If the water or electric attack hits, it triggers the same effects as Dragonair's boosted attack. If the fire attack hits, it deals additional damage equal to 10% of the enemy's remaining HP (capped at 1200 dmg against wilds) and reduces the cooldown of Dragonite's moves by 1s when this hits.

skills.name: Twister
skills.description: Creates a twister and releases it in the designated direction, dealing damage to enemies hit and decreases their movement speed for a short time.

rsb.name: Twister
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Creates a twister and releases it in the designated direction, dealing damage to enemies hit and decreases their movement speed by 50% for 1s.

upgrades.name: Dragon Dance
upgrades.description1: Dash in a designated direction, in one of three cycling patterns. After using this move, grant a buff increasing attack speed, movement speed, Attack by 8% (capping at 24%), as well as increasing the stage of Hyper Beam. This buff stacks up to 3 times, and the duration is reset to full on reuse. All stacks are removed after a few seconds. Basic attacks reduce the cooldown of this ability by 1s.

rsb.name: Dragon Dance
rsb.true_desc: Dash in a designated direction, alternating each use between a left arc, right arc and a direct dash. After using this move, grant a buff increasing attack speed of the next 3 auto attacks by 80% for 4.5s, increasing movement speed by 30% for 1s, increasing Attack by 8% (capping at 24%), as well as increasing the stage of Hyper Beam. This buff stacks up to 3 times, and the duration is reset to full on reuse. All stacks are removed after a few seconds. Auto attacks reduce the cooldown of this ability by 1s.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Further increases Dragonite's movement speed by 10% for 4.5s if there are enemies nearby when the dance ends.

upgrades.name: Extreme Speed
upgrades.description1: Dash toward the designated location stopping upon contact with an enemy, dealing damage and throwing them.

rsb.name: Extreme Speed
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Dash toward the designated enemy, damaging and slowing all enemies in a small radius around the target upon impact by 50% for 2s, throwing the primary target and shoving others away.  Using this move resets the cooldown of Multiscale.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: If Dragonite's movement speed is currently decreased when this move is used, that movement speed decrease is negated before the move is used.

skills.name: Dragon Breath
skills.description: Exhale a mighty gust in the designated direction. If this move hits an enemy, the user's next attack becomes a boosted attack.

rsb.name: Dragon Breath
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Exhale a mighty gust in the designated direction. If this move hits an enemy, Dragonite's next attack becomes a boosted attack.

upgrades.name: Hyper Beam
upgrades.description1: Fires a beam of energy toward the targeted enemy after a delay, dealing damage to all enemies that it hits, as well as additional damage based on their Max HP. The move changes Stages based on the number of stacks of Dragon Dance that Dragonite has, from 0 to 3. The Max HP damage is 5%/10%/15%/20%, determined by the current Stage.  Dragonite cannot act during the duration of this move.
upgrades.description2: Reduces damage taken by 50% while charging this move.

rsb.name: Hyper Beam
rsb.label: Damage - Stage 0
rsb.true_desc: Fires a beam of energy toward the targeted enemy after a delay, dealing damage to all enemies that it hits, as well as additional damage based on their Max HP. The move changes Stages based on the number of stacks of Dragon Dance that Dragonite has, from 0 to 3. The max HP damage is 0%/5%/10%/20%, determined by the current Stage. Dragonite cannot act while releasing the beam.
rsb.notes: Against Wild Pokémon: The additional damage from max HP is capped at 600/1200/1800/2400 depending on the stage.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Reduces damage taken by 50% while charging this move.

upgrades.name: Outrage
upgrades.description1: Dragonite begins rampaging for 5s. This move starts with a ground stomp, dealing damage to enemies in an area around Dragonite. While rampaging, all of Dragonite's basic attacks become a melee boosted attack, alternating through the water, electric, and fire boosted attack types. When the rampage ends, Dragonite is left briefly unable to act.

rsb.name: Outrage
rsb.label: Damage - Stomp
rsb.true_desc: Dragonite stomps the ground, dealing damage to enemies in an area around Dragonite with the bonus effect of the last Boosted Attack that was used. Additionally, Dragonite gains a buff for 5.5s, increasing auto attack speed by 35% for 5.5s, converting all attacks during the duration of Outrage into melee Boosted Attacks, and alternating through the water, electric, and fire Boosted Attacks in order. When the buff ends, Dragonite is stunned for .7s.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Reduce the duration of hindrances inflicted on Dragonite while rampaging by 40% for 5.5s.

skills.name: Draco Impact
skills.buffs: 30% Movement Speed, 35% Attack Speed, 20% Max HP Shield
skills.description: Briefly fly up in the air before crashing down with several comets on a designated area, dealing damage and throwing enemies in the area. The farther Dragonite flies, the more the Unite guage is consumed (25% at min disatance and 100% at max). Dragonite is unstoppable while using this move.

rsb.name: Draco Impact
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Briefly fly up in the air, becoming untargetable, before crashing down, approximately 2s after activating, with several comets on a designated area, dealing damage and throwing enemies in the area for 0.5s. The farther Dragonite flies, the more the Unite gauge is consumed (50% at min distance and 100% at max). Dragonite is unstoppable while using this move.

name: Duraludon
notes: Only auto attacks (and Cannon auto attacks) can critically strike. Duraludon's Critical-Hit rate increases at levels 5 and 9.

skills.name: Heavy Metal
skills.description: Prevents Duraludon from being thrown or shoved by the first attempt to shove or throw them. This ability goes on cooldown after it's triggered (50s cd).

rsb.name: Heavy Metal
rsb.true_desc: Prevents Duraludon from being thrown or shoved by the first attempt to throw or shove them. This ability goes on cooldown after it's triggered (50s cd).

skills.name: Attack
skills.description: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, shooting a long beam that deals a large amount of damage to all enemies hit.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, shooting a long beam that deals a large amount of damage to all enemies hit.

boosted_rsb.name: Boosted
boosted_rsb.label: Damage - Boosted
boosted_rsb.add1_true_desc: Deals 1.5% enemy max HP damage and can critically strike.
boosted_rsb.add1_notes: Against Wild Pokemon: The total damage is capped at 500.

skills.name: Laser Focus
skills.description: Reduces damage received for a short time. Afterward, Duraludon's basic attacks deal additional damage to enemies hit. This buff expires after 8s or after 3 basic attacks.

rsb.name: Laser Focus
rsb.label: Damage - Bonus
rsb.true_desc: Reduces damage received by 20% for .6s. Afterward, Duraludon's auto attacks deal additional damage to enemies hit. This buff expires after 8s or after 3 auto attacks.

upgrades.name: Flash Cannon
upgrades.description1: Duraludon ruptures the ground around themself and in a designated direction; dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and decreasing their movement speed by 50% for 1s. Afterward, go into "Cannon Mode" rooting Duraludon for 6s or if a basic attack is not made for 2.5s or this move can be cancelled early. While in Cannon Mode, basic attacks have longer range, attack speed is increased by 100% but decays by 20% per second over 5 seconds, dealing increased damage and splash damage. Exiting "Cannon mode" will prematurely remove the attack speed buff. Metal Claw, Stealth Rock, Dragon Tail, and boosted attacks can be used while in this mode and boosted attacks decrease the movement speed of enemies hit by 60% for 1s and also pierce.
upgrades.description2: Enemies in the ruptured ground's area of effect are also unable to act for 1s.

rsb.name: Flash Cannon
rsb.label: Damage - Rupture
rsb.add2_true_desc: This damage can critically strike. (Rupture Damage + 0.5% Max HP) * 3
rsb.add2_notes: This damage is capped at 500 on Wild Pokémon
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Enemies in the ruptured ground's area of effect are also unable to act for 1s.

upgrades.name: Dragon Pulse
upgrades.description1: Charges power before dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect. Duraludon's movement speed is decreased while charging, but the longer power is charged, the wider the move's area of effect becomes and the more damage it deals. After learning this move, a damage marker will be attached to any enemy Duraludon damages. When Dragon Pulse hits a marked enemy, it deals additional damage to that target for each damage marker attached to it, then removes all of the damage markers. In addition, if this move knocks out an enemy, the cooldown is reduced by 50% and the next 3 basic attacks will each deal additional damage and further reduce this move's cooldown when they hit.
upgrades.description2: Also restores Duraludon's HP if this move knocks out an enemy player.

rsb.name: Dragon Pulse
rsb.label: Damage - Bonus (After KO)
rsb.true_desc: Duraludon begins charging power, slowing itself by 30%. The longer the move is charged the greater the damage and area of effect. After learning this move a mark will be applied to any enemy Duraludon damages with auto attacks and moves. Each tick of damage from Duraludon (boosted attack counts as 1 instance) will apply 1 mark up to a maximum of 5 orbs and 1 ring. This mark lasts for 5s, is refreshed when Duraludon deals damage to the marked enemy and can be cleansed. When Dragon Pulse hits a marked enemy, the marks are consumed and additional damage is dealt for each mark. Opposing Duraludon's can consume the user's marks but will not gain the additional damage. Furthermore, if this move knocks out an enemy, the cooldown is reduced by 1s and Duraludon receives a buff for 8s or 3 auto attacks. While this buff is active, auto attacks deal additional damage and reduce this moves cooldown by 1.5s each.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Also restores 8% of Duraludon's max HP if this move knocks out an enemy player.

skills.name: Metal Claw
skills.description: Strike with sharp claws; dealing damage to enemies hit and decreasing their movement speed for a short time. After this move is used, Duraludon's next basic attack becomes a boosted attack.

rsb.name: Metal Claw
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Send sharp claws forward; dealing damage to enemies hit and decreasing their movement speed by 30% for 2s. After this move is used, Duraludon's next auto attack becomes a boosted attack.

upgrades.name: Dragon Tail
upgrades.description1: Duraludon shoves enemies and moves itself backward a short distance. The next basic attack becomes a boosted attack. A maximum of two uses can be kept in reserve for this move. There is a 1.1s cooldown between uses. This move can penetrate through walls.
upgrades.description2: Increased damage.

rsb.name: Dragon Tail
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Duraludon shoves enemies for 0.5s and moves itself backward a short distance. The next auto attack becomes a boosted attack. This move ignores obstacles. A maximum of 2 uses can be kept in reserve for this move. There is a 2.5s cooldown between uses.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Apply a mark for 5s that is consumed the next time Duraludon damages them, dealing additional damage.

upgrades.name: Stealth Rock
upgrades.description1: Hurl a stone at the designated area, creating an invisible field of stones. The field deals damage over time to enemies in the area of effect and decreases their movement speed for a short time. If the hurled stone hits an enemy before the designated area, the area of effect will instead be centered on where the stone hit that Pokémon. Once an enemy takes damage from the field, it will become visible to enemies.  If an enemy takes damage from this move 4 times, that enemy becomes unable to move for a short time. After this move is used, Duraludon's next basic attack becomes a boosted attack. A maximum of two uses can be kept in reserve for this move. There is a 1.1s cooldown between uses.
upgrades.description2: Increases the maximum number of uses that can be kept in reserve for this move.

rsb.name: Stealth Rock
rsb.label: Damage - per Tick (4 Ticks)
rsb.true_desc: Hurl a stone at the designated area, creating an invisible field of stones for 60s or until triggered. The field deals damage over time to enemies in the area of effect and decreases their movement speed by 25% for 2s, stacking up to 4 times. If the hurled stone hits an enemy before the designated area, the field will instead be centered on where the stone hit that Pokémon. Once an enemy takes damage from the field, it will become visible to all enemies. When the field becomes visible this way, Duraludon is granted a shield for 3s, can stack a maximum of 5 times, and the duration is refreshed upon gaining a stack. If an enemy takes damage from this move 2 times, that enemy becomes unable to move for 1s. After this move is used, Duraludon's next auto attack becomes a boosted attack. A maximum of 2 uses can be kept in reserve for this move. There is a 1s cooldown between uses.
rsb.notes: A maximum of 2 Stealth Rocks may be on the game field at one time, but 2 more can still be kept in reserve.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Stores 3 uses in reserve instead.
rsb.enhanced_notes: A maximum of 2 Stealth Rocks may be on the game field at one time, but 3 can be kept in reserve.

skills.name: Revolving Ruin
skills.buffs: 30% Movement Speed, 35% Attack Speed, 20% Max HP Shield
skills.description: Fire a beam of light at the ground in a sweeping circle around Duraludon. If this beam hits an enemy, it deals damage to them, grants Duraludon a shield and increases their Attack by 8% for a short time. Both the shield effect and the Attack increase are strengthened for each enemy that is hit by the beam. Damage is dealt to any enemy in the area of effect after the beam of light is fired. A burning ring is also left where the beam of light touched the ground, and enemies that touch this ring take additional damage and have their movement speed decreased by 50% for 1s refreshing as damage continus to be taken from the burning ground.

rsb.name: Revolving Ruin
rsb.label: Damage - per Hit
rsb.true_desc: Fire a beam of light at the ground in a sweeping circle around Duraludon. If this beam hits an enemy, it deals damage to them, grants Duraludon a shield and increases Attack by 8% for 8s. Both the shield effect and the Attack increase are strengthened for each enemy that is hit by the beam, stacking up to 5 times. Damage is dealt to any enemy in the area of effect after the beam of light is fired and enemies are shoved for 0.5s. A burning ring is also left where the beam of light touched the ground; enemies that touch this ring take additional damage every 0.5s and have their movement speed decreased by 50% for 1s. Subsequent hits after the first have the Attack stat bonus from this move applied to them.

name: Eldegoss

builds.name: Pollen Guard
builds.explanation: Emblem set 1 or 2 work based on preference of bulk or cdr. Emblem set 3 adds auto attack pressure and may be run with X Attack. Rapid Fire Scarf does not add new breakpoints with Red emblems, so run RFS *or* red emblems but not both. Curse Incense is also an option into teams with sustain for the third item.

builds.name: Pollen Spore
builds.explanation: X Speed may be run instead of Eject Button. Full Heal allows for safe aggression in the late game to Full Heal and Unite to get out of bad situations. Emblem Set 1 and 2 works based on preference of bulk or cdr. Rapid Fire Scarf may be subbed in for Buddy Barrier for use of Emblem set 1 or 2 if running Eject Button or X Speed. Emblem set 3 adds auto attack pressure and may be run with X Attack. Rapid Fire Scarf does not add new breakpoints with Red emblems, so run RFS *or* red emblems but not both. Curse Incense is also an option into teams with sustain for the third item.

builds.name: Tornado Guard
builds.explanation: Prioritize level 10 for Leaf Tornado+. Leaf Tornado+'s blind aspect is fantastic counter to auto attack reliant Pokémon and earlier on in the game Leaf Tornado's movement speed carpet allows your team faster rotations. Eject Button is preferred due to having a Leaf Tornado for movement speed already. Full Heal allows for safe aggression in the late game to Full Heal and Unite to get out of bad situations. Emblem set 1 is more highly recommended to counterbalance the longer cooldowns of Leaf Tornado and Cotton Guard. Emblem Set 2 also works based on preference of bulk or cdr. Emblem set 3 adds auto attack pressure and may be run with X Attack. Rapid Fire Scarf does not add new breakpoints with Red emblems, so run RFS *or* red emblems but not both. Curse Incense is also an option into teams with sustain for the third item.

builds.name: Tornado Spore
builds.explanation: Prioritize level 10 for Leaf Tornado+. Leaf Tornado+'s blind aspect is fantastic counter to auto attackers like Mewtwos and earlier on in the game Leaf Tornado's movement speed carpet allows your team faster rotations. X Speed may be run instead of Eject Button for mobility. Full Heal as an alternate item allows for safe aggression in the late game to Full Heal and Unite to get out of bad situations. Emblem set 1 is more highly recommended to counterbalance the longer cooldowns of Leaf Tornado. Emblem Set 2 also works based on preference of bulk. Emblem set 3 adds auto attack pressure and may be run with X Attack. Rapid Fire Scarf does not add new breakpoints with Red emblems, so run RFS *or* red emblems but not both. Curse Incense is also an option into teams with sustain for the third item.

notes: Only auto attacks can critically strike, but Eldegoss has 0% base Critical-Hit rate at all levels.

skills.name: Cotton Down
skills.description: Damages an enemy and decreases its movement speed for a short time after receiving a certain amount of damage. When that happens, also recover HP and gain increased movement speed for a short time.

rsb.name: Cotton Down
rsb.label: Damage - Revenge
rsb.true_desc: When at least 5% max HP damage is received in a single attack, restores this Pokémon's HP and increases their movement speed by 15% for 1.5s; deals revenge damage to nearby opposing Pokémon and decreases their movement speed by 30% for 1.5s (10s CD).

skills.name: Attack
skills.description: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, attaching a bit of cotton fluff to the enemy. The user's basic attacks against an enemy with cotton fluff on it deal increased damage and decreases the enemies movement speed for a short time.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, attaching a bit of cotton fluff to opposing Pokémon for 3s and then damaging them. The user and their teammates' auto attacks against targets with cotton fluff on them deal additional damage and decrease their movement speed by 20% for 1s.
rsb.notes: Each teammate uses their own Sp. Atk to deal additional damage on targets with cotton fluff. This additional damage has an internal cooldown of 0.35s for each teammate.

skills.name: Leafage
skills.description: Pelt the target with leaves, decreasing the movement speed of enemies for a short time when it hits.

rsb.name: Leafage
rsb.label: Damage
