Hoopa then shoots two sinister flames that deal damage to enemies hit and decreases their movement speed for a short time. This move can be used a second time within a set amount of time. If used a second time, Hoopa can return to the initial location they warped from. When using this move, if there is a nearby ally that is linked by Trick, that ally can also warp to the initial ring's location. The ally that warps in this way will recover HP.
upgrades.description2: Become invincible for a short time when this move is used.

rsb.name: Phantom Force
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Hoopa creates a portal ring under themself and warps to a designated location, dealing damage to nearby enemies at that location and shoving them. Hoopa then shoots two sinister flames that deal damage to enemies hit and decreases their movement speed by 40% for 2s. This move can be activated a second time within 5s and if activated, Hoopa can return to the initial ring's location. If there is a nearby ally that is also linked by Trick, that ally can warp to the initial ring's location and recover 15% max HP.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Become invincible for .6s when this move is used.

upgrades.name: Shadow Ball
upgrades.description1: Unleash a shadowy blob in front of Hoopa, dealing damage to enemies hit and decreases their movement speed and Sp. Def for a short time. If Hoopa then hits the same enemy with a move or boosted attack within a set amount of time, it deals additional damage and leaves the enemy unable to act for a short time. When using this move, if there is a nearby ally linked by Trick, this move will also unleash a shadowy blob at the same target from that ally's location.
upgrades.description2: The shadowy blob will now explode before disappearing. Enemies hit by the explosion are affected as if they were hit by the shadowy blob itself.

rsb.name: Shadow Ball
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Unleash a shadowy blob in front of Hoopa, dealing damage to enemies hit and decreasing their movement speed by 50% for 1s and Sp. Defense by 30% for 3s. If Hoopa then hits the same enemy with a move or boosted attack within 4s, deal additional damage and leave the enemy unable to act for .8s. When using this move, if there is a nearby ally linked by Trick, this move will also unleash a shadowy blob at the same target from that ally's location.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: The shadowy blob will now explode before disappearing. Enemies hit by the explosion are affected as if they were hit by the shadowy blob itself.

skills.name: Confusion
skills.description: Unleash a telekinetic force in the designated direction, dealing damage to the first enemy hit. The telekinetic force clings to that enemy and then causes a delayed explosion. The explosion deals damage to enemies in the area of effect and decreases their movement speed for a short time.

rsb.name: Confusion
rsb.label: Damage - Initial
rsb.true_desc: Unleash a telekinetic force in the designated direction, dealing damage to the first enemy hit. The telekinetic force clings to that enemy and then causes a delayed explosion. The explosion deals damage to enemies in the area of effect and decreases their movement speed for a short time.

upgrades.name: Hyperspace Hole
upgrades.description1: Hoopa creates a large ring at the designated location, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect. After a set amount of time, Hoopa and any allies in the area of effect will return to their base, and their movement speed will be increased for a short time. These allies can also warp back to where the ring was created. An intact ally forward goal zone can also be designated as the location where the ring is created. Creating the ring on this forward goal zone of the top path will also create a ring on the forward goal zone of the bottom path, and vice versa. All allies, including Hoopa, can use these rings to warp between the two goal zones, and their movement speed will be increased for a short time after warping. After an ally warps, there is a set cooldown before that ally can use these rings again. If a path's forward goal zone is destroyed, the middle goal zone on the same path will take its place. This move cannot be used on base goal zones.
upgrades.description2: Also increases the movement speed of allies near the ring when they are heading towards it.

rsb.name: Hyperspace Hole
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Hoopa creates a large ring at the designated location, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect. After 3s, Hoopa and any allies in the area of effect will return to their base, and their movement speed will be increased for a short time. These allies can also manually warp back to where the ring was created within 3s. An intact ally forwardmost goal zone can also be designated as the location where the ring is created. Creating a ring on the goal zone of the top path will also create a ring on the forwardmost goal zone of the bottom path for 6.5s, and vice versa. All allies (including Hoopa) can use these rings to manually warp between the two goal zones, and their movement speed will be increased for a short time after warping. After an ally or Hoopa warps, there is a 10s cooldown before that Pokémon can manually warp again. If a path's forwardmost goal zone is destroyed, the middle goal zone on the same path will take its place. This move cannot be used on base goal zones. Hyperspace Hole's portal usage cooldown applies only to Hyperspace Hole teleports, and is reset upon usage of Unite Move. If there are multiple effects that would allow you to teleport (ie Phantom Force and Rings Unbound), Rings Unbound will take priority. Hyperspace Holes can be seen by enemies on the minimap.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Also increases movement speed by 70% for allies near the ring when they are heading towards it.

upgrades.name: Trick
upgrades.description1: Hoopa creates a link between itself and an ally using a ring, increasing both of their movement speeds and granting them each a shield for a short time. When Hoopa uses Shadow Ball or performs a basic attack, the ring on the linked ally also unleashes the same move or attack. Hoopa can also use this move on themself, increasing movement speed and granting a shield for a short time. Additionally, it increases the damage dealt by Shadow Ball.
upgrades.description2: Also restores the linked ally Pokémon's HP when it deals damage to enemies.

rsb.name: Trick
rsb.label: Shield
rsb.true_desc: Hoopa creates a link between itself and an ally, increasing both of their movement speeds by 70% for 3s and granting them each a shield for 3s. For the next 7s, when Hoopa uses Shadow Ball or performs an auto attack, the ring on the linked ally also unleashes the same move or attack and if both attacks hit the same target, the second deals 50% damage. Hoopa can also use this move on themself, increasing movement speed and granting a shield for a short time. Additionally, increase the damage dealt by Shadow Ball while Trick is active.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Hoopa and the linked ally each heal for 10% of their own damage dealt. This effect lasts for 3s.

skills.name: Rings Unbound
skills.buffs: 30% Movement Speed, 30% CDR, 20% Max HP Shield
skills.description: Transforms Hoopa into Hoopa Unbound for a short time, increasing max HP and creating a ring at the designated location. Each ally can warp to the ring's location one time. As Hoopa Unbound, moves change to Hyperspace Fury and Psybeam. Hoopa Unbound cannot score goals or activate the Magician ability.

rsb.name: Rings Unbound
rsb.true_desc: Hoopa becomes invincible for 0.6s while transforming into Hoopa Unbound, then becomes unstoppable for 0.3s as it opens a large portal ring at a designated location. Hoopa Unbound lasts for 15s, increasing max HP by 40% and changes Hoopa's regular moves to Hyperspace Fury and Psybeam. Hoopa Unbound cannot score goals or activate the Magician ability.
rsb.notes: The portal ring created stays open for 10s, and allies can warp to that location once within the duration of the ring. This portal is indicated on the mini map where all players may see where it is.

secondary_unite_rsb.name: Auto Attack
secondary_unite_rsb.label: Damage
secondary_unite_rsb.true_desc: Basic attacks change and become boosted attacks that deal damage to up to 2 nearby enemies. If only one target is in range then both beams hit the same target, but 1 beam deals 50% damage.

secondary_unite_rsb.name: Hyperspace Fury
secondary_unite_rsb.label: Damage (7x)
secondary_unite_rsb.true_desc: Unleash 7 attacks in the designated area with Hoopa Unbound's many arms, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and leave them unable to act for 1s. (7s cooldown).

secondary_unite_rsb.name: Psybeam
secondary_unite_rsb.label: Damage
secondary_unite_rsb.true_desc: Fire a peculiar ray in front of Hoopa in a horizontal sweeping motion, dealing damage to enemies hit. Hoopa Unbound becomes immune to hindrances while using this move. (9s cooldown).

name: Inteleon

builds.name: Snipe Stinger
builds.explanation: Versus lower SpDef targets, Wise Glasses will deal more damage.

notes: Only auto attacks, Water Gun, Snipe Shot and Liquidation can critically Strike. Inteleon's Critical-Hit rate increases at levels 1 and 9. Critical hits deal 250% damage instead of 200%. At level 5, Inteleon gains 12.5% spell vamp (restores HP when dealing Special Attack damage).

skills.name: Sniper
skills.description: When this Pokémon stays near a wall for 1s it becomes camouflaged, making opposing Pokémon unable to target it, and starts gaining critical counters (up to a maximum of 3). A critical counter is gained as soon as Inteleon is camouflaged, with a new counter gained every 3s while camouflaged. Hitting any Pokémon prevents Inteleon from becoming camouflaged for 3s. When a critical counter is consumed, Inteleon's next attack or move that can critically strike is guaranteed to be a critical hit.

rsb.name: Sniper
rsb.true_desc: When this Pokémon stays near a wall for 1s it becomes camouflaged, making opposing Pokémon unable to target it, and starts gaining critical counters (up to a maximum of 3). While camouflaged, Inteleon is slowed by 10%. A critical counter is gained as soon as Inteleon is camouflaged, with a new counter gained every 3s while camouflaged. Dealing or receiving damage prevents Inteleon from starting to camouflage for 3s. When a critical counter is consumed, Inteleon's next attack or move that can critically strike is guaranteed to be a critical hit.
rsb.notes: Critical hits deal 250% rather than 200% damage.

skills.name: Attack
skills.description: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, dealing increased damage with an increased critical-hit rate.

rsb.name: Attack
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, dealing increased damage with 20% increased critical-hit rate.

skills.name: Tearful Look
skills.description: Decreases the Attack and Sp. Atk of the target Pokémon by 20% for 3s. Inteleon gains a critical counter and increases its movement speed.

rsb.name: Tearful Look
rsb.true_desc: Decreases the Attack and Sp. Atk of the target Pokémon by 20% for 3s. Inteleon gains a critical counter and increases its movement speed by 40% for 3s (decreasing over time).

rsb.name: Fell Stinger
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Inteleon fires a sharp stinger in the designated direction. The stinger stops at the first Pokémon hit or when it reaches a wall. Inteleon gains two critical counters if either a Pokémon is hit or a wall is hit. If it hits a Pokémon it deals damage. If it hits a wall, this move's cooldown is reduced by half and Inteleon is pulled to the wall and starts camouflaging.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Reduces this move's cooldown by 1s.

rsb.name: Acrobatics
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Inteleon glides in the designated direction. If it hits a Pokémon or a wall, it can glide in a designated direction a second time. If Inteleon hits a Pokémon while gliding, Inteleon deals damage to it and decreases its movement speed by 30% for 2s. Every time Inteleon glides in a designated direction, it gains a critical counter. If Inteleon bounces off a wall or Pokémon, Liquidation's current cooldown is reduced by 2s.
rsb.notes: This move can also be used while attacking with Liquidation.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases the first glide's travel distance.

rsb.name: Water Gun
rsb.label: Damage (x3)
rsb.true_desc: Inteleon squirts water, dealing damage to opposing Pokémon it hits.

rsb.name: Snipe Shot
rsb.label: Damage (Close)
rsb.true_desc: Inteleon aims for up to 6s and then fires, dealing damage to opposing Pokémon it hits while partially ignoring their Sp. Def. by 15%/20%/25% depending on distance (close, mid, far respectively). Aiming reduces the possible spread of the shot, reaching maximum precision after aiming for 1.25s. The farther away the user is from the Pokémon it hits, the more damage it does. A maximum of three uses can be kept in reserve for this move. There is a 1.5s cooldown between uses.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Reduces the cooldown for charges by 1s.

rsb.name: Liquidation
rsb.label: Damage (per bullet)
rsb.true_desc: Inteleon starts firing water projectiles at the designated Pokémon. Inteleon fires a total of 8 projectiles in 1.7s and is slowed by 60% while firing. Water projectiles can hit targets other than the designated Pokémon and only deal damage to the first Pokémon they hit. If this move hits the same Pokémon 5 times in a short time, Inteleon will deal 20% increased damage to this Pokémon for 3s.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases the number of projectiles shot during the duration to 10.

skills.name: Azure Spy Vision
skills.buffs: 20% Max HP Shield, 30% Movement Speed, 35% Attack Speed

rsb.name: Azure Spy Vision
rsb.true_desc: For 10.5s, Inteleon can see nearby Pokémon that are in stealth or hiding in tall grass.
rsb.notes: While active, also doubles Inteleon's critical-hit rate, and gives 1 critical counter per second.

name: Lapras

builds.name: Bubble Pulse
builds.explanation: Different kind of zoning compared to Ice Beam

notes: Only auto attacks can critically strike, but Lapras has 0% base Critical-Hit rate at all levels.

rsb.name: Shell Armor
rsb.true_desc: If Lapras would take a single instance of damage that would be greater than 10% of Lapras's maximum HP, this damage will be reduced by 20%.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, shooting water through the target and dealing increased damage to Pokémon hit by the spray. The boosted attack also heals Lapras.

rsb.name: Whirlpool
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Create a whirlpool centered on Lapras that lasts for 3s, dealing damage over time to opposing Pokémon in the area of effect. The time between hits is shorter the farther opposing Pokémon are from the whirlpool’s center.

rsb.name: Water Pulse
rsb.label: Damage (First Pulse)
rsb.true_desc: Release a pulse of water centered on itself that spreads out, dealing damage to Pokémon it hits and decreasing their movement speed by 30% for 2s. For each opposing Pokémon hit by a pulse from this move, an additional pulse will be released the next time this move is used within 8 seconds, up to a total of 3 pulses. If the first pulse after activating this move hits a Pokémon, the user’s next basic attack becomes a boosted attack.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases the maximum number of pulses to 4.

rsb.name: Perish Song
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Sing an eerie melody that echoes around yourself, dealing damage to opposing Pokémon it hits. This move can be used up to three times consecutively within 5s of its last use. Pokémon hit all three times take additional damage equal to one Perish Song hit. If the additional damage would bring an enemy Pokémon below 10% of their max HP, that enemy Pokémon will take 40% of their maximum HP as True Damage.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: The next basic attack after using this move becomes a boosted attack.

rsb.name: Ice Shard
rsb.label: Damage - per Chunk
rsb.true_desc: Hurl 5 chunks of ice in a forward direction, dealing damage to Pokémon they hit and leaving them frozen for 0.6s. If this move hits a Pokémon that is already frozen, it deals damage to it and shoves in the direction of the ice shards for 0.4s.

rsb.name: Bubble Beam
rsb.label: Shield
rsb.true_desc: Create a bubble shield on Lapras for up to 4s or until the shield is broken, then spray 5 bubbles with a beam in the designated direction. Pokémon hit by the bubbles take damage and are enveloped by it, leaving them unable to act for 1s. After the bubbles fly a set distance, they slowly float for 3s. Pokémon hit by a floating bubble are enveloped by it and left unable to act for 1s, but will not be damaged.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases the strength of the shield granted by this move.

rsb.name: Ice Beam
rsb.label: Damage - Beam
rsb.true_desc: Unleash an icy-cold beam of energy in the designated direction, dealing damage to Pokémon hit and freezing the ground for 3s. Pokémon on the frozen ground take damage equal to the beam's damage every 0.4s they remain on it and have their movement speed decreased by 15% for 2s stacking up to 6 times. Pokémon become frozen for 1s if they remain on the frozen ground for 3 ticks. When Lapras is on the frozen ground, Lapras's movement speed is increased by 20%, lingering for 0.5s if Lapras leaves the frozen ground.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increase the duration Pokémon are Frozen for to 1.5s.

skills.name: Lapras Express
skills.buffs: 20% Max HP Shield on activation, 40% Max HP shield and 30% Movement speed after stopping.

rsb.name: Lapras Express
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Ride a wave quickly and continuously forward becoming Unstoppable for up to 15s. Lapras’s movement speed increases every second while riding but decreases if the user hits an obstacle. If this move is used again, the user stops and launches a wave that continues moving forward, dealing damage to Pokémon it hits and throwing them for 1.5s. If the user hits an enemy Pokémon while still riding, the user stops in place, dealing damage to and throwing the opposing Pokémon for 1.5s. While the user is riding the wave, one nearby ally Pokémon of the user’s choice within range may be picked up and can ride on its back. Ally Pokémon riding on the user’s back can dismount whenever they choose.

name: Leafeon

builds.name: Razor Ace
builds.explanation: Any combination of the four items listed have pros and cons. Optimal will heavily depend on player preference and draft.

notes: Only auto attacks can critically strike. Leafeon's Critical-Hit rate increases at levels 5 and 9. When on a team with four other eeveelutions, gains +1% base Attack.

skills.name: Run Away
skills.description: Eevee has 10% increased movement speed when out of combat. (5s after leaving combat)
skills.passive2_description: While Leafeon is not in tall grass, the Chlorophyll gauge charges over 9s. When the gauge is full, Leafeon's movement speed is increased by 15%.

skills.name: Attack - Eevee
skills.description: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, dealing additional damage.
skills.basic2_description: When evolved, Leafeon can only access boosted attacks from Chlorophyll. When the Chlorophyll gauge is full, the next attack becomes a Chlorophyll boosted attack. This boosted attack leaps towards the target, dealing additional damage and slowing the Pokémon it hits by 30% for 2s.

rsb.name: Swift
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Launches three stars in the designated direction in a cone, dealing damage to enemies hit. The first star that hits applies a debuff that lasts 1 second that causes subsequent stars to deal 70% reduced damage.

rsb.name: Razor Leaf
rsb.label: Damage (Outgoing - First Leaf)
rsb.true_desc: Launches a fan of five sharp-edged leaves in the designated direction in a cone, dealing damage to enemies hit before sticking into the ground for 2.5s. If this move is activated again, the leaves return, dealing damage to Pokémon they hit along the way. If the reactivation time is 1s or longer, the leaves will return and deal increased damage. If the move is not reactivated, the leaves will automatically return dealing increased damage. If five leaves hit the same Pokémon (outgoing or incoming) within 0.5s, Leafeon is granted a shield lasting 1.5s. Leafeon also receives 20% increased movement speed for up to 3s while the leaves are out. Each fan, the first leaf that hits applies a debuff that lasts 1s and causes subsequent leaves within the same fan (outgoing or incoming) to deal 70% reduced damage.
rsb.add2_label: Damage (Automatic return first Leaf or Manual return first Leaf if after 1s)
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increase the strength of the shield when five leaves hit.

rsb.name: Solar Blade
rsb.label: Damage (1st Level Charge)
rsb.true_desc: Start gathering light and filling a blade with the light's energy. If this move is used again after light has been gathered, Leafeon brings the blade down in the designated direction, dealing damage to Pokémon it hits. The longer the blade is filled with light energy, the more damage is dealt. If this move is used when the Chlorophyll gauge is full, the blade is brought down immediately, dealing maximum damage and the cooldown for the next use of this move is reduced by 50%. The cooldown of this move is also reduced by 50% upon the Chlorophyll gauge being filled.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: While charging, Leafeon receives 40% damage reduction.

rsb.name: Quick Attack
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Dash in a direction, dealing damage to enemies hit.

rsb.name: Aerial Ace
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Dash in a direction, dealing damage to enemies hit. The next attack is a boosted attack non-Chlorophyll empowered. A maximum of two uses may be kept in reserve for this move and cannot be used more than once every 0.5s.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Reduces the cooldown for charges by 0.5s.

rsb.name: Leaf Blade
rsb.label: Damage (Inner Ring x3)
rsb.true_desc: Dash and spin in a direction, slashing around itself and with a ring of sharp leaves, dealing damage three times. Enemies caught by the outside edge of the ring of sharp leaves take increased damage and are slowed by 40% for 2s. Enemies damaged by the outside edge also charge the Chlorophyll gauge by 1s per hit.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Reduces this move's cooldown by 1.2s for each hit dealing damage to more than one enemy on the outer ring

skills.name: Emerald Two-Step
skills.buffs: 80% Movement Speed, 20% Max HP Shield

rsb.name: Emerald Two-Step
rsb.label: Damage (Initial leap)
rsb.true_desc: Leaps at a designated enemy, dealing damage to them and all enemies around them. These Pokémon are additionally slowed by 50% for 2s. After the initial leap, Leafeon leaps up and lands with force dealing damage to enemies in an area. Enemies hit by this area take more damage the closer they are to the center of this area. Leafeon is unstoppable during this move.

name: Lucario

builds.name: Extreme Rush
builds.explanation: Pokémon are generally built tankier where Muscle Band has become more mandatory over Razor Claw and Charging Charm as options

notes: Only auto attacks can critically strike. Lucario's Critical-Hit rate increases at levels 5 and 9.

skills.name: Steadfast
skills.description: While at low HP, gain a shield and increased movement speed. (30s cooldown)

rsb.name: Steadfast
rsb.label: Shield
rsb.true_desc: When at 50% max HP or below, grants this Pokémon a shield and increases their movement speed by 20% for 5s (60s CD).

skills.name: Attack
skills.description: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, performing a combo attack with a bone. Deals damage to enemies in the area of effect and throws them.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Becomes a boosted attack with increased range every third attack, damaging opposing Pokémon with a normal basic attack, then following up with a combo attack using a bone, damaging opposing Pokémon in the area a second time and throwing them for 0.5s.

skills.name: Quick Attack
skills.description: Has the user lunge forward at a speed that makes it almost invisible, dealing damage to enemies it comes in contact with.

rsb.name: Quick Attack
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: The user dashes forward, damaging opposing Pokémon hit.

upgrades.name: Extreme Speed
upgrades.description1: Charge forward with breathtaking speed. If this move hits an enemy from point-blank range, its cooldown is reset and it restores the user's HP. However, the cooldown cannot be continually reset by using this move on the same enemy multiple times in succession.
upgrades.description2: Increases Attack for a short time when this move is used.

rsb.name: Extreme Speed
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: The user dashes forward, damaging opposing Pokémon and restoring the user's HP for each opposing Pokémon hit. The user can use a unique auto attack immediately at the end of the dash, dealing damage to opposing Pokémon in an area around them.
rsb.notes: After learning this move, nearby opposing Pokémon have an Extreme Speed marker automatically applied to them. The first opposing Pokémon with a marker hit by Extreme Speed's dash will reset this move's cooldown and have their marker removed. There is a 10s cooldown before a target can have an Extreme Speed marker automatically applied to them again (apart from other moves).
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases the user's Attack by 7.5% for 2s when this move is used.

upgrades.name: Power-Up Punch
upgrades.description1: Charges power before unleashing a powerful attack. While the user is charging power, its movement speed is decreased but its Attack slowly increases and the damage it receives is reduced. The user then charges in the designated direction and releases this move, dealing more damage the lower the enemies remaining HP is. The next basic attack becomes a boosted attack if the move hits. This move's cooldown is reduced every time one of the user's moves hits.
upgrades.description2: Become immune to hindrances while charging power.

rsb.name: Power-Up Punch
rsb.label: Damage - Uncharged
rsb.true_desc: The user receives 30% reduced damage and decreases their movement speed by 15% as they charge up power for up to 4s, reaching maximum charge after 1s; then dashes forward with a devastating punch when released, damaging the first opposing Pokémon hit, dealing additional missing HP damage to the target and shoving them for 0.5s. If this move hits, the user readies a boosted attack. This move's cooldown is reduced by 1s each time one of the user's moves lands a hit. If this move is canceled or not released after 4s, it goes on a 1.4s cooldown.
rsb.notes: Against wild Pokémon: additional missing HP damage is capped at 1000.
rsb.add2_true_desc: 10% of Enemy Missing HP (caps at 1000 dmg).
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Becomes unstoppable while charging this move.

skills.name: Meteor Mash
skills.description: Blast forward with a punch like a comet, dealing damage to enemies and shoving them.

rsb.name: Meteor Mash
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: The user punches with the force of a meteor in the designated direction, damaging opposing Pokémon hit and shoving them.

upgrades.name: Bone Rush
upgrades.description1: Performs a combo attack with a bone, dealing multiple damaging blows to enemies and shoving them. The final attack sends the bone flying. If used again while the bone is traveling, the user rushes to the location of the bone, dealing damage to nearby enemies.
upgrades.description2: Using this move again will reset the cooldown for Extreme Speed or Power-Up Punch.

rsb.name: Bone Rush
rsb.label: Damage - per Hit (4-7 Hits)
rsb.true_desc: The user rapidly strikes with a bone 3 times in the designated direction, damaging opposing Pokémon within melee range around Lucario, and in the area of the bone strikes in front; opposing Pokémon can be damaged twice per hit by being in the area directly in front of Lucario, where the bone strikes overlap with the attacks within melee range. The user then throws the bone flying to land a short distance away, shoving opposing Pokémon. This move can be used again to dash to the bone then catch it, damaging nearby opposing Pokémon when the bone is grabbed.
rsb.notes: Landing one of the three initial strikes on opposing Pokémon applies an Extreme Speed marker to them.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Catching the bone with the second use resets the cooldown of Extreme Speed or Power-Up Punch.

upgrades.name: Close Combat
upgrades.description1: Unleash a combo attack, dealing multiple blows to enemies and shoving them.
upgrades.description2: Increased damage.

rsb.name: Close Combat
rsb.label: Damage - per Hit (11 Hits)
rsb.true_desc: The user becomes unstoppable and rapidly punches in the designated direction, damaging opposing Pokémon in the area in front of them (up to 11 times), and restoring the user's HP each time this move hits.
rsb.notes: The next auto attack within 5s after using this move gains increased range and causes the user to lunge at an opposing Pokémon with a kick.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases the damage of this move.

skills.name: Aura Cannon
skills.buffs: 30% Movement Speed, 30% CDR, 20% Max HP Shield
skills.description: Deals damage to enemies in the area of effect. Increases the damage dealt by the user's next Power-Up Punch after using this move.

rsb.name: Aura Cannon
rsb.label: Damage - per Tick
rsb.true_desc: The user becomes unstoppable and channels aura into a huge sphere, then launches the sphere in the designated direction, dealing damage to opposing Pokémon in its path. The aura sphere picks up speed as it travels; at close range, a target can be hit up to 4 times, while at max speed a target will only be hit once.
rsb.notes: If the user learned Extreme Speed, targets hit by this Unite Move have an Extreme Speed marker applied to them. If the user learned Power-Up Punch, this Unite Move strengthens the damage of the next attack of Power-Up Punch by roughly 20% and the shove duration to 1s.

name: Machamp

builds.name: Dynamic Combat
builds.explanation: Machamp very much prefers flat attack as it's attack steroids are % hence Attack Weight's importance. Amp can be dropped for Razor Claw instead to fortify the previous statement. Amp's combination of cdr and unite recharge pushes a bracer+Amp build variation to be more move focused.

notes: Only auto attacks and Cross Chop can critically strike. Machamp's Critical-Hit rate increases at levels 5 and 9.

skills.name: Guts
skills.description: Increases Attack when afflicted by a status condition.

rsb.name: Guts
rsb.true_desc: Increases Attack by 10% for 5s when afflicted by any debuff.

skills.name: Attack
skills.description: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, dealing increased damage when it hits. This boosted attack also decreases the movement speed of enemies for a short time.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, dealing increased damage when it hits. This boosted attack also decreases the movement speed of enemies by 50% for 1s.

skills.name: Karate Chop
skills.description: Attack opposing Pokémon with a sharp chop.

rsb.name: Karate Chop
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Machamp attacks in a straight line dealing damage to enemies hit.

upgrades.name: Close Combat
upgrades.description1: Unleash a series of punches in the designated direction, dealing increased damage with the last punch. The user can move while using this move and becomes immune to hindrances.
upgrades.description2: Deals increased damage to enemies that are afflicted by a status condition.

rsb.name: Close Combat
rsb.label: Damage - per Hit (4 hits)
rsb.true_desc: Machamp unleashes a barrage of blows in a targeted direction for 1s, hitting multiple times and finishing with a single large strike. Machamp is unstoppable for the duration and can move while using Close Combat.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Deals 25% additional damage if the target is affected by a status condition.

upgrades.name: Cross Chop
upgrades.description1: Has the user deliver a double chop with forearms crossed while dashing forward. This increases the user's critical-hit rate.
upgrades.description2: Increases Attack with each basic attack, up to a set max.

rsb.name: Cross Chop
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Machamp dashes forward, dealing damage to enemies hit. Cross Chop may critically hit and has a 5% higher Critical-Hit Rate. Cross Chop further increases Critical-Hit Rate by 5% for 3s on hit.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Machamp’s auto attacks increases Atk by 2 per target hit, permanently stacking up to 40 times.

skills.name: Bulk Up
skills.description: Become immune to hindrances for a short time. Increases movement speed, basic attack speed, and Attack. The next basic attack also becomes a boosted attack.

rsb.name: Bulk Up
rsb.true_desc: Machop buffs themselves for 3s becoming unstoppable, increasing attack by 15%, attack speed by 40% and movement speed by 30% inititally, diminishing gradually every 1s. Machop's next attack is boosted.

upgrades.name: Dynamic Punch
upgrades.description1: Jump to the designated location, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and leaving them unable to act when it hits. After using this move, the user becomes immune to hindrances, their movement speed and basic attack speed is increased. The next basic attack also becomes a boosted attack.
upgrades.description2: Increased Attack and movement speed.

rsb.name: Dynamic Punch
rsb.label: Damage - per Tick (4 Ticks)
rsb.true_desc: Machamp jumps to target location, becoming unstoppable for 0.5s, stunning enemies hit for 0.5s, slowing them by 40% for 3s, and dealing damage four times in quick succession to the landing radius. Machamp’s Attack is increased by 15% for 5s and gains bonus movement speed of 40% diminishing by 20% over 3s when using Dynamic Punch. Machamp’s next auto attack is boosted.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Further increases movement speed by 30%, Attack bonus by 5%, and slow by 20%.

upgrades.name: Submission
upgrades.description1: Increases movement speed and become immune to hindrances. When the next basic attack hits, the attack deals increased damage and slams the enemy onto the ground, leaving it unable to act. Once this move ends, the user's critical-hit rate and basic attack speed are increased for a short time.
upgrades.description2: Increased critical-hit rate and basic attack speed.

rsb.name: Submission
rsb.label: Damage (2x)
rsb.true_desc: Machamp becomes unstoppable for 5s and gains 70% increased movement speed (diminishing every 1s by 20%) or until the next auto attack. Machamp’s next auto attack during submission is enhanced, hitting twice and slamming the target down behind Machamp. If this attack hits, Machamp also gains 5% increased Critical-Hit Rate and 40% Attack Speed for 3s.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Further increases Critical-Hit Rate by 5% and Attack Speed by 10%.

skills.name: Barrage Blow
skills.buffs: 30% Movement Speed, 35% Attack Speed, 20% Max HP Shield
skills.description: Increases Machamp's movement speed by 5%, Attack by 30%, Defense by 200, and Sp. Defense by 200 for 10s. If used again, unleash a combo attack, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and shoving them. The final blow deals double the damage of the previous hits.

rsb.name: Barrage Blow
rsb.label: Damage (6x)
rsb.true_desc: Machamp gains increased movement speed by 10%, Attack by 25%, Defense by 250, and Sp. Defense by 250 for 8s before unleashing an unstoppable combo attack that continuously shoves enemies in the area of effect.

name: Mamoswine

builds.name: Ice Quake
builds.explanation: Other valuable third items include Rapid Fire Scarf for faster freezes, Buddy Barrier for generic ally shielding, Assault Vest into match ups where enemy has high special damage, Leftovers so that support recovery is not always tied up with Mamoswine.

builds.name: Icicle Quake
builds.explanation: Other valuable third items include Rapid Fire Scarf for faster freezes, Buddy Barrier for generic ally shielding, Assault Vest into match ups where enemy has high special damage, Leftovers so that support recovery is not always tied up with Mamoswine.

notes: Only auto attacks can critically strike, but Mamoswine has 0% base Critical-Hit rate at all levels.

skills.name: Thick Fat
skills.description: When Mamoswine deals damage, Defense and Sp. Def are increased for 3s, stacking up to 3 times. When Mamoswine uses Ice Shard, Icicle Crash or Ice Fang, the next basic attack is boosted. If any of these moves creates a freezing area of effect inside an ally goal zone, the goal-scoring speed of enemies is decreased.

rsb.name: Thick Fat
rsb.label: Defense & Sp. Defense
rsb.true_desc: When Mamoswine deals damage, Defense and Sp. Def are increased for 5s, stacking up to 3 times. When Mamoswine uses Ice Shard, Icicle Crash or Ice Fang, the next auto attack is boosted. If any of these moves creates a freezing area of effect inside an ally goal zone, the goal-scoring speed of enemies is decreased by 30% for 5s.

skills.name: Attack
skills.description: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, dealing damage and freezing enemies for a short time when it hits. Mamoswine's basic attacks deal increased damage for a short time to enemies recently frozen with one of Mamoswine's moves.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, dealing damage and freezing enemies for 0.5s when it hits. Mamoswine's auto attacks deal increased damage for a short time to enemies recently frozen with one of Mamoswine's moves.

skills.name: Ice Shard
skills.description: Hurls 3 chunks of ice at the designated location, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and decreasing their movement speed for a short time. If an enemy is hit by all three chunks, they're left frozen for a short time.

rsb.name: Ice Shard
rsb.label: Damage - per Shard (3 shards)
rsb.true_desc: Hurls 3 chunks of ice at the designated location, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and decreasing their movement speed by 40% for 1.5s. If an enemy is hit by all three chunks, they're left frozen for 0.5s.

upgrades.name: Icicle Crash
upgrades.description1: Drops icicles on the designated location, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and decreasing their movement speed for a short time. The final icicle shatters after a set amount of time or when hit by Mamoswine's other moves or boosted attacks, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and leaving them frozen. If the icicle is shattered by Tackle or High Horsepower, the ground is covered in ice, which increases the movement speed of allies that run over it. The next basic attack is boosted.
upgrades.description2: The final icicle leaves enemies hit unable to act for a short time.

rsb.name: Icicle Crash
rsb.label: Damage - Small Icicles (3x)
rsb.true_desc: Drops icicles on the designated location, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and decreasing their movement speed by 35% for 0.2s. The final icicle shatters after 1s or when hit by Mamoswine's other moves or boosted attacks, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and leaving them frozen for 1.5s if the icicle was shattered by Mamoswine, or 1s if it shattered on its own. If the icicle is shattered by Tackle or High Horsepower, the ground is covered in ice, which increases the movement speed of allies that run over it by 50%. The next auto attack is boosted.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: The final icicle leaves enemies hit unable to act for .2s.

upgrades.name: Ice Fang
upgrades.description1: Uses cold-infused fangs to throw the opposing Pokémon closest to the user, dealing damage and leaving them frozen for a short time. The user can then designate a direction to slam the thrown Pokémon forward or backward, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and leaving them frozen for a short time. The next basic attack is boosted.
upgrades.description2: Increases the area of effect in which enemies are left frozen after the slam attack.

rsb.name: Ice Fang
rsb.label: Damage - First Hit
rsb.true_desc: Uses cold-infused fangs to throw the enemy closest to Mamoswine, dealing damage and grabbing them, rendering them unable to act. Mamoswine can then designate a direction to slam the thrown Pokémon forward or backward, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and freezing them. The thrown Pokémon is frozen for 1s, and surrounding enemies are frozen for 1.5s. The next auto attack is boosted.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases the area of effect in which enemies are left frozen after the slam attack.

skills.name: Tackle
skills.description: Mamoswine rushes recklessly in the designated direction, dealing damage to enemies they hit and throws them in the air.

rsb.name: Tackle
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Mamoswine rushes recklessly in the designated direction; dealing damage to enemies hit and throws them in the air for 0.5s.

upgrades.name: High Horsepower
upgrades.description1: Mamoswine rushes recklessly in the designated direction, dealing damage to enemies they hit and shove them. Mamoswine then stomps their feet, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and leaves them unable to act for a short time. This stomping deals increased damage to frozen enemies.
upgrades.description2: Increases the reckless rush's speed and the length of time enemies are left unable to act.

rsb.name: High Horsepower
rsb.label: Damage - Charge
rsb.true_desc: Mamoswine rushes recklessly in the designated direction, dealing damage to enemies they hit and shoving them for 0.55s. Mamoswine then stomps their feet, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and leaves them unable to act for 0.35s. This stomping deals increased damage to frozen enemies.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases the reckless rush's speed and the length of time enemies are left unable to act by .2s.

upgrades.name: Earthquake
upgrades.description1: Mamoswine leaps up in the designated direction and lands forcefully, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and pulling them toward Mamoswine.
upgrades.description2: Decreases the movement speed of enemies for a short time when this move hits and increases the move's pulling power.

rsb.name: Earthquake
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Mamoswine leaps up in the designated direction and lands forcefully, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and pulling them toward Mamoswine. Enemies that are hit cannot act for 1.5s.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Decreases movement speed of enemies by 30% for 2.5s when this move hits and increases the move's pulling power.

skills.name: Mammoth Mash
skills.buffs: 30% Movement Speed, 40% Max HP Shield
skills.description: Mamoswine jumps to the designated location and becomes immune to hindrances - then repeatedly stomps the ground, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and decreases their movement speed for a short time with each stomp. The final stomp throws enemies in the air.

rsb.name: Mammoth Mash
rsb.label: Damage - First Stomp
rsb.true_desc: Mamoswine jumps to the designated location then repeatedly stomps the ground four times, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and decreases their movement speed for 0.5s with each stomp. The first stomp slows enemies by 30%, the two mini stomps slow them by 20%, and the final stomp slows them by 40% and throws them in the air for 1.5s. Mamoswine is unstoppable for the duration of the move.

name: Meowscarada

builds.name: Night Blaze
builds.explanation: Aeos Cookie may be used for a more brawl heavy set. Shedinja Doll may be used as an alternate battle item

notes: Only auto attacks can critically strike. Meowscarada's Critical-Hit rate increases at levels 5 and 9.

rsb.name: Overgrow
rsb.true_desc: When the user is at 50% max HP or less, if they would take damage they instead disappear into leaves, becoming invincible for 0.3s and invisible for 1.5s or until attacking (60s CD). This effect also increases the user's movement speed by 15%, damage by 15% and heals by 15% of the damage dealt for 4s.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Gains a boosted attack every 5 seconds that leaps towards the target dealing additional damage.

rsb.name: Leafage
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Launch 4 leaves that deal damage to enemies hit and decrease their movement speed by 50% for 2.5s. When an enemy is hit by a leaf, subsequent leaves deal 20% reduced damage.

rsb.name: Flower Trick
rsb.label: Damage - Explosion Base
rsb.true_desc: Attach a flower bomb to an enemy that lasts up to 5s. This move can be used again to detonate the flower bomb at will. When it explodes it deals damage and additional damage equal to 18% of the target's missing HP. Against Wild Pokémon: The additional damage from missing HP is capped at 1000. If an enemy that has a flower bomb attached to them is damaged by Meowscarada, the explosion's area of effect and damage are increased. If the explosion knocks out an enemy player with this move, the move's cooldown is reset.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases the range of application and explosion's area of effect. Also increases movement speed when planting the seed by 30% for 3s diminishing by 10% every 1s.

rsb.name: Night Slash
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: The users throws 3 slashing waves with their claws, dealing damage and applying a mark for 5s to enemies hit. Subsequent waves deal 50% damage of the first. Basic attacks by Meowscarada have 50% increased critical-hit rate on marked enemies. When Meowscarada deals damage to marked enemies with basic attacks, this move's cooldown is reduced by 0.5s and Meowscarada recovers HP. The HP recovery works in a cycle of 3 basic attacks; the first attack will heal 100% of the ratio, the second 50% and the third 10%, then the fourth will heal 100% of the ratio again.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases the critical-hit rate on marked enemies to a 65% increase and restores additional HP from hitting marked targets.

rsb.name: Hone Claws
rsb.label: Damage - Additional
rsb.true_desc: Dash in a designated direction while sharpening claws, increasing attack speed by 80% and increasing the damage of the next three basic attacks for 3s.

rsb.name: Double Team
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Dash and create an illusory copy in order to befuddle enemies. The clone has the same HP and defenses as Meowscarada but takes 30% more damage and lasts for 3.3s. If this move is used again, the user swaps places with the illusory copy, dispelling the copy and creating an explosion of petals at both the clone and Meowscarada's positions that deal damage and leave enemies hit unable to act for 0.8s. Enemies may only take damage from one petal explosion. If the clone's HP were to reach 0 before a swap, the same type of petal explosion occurs at the clone's location only. Creating the clone also increases Meowscarada's movement speed by 70% for 3s diminishing by 10% every 0.5s. Cooldown starts when first used.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases the duration of the clone to 4.6s and sets the increased damage the clone receives to 20%.

rsb.name: Trailblaze
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Leap to the designated location, dealing damage to enemies hit and leaving them paralyzed, decreasing their attack speed by 40% and movement speed by 40% for 2s. If Meowscarada hits enemies with this move, Meowscarada's basic attack speed is increased by 100% for 4s and movement speed is increased by 60% for 4s diminishing by 5% every 0.5s down to minimum of 35%. When used from tall grass, this move's leap range increases. If Meowscarada knocks out an enemy player or makes an assist, this move's cooldown is reset.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Grants a shield that lasts 3 seconds when used.

skills.name: Floral Flourish
skills.buffs: 80% Movement Speed, 20% Max HP Shield

rsb.name: Floral Flourish
rsb.label: Damage - per tick
rsb.true_desc: Move instantly to the designated location, creating a whirlwind around Meowscarada for 3s that continually deals damage to enemies every 0.25s, up to 13 times. During the blink, Meowsacarda is Invincible. Then, Meowscarada will slowly walk forward with the storm. While using this move, the user cannot use other attacks or change directions without the use of Eject Button, and the move can be stopped if it is used again. Hits on enemy Pokémon reduce the cooldown of Night Slash and Flower Trick by 1 second per enemy hit.

name: Metagross

builds.name: Gyro Zen
builds.explanation: Muscle Band or Razor claw may be used in place of Weakness Policy

builds.name: Meteor Zen
builds.explanation: Resonant Guard, Focus Band or Aeos Cookie may also be used as a defensive item over Weakness Policy.

notes: Only auto attacks and the additional damage from Iron Defense can critically strike. Metagross's Critical-Hit rate increases at levels 5 and 9.

rsb.name: Clear Body
rsb.true_desc: Reduces the duration of hindrance effects by 10% when enemy players are nearby. The more enemy players there are, the more the hindrance effects are reduced, up to a maximum of 5 enemy players (50% max).

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, striking with an increased area of attack. When a boosted attack hits, the cooldown of Iron Defense, Meteor Mash or Gyro Ball is reduced by 10%. If multiple targets are hit, the cooldown is instead reduced by 20%.

rsb.name: Iron Defense
rsb.label: Shield
rsb.true_desc: Gain a shield lasting 5s and gain a boosted attack. That boosted attack deals additional damage.

rsb.name: Meteor Mash
rsb.label: Shield (per charge stack)
rsb.true_desc: The user charges power in their fist, dealing damage to enemies in an area up to 4x and slowing them by 20% for 3s while granting the user a shield for 5s. Enemies may dodge the charging damage by moving out of the area. The more enemies that this move hits, the more shield the user gains (stacking up to 8 times) and the more damage is dealt with the next basic attack. The next basic attack hits with a hard punch fired like a meteor, dealing damage to enemies in an area of effect. The level of charge depends on how many hits were made during the charging.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Restores HP when the punch hits enemies.

rsb.name: Gyro Ball
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Spin rapidly, dealing damage to nearby enemies. Hitting enemies with the outer edge of the spin grants a shield to the user for 4s. The shield stacks based on the number of targets hit up to a maximum of 6 times, with wild Pokémon granting 1 stack and enemy players granting 3 stacks.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: On expiration of shield duration, converts 30% of the remaining shield to healing.

rsb.name: Tackle
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Scan in a designated direction. If the scan hits an enemy, the user then charges toward the enemy hit, dealing damage.

rsb.name: Zen Headbutt
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Fires a psychic wave in a designated direction. If the move hits an enemy, the user then charges toward the enemy hit, dealing damage and throwing them for 0.8s.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: After dealing damage with Zen Headbutt, reduce incoming damage by 20% for 2s.

rsb.name: Magnet Rise
rsb.label: Damage - Grounding
rsb.true_desc: Levitates for up to 4s using electrically-generated magnetism, increasing the user's movement speed by 60% diminishing by 15% every second. If a basic attack is made while levitating, the user will fall to the ground forcefully, dealing damage to nearby enemies and knocking them up for 0.6s. This basic attack can lunge at a target crossing terrain and obstacles.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: While levitating, reduce incoming damage by 30%.

skills.name: Compute and Crush
skills.buffs: 30% Movement Speed, 30% CDR, 30% Max HP Shield

rsb.name: Compute and Crash
rsb.label: Damage (2 punches)
rsb.true_desc: Quickly analyzes the position of nearby enemies, granting a shield based on the number of enemies analyzed and become unstoppable. When 2 or fewer enemies are analyzed, lunge towards the enemy with the lowest HP, leaving it unable to act for 0.8s and dealing damage to it thrice, with the third hit dealing damage based on the target's missing HP. If an enemy is knocked out by this move, the user recovers 30% of its Unite Move gauge. If there are three or more analyzed, lunge toward the enemy with the lowest HP, dealing damage to nearby enemies and creating a wall around the user. If a wall is created, Compute and Crash may be used again to take down the wall.

name: Mew

builds.name: Items Only
builds.explanation: This set focuses heavily on use of Coaching

notes: Only basic attacks can critically strike (not boosted attacks), but Mew has 0% base Critical-Hit rate at all levels. At level 9, Mew gains 12.5% spell vamp (restores HP when dealing Special Attack damage).

skills.name: Synchronize
skills.description: Each time Mew uses a move, Mew and nearby allies have their movement speed increased by 15% for 2s.
skills.passive2_description: When Mew reaches level 5, the Move Reset icon can be used to reset Mew's moves and learn new moves. This ability goes on a 25s cooldown after it's used. Each time Mew knocks out or makes an assist on an enemy player, or scores a goal, the Move Reset cooldown is reduced (Knockout: 40%, Assist: 20%, Goal: 5%). Using Move Reset adds 5000 Unite Move energy to Mystical Mirage.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Each time Mew uses a move, they gain a boost counter. A maximum of 3 boost counters can be stored. After 3 counters are stored (they have to be consumed within 8s or they disappear), Mew's next basic attack becomes a boosted attack that consumes all counters and launches a ball of psychic energy at an enemy. During the lock-on animation Mew can use moves. The further the ball travels, the more damage it deals (4% more damage per threshold, stacking additively). This ball pierces through wild Pokémon, but will stop traveling upon contact with the first enemy player.

rsb.name: Electro Ball
rsb.label: Damage (No Light Screen Boost)
rsb.true_desc: Hurl an electric orb, dealing damage to enemies in the area-of-effect and leaving them paralyzed (40% slow) for 2s. This move deals more damage the lower the enemies' remaining HP is.
rsb.notes: Through Light Screen: Damage dealt and area-of-effect radius are increased.
rsb.add2_true_desc: 9% of enemy missing HP. Against Wild Pokemon: The execute damage is capped at 1200.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Strengthens the effect of the paralysis inflicted by this move to 60%.

rsb.name: Solar Beam
rsb.label: Damage - per Tick
rsb.true_desc: Blast a bundled beam of light, dealing damage 3 times to enemies in the area-of-effect. If this move hits an enemy, Mew gains an additional boost counter.
rsb.notes: Through Light Screen: Damage dealt and area-of-effect radius are increased.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Reduce this move's cooldown by 0.5s for each enemy hit.

rsb.name: Surf
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Charge forward on a wave, shoving enemies for 0.5s and leaving them unable to act for 0.5s. Mew gains a shield for 3s and becomes immune to hindrances while using this move. At the end of this move, Mew can jump in a designated direction and becomes immune to hindrances for a short time. If this move hits an enemy, Mew gains an additional boost counter.
rsb.notes: Through Light Screen: Distance the wave travels is increased and Light Screen attaches to Mew.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Strengthens the shield effect of this move.

rsb.name: Coaching
rsb.label: Shield
rsb.true_desc: Teleport to an ally, granting them a shield for 3s and increasing basic attack speed by 40% for 2s. If this move is used on an ally who hasn't been coached within 7s, the cooldown of this move is reduced by 90%. If this move is used on an ally who has been recently coached, this move goes on cooldown. The cooldown of Electro Ball, Solar Beam, and Surf is reduced by 1s each time this move is used.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Reduce this move's cooldown by 1s and reduces the timer of recently coached on allies to 6s.

rsb.name: Light Screen
rsb.true_desc: Create a translucent wall in the designated location for 4s that prevents enemies from passing and shoves them for 0.5s if they make contact with the wall. If Mew's Electro Ball, Solar Beam, or Surf passes through the wall, the effects of those moves will be enhanced (such as increased damage, range, and area-of-effect). If this move is used again within 4s, the wall is pulled towards Mew and follows them as they move for an additional 4s. While the wall moves with Mew, enemy attacks that pass through it will deal 25% reduced damage but will not prevent enemies from passing and does not shove them anymore.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases the size of the wall.

rsb.name: Agility
rsb.true_desc: Move quickly in a designated direction, increasing Mew's movement speed by 5% for 2s. Holds 2 uses in reserve and cannot be used more than once every 2s.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases the distance Mew moves in the designated direction.

skills.name: Mystical Mirage
skills.buffs: 30% Movement Speed, 30% CDR, 20% Max HP Shield

rsb.name: Mystical Mirage
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Mew becomes unstoppable and floats in the air for 1s, then becoming invincible and invisible for up to 6s until using an attack or move. A field is created around Mew for 5s This field travels with Mew. Mew and all allies within the area become stealthed for 4s. After the field expires, this move deals damage to enemies within the area-of-effect.

name: MewtwoX
notes: Only auto attacks can critically strike. Mewtwo's Critical-Hit rate increases at 5 and 9.

skills.name: Pressure
skills.description: When Mewtwo deals damage to an opposing Pokémon with a basic attack, the Mega gauge increases. Each time the Mega gauge increases, Mewtwo attack is increased by 2% and its Defense and Sp. Def are increased by 2%, up to 10 times. If Mewtwo is Lv. 5 or higher, and the Mega gauge has stacked at least 9 times, it Mega Evolves. The Mega Evolution lasts 15s and increases Mewtwo attack by an additional 10%, Defense and Sp. Def by an additional 10%, its max HP by 10% and its movement speed by 5%.

rsb.name: Pressure
rsb.true_desc: When Mewtwo deals damage to enemy players with a basic attack, the Mega gauge increases up to 8 times. As the Mega gauge increases, Mewtwo's Attack, Defense, and Sp. Def are increased by 2%, up to 10 times. If Mewtwo is level 5 or higher, and the Mega gauge has increased at least 8 times, it Mega Evolves. The Mega Evolution lasts 10s and increases Mewtwo's Attack by an additional 10%, its Defense and Sp. Def by an additional 10%, its max HP by 10% and its movement speed by 5%, and has a fixed attack speed.
rsb.notes: Consumes up to 30 Aeos Energy upon Mega Evolving. Mega Evolution duration is extended by 1 second for every 5 energy consumed. Energy is consumed regardless if you have the next multiple of 5.

skills.name: Attack
skills.description: When Mewtwo Mega Evolves, deal increased damage and becomes a boosted attack with every third attack.

rsb.name: Attack
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: When Mewtwo Mega Evolves, deal increased damage and becomes a boosted attack with every third attack.

rsb.name: Confusion
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Deal damage to an enemy and leave them unable to act for 1s.

rsb.name: Future Sight
rsb.label: Damage - Pull and Explosion
rsb.true_desc: Mewtwo pulls the designated enemy toward itself dealing damage, leaving them unable to act for 0.75s and locking on to them. The locked-on enemy has their movement speed decreased by 25% for 3s and takes 20% increased damage from Mewtwo. After 3s, Mewtwo deals damage to the locked-on enemy a second time, and additional damage equal to 50% of any damage they received from Mewtwo while locked-on.
rsb.notes: Against Enemy Players: Maximum damage is capped at 2000.
rsb.add1_true_desc: 50% of damage dealt while target is locked-on
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: The locked-on enemy instead takes 30% increased damage.

rsb.name: Psystrike
rsb.label: Damage (x5)
rsb.true_desc: Mewtwo becomes unstoppable and starts directing psychic waves at the designated enemy, each hit dealing damage and decreasing their movement speed by 10% for 1s, stacking up to 5 times. While Mewtwo is directing psychic waves, it takes 15% reduced damage. At the end of the move, Mewtwo sends a final hit, dealing damage to the designated enemy and nearby enemies then throws them for 1s.
rsb.notes: If Psystrike is intercepted by an enemy that isn't the intended target, there's no explosion and the enemy hit is shoved instead.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Movement speed reduction on enemies is increased to 15% for 1s, stacking up to 5 times.

rsb.name: Barrier
rsb.label: Shield
rsb.true_desc: Mewtwo gains a shield for 3s. While the shield effect is active, its movement speed is increased by 20%.

rsb.name: Recover
rsb.label: Shield
rsb.true_desc: Mewtwo gains a shield for 3s. While the shield effect is active, movement speed is increased by 30%, and Mewtwo recovers HP equal to 20% of all incoming damage received from enemies while the shield is active. When Mewtwo takes enough damage for the shield effect to be removed, all of the user's move cooldowns are reduced by 25% of their current cooldown, and the Mega gauge increases twice.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases the amount of HP recovered to 30% of incoming damage received.

rsb.name: Teleport
rsb.true_desc: Mewtwo teleports to the designated location. For 5s, movement speed is increased by 10%, Mewtwo deals 10% more damage, and the Mega gauge increases 50% faster.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Damage dealt is increased to 15%.

skills.name: Infinite Psyburn
skills.buffs: 30% Movement Speed, 30% CDR, 20% Max HP Shield

rsb.name: Infinite Psyburn
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Mewtwo becomes unstoppable while revealing enemy players and channeling a powerful attack on the enemies' current position. After 1s, Mewtwo brings down a powerful psychic beam on their original position, dealing damage to enemies around each point of impact, leaving them unable to act for 1s and decreasing their Defense by 20% for 3s. Each Pokémon can only be hit by 1 psychic beam.

name: MewtwoY

builds.name: Psystrike Teleport
builds.explanation: Mewtwo Y's biggest hurdle is damaging high sustain and healing since it cannot critically strike.

builds.name: Psystrike Teleport
builds.explanation: Mewtwo Y's biggest hurdle is damaging high sustain and healing since it cannot critically strike.

builds.name: Future Teleport
builds.explanation: Mewtwo Y's biggest hurdle is damaging high sustain and healing since it cannot critically strike.

notes: Only auto attacks can critically strike, but Mewtwo has 0% base Critical-Hit rate at all levels. At level 5, Mewtwo gains 12.5% spell vamp (restores HP when dealing Special Attack damage).

rsb.name: Pressure
rsb.true_desc: When Mewtwo deals damage to enemy players with a basic attack, the Mega gauge increases up to 12 times. As the Mega gauge increases, Mewtwo's Sp. Atk is increased by 1.5%, and attack speed is increased by 6%, up to 10 times. If Mewtwo is level 5 or higher, and the Mega gauge has increased at least 12 times, Mewtwo Mega Evolves. The Mega Evolution lasts 10s and increases Sp.Atk by an additional 10%, attack speed by an additional 40%, max HP by 10%, and movement speed by 5%. Mewtwo's attack speed bonuses are multiplicative.
rsb.notes: Consumes up to 30 Aeos Energy upon Mega Evolving. Mega Evolution duration is extended by 1 second for every 5 energy consumed. Energy is consumed regardless if you have the next multiple of 5.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: When Mewtwo Mega Evolves, attacks have increased range and deal damage in an area-of-effect centered on the target. When an attack deals damage to an enemy, their movement speed is decreased.

rsb.name: Confusion
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Deal damage to an enemy and leave them unable to act for 1s.

rsb.name: Future Sight
rsb.label: Damage - Shove
rsb.true_desc: Mewtwo shoves the designated enemy, dealing damage, leaving them unable to act for 0.5s and locking onto them. The locked-on enemy has their movement speed decreased by 35% for 3s and takes 10% increased damage from Mewtwo. After 3s, Mewtwo deals damage to the locked-on enemy a second time, and additional damage equal to 50% of any damage they received from Mewtwo while locked-on.
rsb.notes: Additional damage is capped at 1500.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: The locked-on enemy instead takes 15% increased damage.

rsb.name: Psystrike
rsb.label: Damage (5x)
rsb.true_desc: Mewtwo becomes unstoppable and starts directing psychic waves at the designated enemy, each hit dealing damage and decreasing their movement speed by 10% for 1s, stacking up to 5 times. Psystrike damage is increased based on distance from the target enemy; the farther the projectile travels, the more damage it deals. At the end of the move, Mewtwo sends a final hit, dealing damage to the designated enemy and nearby enemies then throws them for 1s.
rsb.notes: If Psystrike is intercepted by an enemy that isn't the intended target, there's no explosion and the enemy hit is shoved instead.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Movement speed reduction on enemies is increased to 15% for 1s, stacking up to 5 times.

rsb.name: Barrier
rsb.label: Shield
rsb.true_desc: Mewtwo gains a shield for 3s. While the shield effect is active, its movement speed is increased by 20%.

rsb.name: Recover
rsb.label: Shield
rsb.true_desc: Mewtwo gains a shield for 3s. While the shield effect is active, movement speed is increased by 10%, and Mewtwo recovers HP equal to 30% of the damage it deals with attacks. If at the end of the 3s the shield hasn't been destroyed, all of the user's move cooldowns are reduced by 25% of their current cooldown, and the Mega gauge increases once.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases the amount of HP recovered to 40% of damage dealt with attacks.

rsb.name: Teleport
rsb.true_desc: Mewtwo teleports to the designated location. For 2s after the first cast of Teleport, movement speed is increased by 20%, Mewtwo deals 10% more damage, and the Mega gauge increases 50% faster. During those 2s, Mewtwo can teleport again once.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Damage dealt is increased to 15%.

skills.name: Infinite Psyburn
skills.buffs: 30% Movement Speed, 30% CDR, 20% Max HP Shield

rsb.name: Infinite Psyburn
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Mewtwo becomes unstoppable while revealing enemy players and channeling a powerful attack on the enemies' current position. After 1s, Mewtwo brings down a powerful psychic beam on their original position, dealing damage to enemies around each point of impact, leaving them unable to act for 0.6s and decreasing their Sp. Defense by 15% for 3s. Each Pokémon can only be hit by 1 psychic beam.

name: Mimikyu
notes: Only auto attacks can critically strike. Mimikyu's Critical-Hit rate increases at levels 5 and 9.

rsb.name: Disguise
rsb.true_desc: Mimikyu starts the game in Disguised Form. While in Disguised Form, when Mimikyu would take damage from an enemy, Mimikyu instead takes 5% remaining HP as piercing damage, becomes Impervious for 0.5s (immune to damage but not hindrances) and changes to Busted Form. A revenge mark is applied on the enemy that broke the disguise. Mimikyu's movement speed increases by 10% when approaching revenge-marked enemies and deals 10% increased damage to them. After 50s in Busted Form, Mimikyu returns to Disguised Form. The time it takes to return to Disguised Form is reduced by 25s when Mimikyu knocks out an enemy player and is fully reset upon respawning.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack or when using a move, striking twice with an increased area of attack.

rsb.name: Astonish
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Shout in a startling fashion, dealing damage to enemies hit.

rsb.name: Play Rough
rsb.label: Damage - Initial Hit
rsb.true_desc: Mimikyu dashes in a designated direction. If Mimikyu connects with an enemy, Mimikyu latches on, becoming invincible and follows the target, slowing them by 30% for 1s and dealing damage to them 5 times. Mimikyu will then leap off of the enemy in a designated direction. Hits after the first deal 70% reduced damage.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases Mimikyu's movement speed by 20% for 3s after the attack is finished.

rsb.name: Shadow Claw
rsb.label: Damage - Last Hit
rsb.true_desc: Mimikyu slashes in front of themself with sharp claws, dealing damage to enemies hit. Each hit decreases enemy movement speed by 20% for 1.5s, stacking up to 3 times, and restores the user's HP. Whenever Mimikyu hits at least one enemy with a basic or boosted attack, this move's cooldown is reduced by 1s, and the number of hits when this move is used again increases. Up to 4 of these additional hits can be stored and are lost after 5s without auto attacking.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: At the end of the move, deal an additional hit of damage equal to 10% of missing HP. This damage is capped at 500 against wild Pokémon.

rsb.name: Scratch
rsb.label: Damage - Dash
rsb.true_desc: Mimikyu charges in the designated direction, dealing damage to enemies hit and decreasing their movement speed by 20% for 2s. For 5s after using this move, Scratch can be used a second time, making Mimikyu attack in front of themself, dealing damage to enemies hit and additional damage based on their missing HP.
rsb.notes: Additional damage is equal to 10% of the enemy's missing HP. Against Wild Pokemon: The total damage is capped at 500.

rsb.name: Shadow Sneak
rsb.label: Damage - After Teleporting
rsb.true_desc: Mimikyu moves backwards a short distance and extends their shadow, marking an enemy hit as a shadow target for 3s. If the shadow passes through tall grass or a wall, the shadow extends even further. If Mimikyu deals damage to an enemy who is marked as a shadow target, each hit dealt will deal additional damage equal to 4% of the target's missing HP. If this move is used again, Mimikyu moves to the enemy marked as a shadow target, fears them for 0.25s, deals damage to enemies in an area, and extends the duration of that enemy's shadow mark. If the marked target gets knocked out Shadow Sneak's cooldown is reset and Mimikyu recovers HP.
rsb.notes: Against Wild Pokemon: The % missing HP damage is capped at 150.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Reduces this move's cooldown by 1s.

rsb.name: Trick Room
rsb.true_desc: Leap to a location and create a bizarre area around Mimikyu in a square for 6s. If a slow would be applied to Mimikyu within the area, Mimikyu instead receives a movement speed increase equal to the slow rate. While inside the Trick Room, Mimikyu receives 70% reduced damage from enemies outside of the Trick Room. This move can be used as often as desired while inside the Trick Room, teleporting Mimikyu a set distance with each use.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Reduces this move's cooldown by 1s.

skills.name: Play With Me...
skills.buffs: 30% Movement Speed, 30% CDR, 20% Max HP Shield

rsb.name: Play with Me...
rsb.label: Damage - per hit
rsb.true_desc: Mimikyu leaps at an enemy and traps them inside Mimikyu's rag, dealing damage over time and granting the user a shield. The trapped enemy is only affected by this Unite Move and effects applied by Mimikyu before using this Unite Move. If Mimikyu loses their shield, or if 2.8s passes, the user stops attacking and jumps in the designated direction. The maximum number of hits is 7, hitting every 0.4s. The Unite buffs occur after the move ends. This ability counters Unstoppable.

name: Miraidon

builds.name: Thunder Beam
builds.explanation: Curse Incense should replace third item when opposition has high sustain composition.

notes: Only auto attacks can critically strike, but Miraidon has 0% base Critical-Hit rate at all levels.

rsb.name: Hadron Engine
rsb.true_desc: Create Electric Terrain around Miraidon for 10s when hitting an enemy player with a Move. If Miraidon has Aeos Energy, up to 40 energy (in multiples of 10) will be consumed when the Electric Terrain is created, increasing the size of the Electric Terrain. Miraidon and Pokémon cannot be put to sleep on Electric Terrain. Miraidon on the Electric Terrain deals 30% additional Move damage while allies will deal 10% additional Move damage. Electric Terrain also strengthens ally team goals' healing and shielding by 30% and weakens enemy team goals' healing and shielding by 30%. This ability goes on a 30s cooldown after it's triggered.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Miraidon does not have a boosted attack.

rsb.name: Thunder Shock
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Fire a jolt of electricity in a line in the designated direction, dealing damage to enemies hit.

rsb.name: Charge Beam
rsb.label: Damage - Regular
rsb.true_desc: Charge power before firing an electric beam in a designated direction. If this move hits an enemy, Miraidon's Sp. Atk is increased by 10% for 6s and stores electric power, stacking twice. If electric power is stored twice within a short time, Charge Beam becomes Boosted. Boosted Charge Beam can be held for up to 10s and continuously fires an electric beam in a designated direction, dealing damage to all enemies in the area of effect and granting Miraidon Hindrance Resistance. Miraidon may move while firing the electric beam but may not change the original direction. A maximum of 2 uses can be kept in reserve. There is a 1s cooldown between uses.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Reduces the cooldown to charge by 0.5s.

rsb.name: Electro Drift
rsb.label: Damage - Regular
rsb.true_desc: Race forward while spinning, dealing damage to enemies in the path. If this move hits an enemy, Miraidon stores electric power. If electric power is stored twice within a short time, Electro Drift becomes Boosted. Boosted Electro Drift can be held for up to 10s and homes in on a designated enemy with the spinning attack, dealing damage to any enemy hit. This move deals increased damage instead if the remaining HP of the targets hit are below 50%. During this move, Miraidon is Hindrance Resistant. A maximum of 2 uses can be kept in reserve. There is a 1s cooldown between uses.
rsb.add2_label: Damage - Boosted when target is < 50% HP
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Reduces the cooldown to charge by 4s.

rsb.name: Thunder Wave
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Discharges electricity at a designated enemy, dealing damage and leaving them paralyzed, decreasing attack speed by 10% and movement speed by 30% for 2s.

rsb.name: Thunder
rsb.label: Damage (x5)
rsb.true_desc: Summon a cloud in the skies dropping thunderbolts at set intervals. The summoned cloud moves slowly towards the nearest enemy. Thunderbolts deal damage and apply a 10% slow to enemies hit.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases the slow effect to 20%.

rsb.name: Parabolic Charge
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Floods the area around Miraidon with electricity, dealing damage and applying a 50% slow to enemies hit for 2s. If this move hits an enemy, Miraidon recovers HP and 1 stored use of either Charge Beam or Electro Drift. The more targets hit, the more HP Miraidon recovers.
rsb.add2_label: Healing - Additional past the first target
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Grants a shield when this move is used.

skills.name: Bright Future Meteor Storm
skills.buffs: 30% Movement Speed, 30% CDR, 20% Max HP Shield

rsb.name: Bright Future Meteor Storm
rsb.label: Damage - Base per meteorite
rsb.true_desc: The user gains hindrance resistance and calls down up to 5 meteorites in a row, each at a designated area, damaging opposing Pokémon hit by each meteorite. If a meteorite hits an opposing Pokémon, it increases the damage of subsequent meteorites that hit by an additional 20% (up to 80% additional increased damage for the final meteorite if all preceding meteorites hit). The final meteorite damages opposing Pokémon in a wider area of effect and throws them for 1s when it hits.
rsb.notes: All effects related to Unite Move use activate when the first meteorite is called down. This Unite Move ends when released, consuming 10% of the Unite Move gauge. Each meteorite called down consumes at most 30% of the Unite Move gauge.

name: Mr.Mime
notes: Only auto attacks can critically strike, but Mr. Mime has 0% base Critical-Hit rate at all levels.

skills.name: Filter
skills.description: Reduced damage received for a short time after using a move.

rsb.name: Filter
rsb.true_desc: Upon casting a Move, Mr. Mime takes 10% less damage for 2s.

skills.name: Attack
skills.description: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, dealing increased damage and throwing enemies when it hits.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Gains a Boosted Attack every 5s, dealing increased damage and throwing enemies in the air for 0.5s.

skills.name: Fake Out
skills.description: Slap its hands together, shoving enemies in front of it.

rsb.name: Fake Out
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Mr. Mime claps, damaging and knocking back enemies hit for 0.4s.

upgrades.name: Confusion
upgrades.description1: Attacks straight in front of the user, dealing damage to enemies and shoving them. If an enemy shoved by this move hits an obstacle, it receives increased damage from this move and is left unable to act for a short time. If the enemy is currently guard-swapped, it is not shoved but receives increased damage from this move and is left unable to act for a short time.
upgrades.description2: Increased damage.

rsb.name: Confusion
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Mr. Mime fires a wave of psychic energy, damaging and knocking enemies back. Enemies hit into a wall take bonus damage and are stunned for 1.5s. Enemies debuffed by Power Swap take bonus damage and are stunned for 0.7s, but are not knocked back.
rsb.notes: Normal damage will apply to targets that are unstoppable or unstunnable. (Example: Drednaw & Zapdos)
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increased damage.

upgrades.name: Psychic
upgrades.description1: Centers one telekinetic blast each on the user, any guard-swapped enemies, and any Light Screen or Barrier walls created by the user, damaging all enemies caught in the blasts and lowering their Sp. Defense for a short time. If an enemy is hit by multiple overlapping blasts, that enemy is also left unable to act for a short time.
upgrades.description2: Also decreases the movement speed of enemies for a short time.

rsb.name: Psychic
rsb.label: Damage - per Pulse
rsb.true_desc: Mr. Mime pulses energy, dealing damage in an area around themself, any target affected by Power Swap, and any Barriers or Light Screens. After three pulses, a final pulse will damage enemies and stun them for 1s. Enemies hit by the pulses have their SpDef lowered by 5% for 3s with each hit (maximum 8 stacks).
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Enemies hit by the pulses are additionally slowed by 30%.

skills.name: Light Screen
skills.description: Create a wall of light in the designated area that prevents enemies from passing.

rsb.name: Light Screen
rsb.true_desc: Mr. Mime creates a wall that prevents enemies from passing. If an enemy is near the location where the wall is created, they are shoved and left unable to act for 0.5s.

upgrades.name: Barrier
