upgrades.description1: Create a translucent wall in the designated location that prevents enemies from passing. A maximum of two uses can be kept in reserve for this move and cannot be used more than once every 2s.
upgrades.description2: Increases the max number of uses that can be kept in reserve.

rsb.name: Barrier
rsb.true_desc: Mr. Mime creates a wall that prevents enemies from passing. If an enemy is near the location where the wall is created, they are shoved and left unable to act for 0.5s. Holds 2 uses in reserve and cannot be used more than once every 2s.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Stores 3 uses in reserve instead.

upgrades.name: Power Swap
upgrades.description1: Swaps the user's Defense and Sp. Defense stats with those of another Pokémon for a short time when it hits. Swapping with an enemy deals damage over time and decreases their movement speed while increasing the user's movement speed for a short time. Swapping with an ally increases the movement speed of that ally and the user for a short time.
upgrades.description2: Also continually restores the HP of the user and the ally while this move is in effect.

rsb.name: Power Swap
rsb.label: Damage - per Tick
rsb.true_desc: Creates a link between Mr. Mime and the target this move hits. While the link holds, Mr. Mime's movement speed increases by 10% and their HP is continually restored. The link will continue to hold for as long as the linked target stays in range or until another target is Power Swapped. Damage and healing ticks at a rate of 0.5s.
rsb.notes: If the linked target is an ally, this move increases their movement speed by 8%, increases the amount of damage they deal by 15%, and continually restores their HP. If the linked target is an enemy, this move decreases their movement speed by 8%, decreases the amount of damage they deal by 15% and deals damage over time to them. Power Swap can be cleansed.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases the amount of damage dealt by allies to 20% and decreases the amount of damage dealt by enemies to 20%.

skills.name: Showtime
skills.buffs: 30% Movement Speed, 30% Max HP Shield
skills.description: Jump to the designated location and start a pantomime performance, dealing damage over time to enemies in the area of effect and leaving them unable to act for a short time.

rsb.name: Showtime
rsb.label: Damage - First 3 Hits
rsb.true_desc: Mr. Mime leaps forward and begins a performance; stunning enemies for 0.5s, dealing damage in a large area around him 4 times, and becomes unstoppable for the duration. The final hit deals double damage and stuns enemies for 1s.

name: Ninetales

builds.name: Sheer Cold
builds.explanation: Curse Incense should be used instead of Wise Glasses if the opposing composition has high sustain count. Choice Specs is strong for lane last hits but due to the area of effect nature of Ninetales's damage, Wise Glasses will frequently out pace Choice Specs as the game progresses.

builds.name: Dazzling Veil
builds.explanation: If not X Attack, red emblems change attack speeds for levels 6~10. If X Attack, red emblems change attack speeds for level 11~14.

notes: Only auto attacks can critically strike, but Ninetales has 0% base Critical-Hit rate at all levels.

skills.name: Snow Warning
skills.description: Causes snow to fall on an enemy, dealing damage to it and decreasing their movement speed by 30% for .75s. Boosted attacks, Snow Warning, and all moves (except Aurora Veil) sling snow; hitting the same target with snow 4 times will freeze them for 1s. This ability has an 8s cooldown.

rsb.name: Snow Warning
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Causes snow to fall on an enemy, dealing damage to it and decreasing their movement speed by 30% for .75s. This ability has a 4s cooldown. Boosted attacks, Snow Warning, and all moves (except Aurora Veil) sling snow; hitting the same target with snow 4 times will freeze them for 1s.

skills.name: Attack
skills.description: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack. When this boosted attack hits, it deals damage to nearby enemies and decreases their movement speed for a short time.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack. When this boosted attack hits, it deals damage to nearby enemies and decreases their movement speed for a short time.

skills.name: Powder Snow
skills.description: Attack with a chilly gust of powdery snow, decreasing the movement speed of enemies for a short time when it hits.

rsb.name: Powder Snow
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Ninetales attacks with a chilly gust of powdery snow; dealing damage to enemies hit and decreasing their movement speed by 50% for 1s.

upgrades.name: Avalanche
upgrades.description1: Attack with a gush of chilly ice toward the designated area. The ice forms a wall that cannot be passed through on land. After a short time this wall melts and collapses, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect.
upgrades.description2: Also decreases the movement speed of enemies for a short time when this move hits.

rsb.name: Avalanche
rsb.label: Damage - Wind or Wall
rsb.true_desc: Ninetales attacks with a gust of chilly ice toward the designated direction. The ice damages enemies and forms a wall that can't be walked through. After a short time, this wall melts and collapses; further damaging enemies in a radius around the wall.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Also decreases the movement speed of enemies by 50% for 1s when this move hits.

upgrades.name: Dazzling Gleam
upgrades.description1: Attack with a powerful cone of blinding light, leaving enemies unable to act when this move hits.
upgrades.description2: Increased damage dealt and stun duration.

rsb.name: Dazzling Gleam
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Ninetales attacks with a powerful cone of blinding light; damaging and stunning enemies hit for .8s.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increased damage and stun duration to 1s.

skills.name: Icy Wind
skills.description: Attack with a gust of freezing air, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and decreases their movement speed for a short time when it hits.

rsb.name: Icy Wind
rsb.label: Damage (x2)
rsb.true_desc: Attacks with a gust of freezing air; damaging, and slowing Pokémon hit by 20% for 1s. Icy Wind shoves Pokémon hit in the direction of the wind for a short distance unless they are already at the maximum range of the move.

upgrades.name: Blizzard
upgrades.description1: Summons a howling blizzard in two blasts in front of the user. The first blast deals damage to enemies in the area of effect and decreases their movement speed for a short time. The second blast deals damage to enemies in the area of effect and shoves them. If the second blast hits an obstacle, it also deals damage to enemies near the point of impact.
upgrades.description2: Increased damage.

rsb.name: Blizzard
rsb.label: Damage - Initial Blast
rsb.true_desc: Ninetales blasts twice in a line. The first blast penetrates walls and slows enemies. The second blast deals double damage, shoves enemies back, and if it hits a wall it creates a frost area at the impact location for 4s; dealing damage every 0.5s and slowing enemies in the area by 35% for 1s on each tick.
rsb.add1_true_desc: Deals twice the damage of the first hit.
rsb.enhanced_add1_true_desc: Deals twice the damage of the first hit.

upgrades.name: Aurora Veil
upgrades.description1: Create an aurora around the user, reducing damage received by the user and nearby allies in the area of effect. While the user is inside the aurora, its movement speed is increased and its basic attacks become boosted attacks.
upgrades.description2: Further reduces damage allies receive.

rsb.name: Aurora Veil
rsb.label: Heal - per Boosted Attack
rsb.true_desc: Ninetales dashes a short distance and creates an aurora centered on their position for 5s; reducing damage received by Ninetales and allies within the veil by 35%, healing Ninetales with each boosted attack, and increasing Attack Speed by 15%. While Ninetales is inside the aurora, movement speed is increased by 10% and all auto attacks are boosted.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Damage reduction increased to 40% and cooldown reduced by 2s.

skills.name: Snow Globe
skills.buffs: 30% Movement Speed, 30% CDR, 20% Max HP Shield
skills.description: Attacks with a chilly blast of snow and ice, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect when it hits. Deals increased damage to enemies that are frozen.

rsb.name: Snow Globe
rsb.label: Damage - Frozen Enemies
rsb.true_desc: Attack with a chilly blast of snow and ice; dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect around Ninetales when it hits. Deals increased damage to enemies that are frozen. Ninetales is unstoppable during the cast.

name: Pikachu

builds.name: Electro Tackle
builds.explanation: Experience Share may take the place of the third item to play a disruption support.

notes: Only auto attacks can critically strike, but Pikachu has 0% base Critical-Hit rate at all levels. At level 9, Pikachu gains 12.5% spell vamp (restores HP when dealing Special Attack damage).

skills.name: Static
skills.description: Paralyzes all enemies nearby for a short time when receiving damage. This ability goes on cooldown after it's triggered.

rsb.name: Static
rsb.true_desc: When damaged, paralyzes nearby opposing Pokémon (30s CD).
rsb.notes: The movement speed of opposing Pokémon paralyzed by this Ability is decreased by 30% for 2.5s and their basic attack speed is decreased by 10% for 2s.

skills.name: Attack
skills.description: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, dealing increased damage. This boosted attack also paralyzes enemies for a short time when it hits.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, dealing increased damage and paralyzing the opposing Pokémon hit.
rsb.notes: The movement speed of the opposing Pokémon paralyzed by boosted attacks is decreased by 30% and their basic attack speed is decreased by 10% for 1s.

skills.name: Thunder Shock
skills.description: Release electricity, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect. Also paralyzes enemies for a short time.

rsb.name: Thunder Shock
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Releases electricity at the designated opposing Pokémon, damaging opposing Pokémon in the area of effect and paralyzing them when it hits.
rsb.notes: The movement speed of opposing Pokémon paralyzed by this move is decreased by 30% and their basic attack speed is decreased by 10% for 2s.

upgrades.name: Electro Ball
upgrades.description1: Hurl an electric orb, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and leaving them paralyzed for a short time. This move's damage increases the lower the enemies remaining HP is.
upgrades.description2: Increased damage.

rsb.name: Electro Ball
rsb.label: Damage - Area
rsb.true_desc: Hurls an electric orb at the designated opposing Pokémon, damaging opposing Pokémon in the area of effect, dealing additional missing HP damage, and paralyzing them when it hits.
rsb.notes: The movement speed of opposing Pokémon paralyzed by this move is decreased by 50% and their basic attack speed is decreased by 10% for 2s. Against wild Pokémon: additional missing HP damage is capped at 1200.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases the damage of this move.

upgrades.name: Thunder
upgrades.description1: Drop wicked thunderbolts, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect.
upgrades.description2: Increases the number of times this move attacks.

rsb.name: Thunder
rsb.label: Damage - Area (5x)
rsb.true_desc: Drops wicked thunderbolts at the designated area, dealing damage to opposing Pokémon in the area of effect every 0.5s over 2.5s (up to 5 times).
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Deals damage over time more frequently, hitting opposing Pokémon in the area of effect up to 7 times over 2.5s.

skills.name: Electroweb
skills.description: Attacks and captures enemies using an electric net, leaving them unable to move.

rsb.name: Electroweb
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Launches an electric net at the designated opposing Pokémon, damaging the target and immobilizing them for 1.5s when the net captures them.

upgrades.name: Volt Tackle
upgrades.description1: Has the user electrify itself and charge ahead, throwing opposing Pokémon.
upgrades.description2: Reduced cooldown.

rsb.name: Volt Tackle
rsb.label: Damage (5x)
rsb.true_desc: Becomes unstoppable and dashes at the designated opposing Pokémon, damaging the target 5 times and throwing them in the air for 1.4s; then leaps a set distance back, becoming vulnerable to hindrances and increasing movement speed by 60% for 2s (decaying by 10% every 0.5s; minimum 30% for 0.5s) after the leap.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Reduces this move's cooldown by 2s.

upgrades.name: Thunderbolt
upgrades.description1: Attack with a strong electric blast, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and leaving them unable to act.
upgrades.description2: Increased damage.

rsb.name: Thunderbolt
rsb.label: Damage - per Bolt
rsb.true_desc: Strikes with a strong electric blast at the designated area, damaging opposing Pokémon in the area of effect and stunning them for 1.25s when it hits.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases the damage of this move.

skills.name: Thunderstorm
skills.buffs: 30% Movement Speed, 30% CDR, 30% Max HP Shield
skills.description: Attacks enemies near the user with tremendous bolts of lightning.

rsb.name: Thunderstorm
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Becomes unstoppable and jumps into the air, then casts down bolts of lightning 4 times over 3s in a radius around Pikachu. The first cast targets all Pokémon on the opposing team in range with 1 bolt each; these bolts damage up to 1 target each. The following 3 casts target up to 2 random Pokémon from the opposing team in range; these following bolts deal damage to opposing Pokémon in a small area around them, but targets can only be damaged once for each of the following 3 casts.
rsb.notes: Pikachu can act freely once the first bolts of lightining are cast down.

name: Psyduck

builds.name: Surf (Damage oriented)
builds.explanation: Disable or Psychic may be used depending on enemy composition.

builds.name: Surf (Support/Sustain oriented)
builds.explanation: Having self sustain enables tanking damage to get to Swift Swim's mysterious power which grants 20% cooldown reduction. Disable or Psychic may be used depending on enemy composition.

builds.name: Bubble Beam
builds.explanation: Having self sustain enables tanking damage to get to Swift Swim's mysterious power which grants 20% cooldown reduction. Disable or Psychic may be used depending on enemy composition.

notes: Only auto attacks can critically strike, but Psyduck has 0% base Critical-Hit rate at all levels.

rsb.name: Swift Swim
rsb.true_desc: When damaged by a Pokémon from the opposing team; increases movement speed by 40% for 2s, decaying by 10% every 0.5s (minimum 25% increased movement speed) (10s CD).
rsb.notes: This Pokémon's headache gauge increases by 1% for every 0.5% max HP damage received by Psyduck or nearby ally Pokémon from Pokémon on the opposing team. This gauge fills at a rate of 30% per 1s (requiring a total of 3.33s to fully charge). When the headache gauge is full, a mysterious power is triggered, interrupting Psyduck from casting moves, cleansing status conditions on themself, becoming unstoppable and decreasing their movement speed by 30% for 1s; then shoving nearby opposing Pokémon away for 0.8s, and resetting this Pokémon's move cooldowns. The mysterious power stays active for 10s, boosting moves and giving them 20% cooldown reduction. When the mysterious power ends, Psyduck cannot use moves or attacks, or charge their headache gauge for 2.5s.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Attacks with a shot of water.
rsb.notes: Psyduck has no boosted attack.

rsb.name: Confusion
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Releases a weak telekinetic force in the designated direction, damaging opposing Pokémon and stunning them for 1s when it hits.
rsb.notes: While the mysterious power is active, deals increased damage.

rsb.name: Surf
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Creates a wave in the designated direction, damaging opposing Pokémon and decreasing their movement speed by 30% for 2.5s when it hits; if opposing Pokémon already have their movement speed decreased when this move hits, they are also shoved for 0.5s. Rides the wave for at least 0.4s and until this move is used again or for up to 5s, moving forward and increasing movement speed by 30%; the user can use basic attacks and moves while riding the wave. Ally Pokémon who touch the wave while Psyduck is riding it have their movement speed increased by 70% for 3s (decaying by 10% every 0.5s over 2s; minimum 30%). When this move is used again, stops in place and creates another wave in the designated direction.
rsb.notes: While the mysterious power is active, creates two waves in the designated direction each time this move is used.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Decreases the damage dealt by opposing Pokémon hit by this move by 25% for 2.5s.

rsb.name: Bubble Beam
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Forcefully ejects a spray of bubbles in the designated direction, damaging opposing Pokémon in the area of effect and attaching a mark with 3 bubbles to those hit for 5s. When a teammate damages opposing Pokémon with bubbles attached to them with auto attacks, a bubble bursts, damaging the target. When all bubbles on a target burst from auto attack damage, they are stunned for 0.5s and their movement speed is decreased by 30% for 2s.
rsb.notes: While the mysterious power is active, strengthens the damage dealt when bubbles burst.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Decreases the movement speed of opposing Pokémon hit by the beam by 30% for 2s.

rsb.name: Tail Whip
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Wags their tail at the designated opposing Pokémon, damaging them and decreasing their movement speed by 30% and their Sp. Def by 20% for 2s.
rsb.notes: While the mysterious power is active, strengthens the Sp. Def decrease to 30%.

rsb.name: Disable
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Releases electricity at the designated opposing Pokémon, damaging the target and stunning them for 0.2s. Opposing Pokémon hit by the electricity from this use of the move have a mark applied to them for 5s which has a disabling effect tied to it; the disabling effect increases the cooldown of the last move used by a marked target by 2s, or the next move used if no move is on cooldown (once only). When the disabling effect occurs, the target's movement speed is also decreased by 30% for 2s. The electricity spreads to a nearby opposing Pokémon up to 4 times; the electricity can only spread to the same target once.
rsb.notes: While the mysterious power is active, the electricity can spread up to 6 times; the electricity can spread to the same target up to 2 times.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Strengthens the stun duration to 0.5s.

rsb.name: Psychic
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Decreases movement speed by 10% and releases a strong telekinetic force in the designated area, damaging opposing Pokémon in the area of effect and stunning them for 1s when it hits. Continues to release a telekinetic force at the Pokémon from the opposing team closest to the center of the area of effect when this move hits, marking them for 2s. If this move is used again or after 2s and the user is in range of the marked target, pulls the target a set distance in the designated direction (pulling them toward the user's location if no direction is designated), stunning them for 0.85s during the pull.
rsb.notes: While the mysterious power is active, stuns the target marked by this move for 0.2s after being pulled.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Decreases the Sp. Def of opposing Pokémon hit by the area of effect by 25% for 2s.

skills.name: Full-Power Psy-ay-ay!
skills.buffs: 30% Movement Speed, 30% CDR, 20% Max HP Shield

rsb.name: Full-Power Psy-ay-ay!
rsb.label: Damage (x3)
rsb.true_desc: Releases three mysterious psychic waves around themself, damaging opposing Pokémon in the area of effect and decreasing the damage dealt by them by 25% for 3s when hit.
rsb.notes: After using this Unite Move, increases the headache gauge by 50% as a consequence of Psyduck unleashing their full power.

name: Raichu

builds.name: Stored Psychic
builds.explanation: Any of Eject Button, X Attack, Full Heal, X Speed may be used as battle items

builds.name: Stored Bolt
builds.explanation: Any of Eject Button, X Attack, Full Heal, X Speed may be used as battle items

builds.name: Electro Bolt
builds.explanation: Any of Eject Button, X Attack, Full Heal, X Speed may be used as battle items

notes: Only auto attacks can critically strike, but Raichu has 0% base Critical-Hit rate at all levels.

rsb.name: Static
rsb.true_desc: Upon receiving damage: paralyzes all nearby opposing Pokémon (30s CD).
rsb.notes: Paralysis from Static decreases opposing Pokémon movement speed by 30% and reduces auto attack speed by a flat 10% for 2s.

rsb2.name: Surge Surfer
rsb2.true_desc: Alolan Raichu can use basic attacks while moving but is slowed by 30% when using basic attacks, Electro Ball or Thunderbolt.
rsb2.notes: After using a move or a boosted attack: dashes in the direction of movement.

skills.name: Attack - Pikachu
skills.basic2_description: After hitting 4 basic attacks or moves, the next basic attack becomes a boosted attack. Boosted attacks release electricity at the target that can chain to other nearby opposing Pokémon, dealing increased damage to up to 5 opposing Pokémon.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, dealing increased damage and paralyzing the opposing Pokémon hit.
rsb.notes: Paralysis from Pikachu's boosted attacks decreases opposing Pokémon movement speed by 30% and reduces auto attack speed by a flat 10% for 2s.

rsb.name: Thunder Shock
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Releases electricity at the designated opposing Pokémon; damaging opposing Pokémon in the area of effect and paralyzing those hit.
rsb.notes: Paralysis from this move decreases opposing Pokémon movement speed by 30% and reduces auto attack speed by a flat 10% for 2s.

rsb.name: Stored Power
rsb.label: Damage - Additional
rsb.true_desc: Increases auto attack speed by 35% and empowers the next 6 auto attacks for 5s.
rsb.notes: Each empowered auto attack also launches a star-shaped electric blast at the target, dealing additional damage. This move goes on cooldown after all 6 electric blasts have been launched or after 5s.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: The electric blasts also decrease the target's Sp. Def by 10% for 3s (up to 3 times; maximum 30%).

rsb.name: Electro Ball
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Hurls an electric orb toward the designated location, where it remains for up to 30s if it doesn't hit an opposing Pokémon on the way. When an electric orb and an opposing Pokémon touch; the orb releases its electricity and damages nearby opposing Pokémon.
rsb.notes: A maximum of 2 uses can be kept in reserve, with a 0.5s cooldown between uses. A maximum of 3 orbs can be on the map at a given time.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Deals damage every 0.5s over 3.5s (8 times) to opposing Pokémon hit by this move.

rsb.name: Thunder Wave
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Discharges a weak jolt of electricity in the designated direction; damaging nearby opposing Pokémon and paralyzing those hit.
rsb.notes: Paralysis from this move decreases opposing Pokémon movement speed by 30% and reduces auto attack speed by a flat 10% for 2s.

rsb.name: Thunderbolt
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Channels for 0.5s then releases a strong electric blast in the designated direction, damaging opposing Pokémon in the area of effect, and paralyzing them when it hits. Paralysis from this move decreases opposing Pokémon movement speed by 30% and reduces auto attack speed by a flat 10% for 1s.
rsb.notes: If this move hits an electric orb created by Electro Ball; the orb releases its electricity, dealing increased damage to nearby opposing Pokémon.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Immobilizes opposing Pokémon hit for 1s instead of paralyzing them.

rsb.name: Psychic
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Releases a strong telekinetic force in the designated area, damage opposing Pokémon in the area of effect and applying a debuff which decreases their movement speed by 23% for 3s when it hits. If the user hits debuffed opposing Pokémon with an auto attack, it deals additional damage.
rsb.notes: If this move hits an electric orb created by Electro Ball; the orb is pulled to the center of this move's area of effect. This does not extend the duration the electric orb remains.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Creates a damage-over-time area of effect, damaging opposing Pokémon inside the area every 0.5s over 2s (up to 5 times).

skills.name: Thunderstorm Aerial
skills.buffs: 30% Movement Speed, 35% Attack Speed, 20% Max HP Shield

rsb.name: Thunderstorm Aerial
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Creates a star-shaped zone of electricity in the designated area for 4s, damaging opposing Pokémon in the area of effect when created, then damaging opposing Pokémon over time (up to 5 times) and decreasing their movement speed by 60% while in the zone.
rsb.notes: If the user hits an opposing Pokémon that is in the zone with an auto attack, the next basic attack becomes a boosted attack.

name: Rapidash

builds.name: Dazzling Agility
builds.explanation: Focus Band may also be used as a defensive item

notes: Only auto attacks can critically strike, but Rapidash has 0% base Critical-Hit rate at all levels.

rsb.name: Pastel Veil
rsb.label: Shield
rsb.true_desc: The Pokémon's psychic counter charges based on the distance they run (up to 10 times). When the counter is full, the Pokémon is granted a shield, becoming hindrance resistant while the shield remains.
rsb.notes: When the Pokémon reaches an additional movement speed threshold, the damage dealt by moves is increased by 5/20/35/50/60%. Fairy Wind's damage is instead increased by 5/43/115/135/150% per additional movement speed threshold. The increased damage based on movement speed is calculated before dealing damage with moves.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Shoots energy from their horn, damaging the opposing Pokémon hit.

rsb.name: Confusion
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: The user releases a telekinetic force around themself, increasing their movement speed by 33% per opposing Pokémon hit for 5.5s (up to 2 times; maximum 66%) before damaging opposing Pokémon in the area of effect when it hits.

rsb.name: Dazzling Gleam
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: The user emits a powerful flash around themself after a delay, damaging opposing Pokémon in the area of effect when it hits. The user gains 1 stack of 11% increased movement speed per wild Pokémon hit by the outer edge of the flash, or 2 stacks per Pokémon from the opposing team hit for 5.5s (up to 9 stacks; maximum 99% increased movement speed) before damaging them. If the outer edge of the flash hits Pokémon from the opposing team, the cooldown of Tackle, Smart Strike, or Agility is reduced by 30% of its current cooldown, successively with each target hit.
rsb.notes: Against wild Pokémon: Dazzling Gleam damage is capped at 2500.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Strengthens the cooldown reduction of Smart Strike or Agility to 50% of its current cooldown successively per Pokémon from the opposing team hit by the outer edge.

rsb.name: Fairy Wind
rsb.label: Damage - First 2 Hits (per Hit)
rsb.true_desc: The user jumps to the designated location then stirs up a fairy wind when they land, damaging opposing Pokémon in the area of effect. This move can be used again, up to 2 times total.
rsb.notes: If it's used 2 times, the third attack deals increased damage and throws opposing Pokémon for 0.8s when it hits.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Decreases the movement speed of opposing Pokémon hit by 20% for 2s with each use.

rsb.name: Tackle
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: The user charges at the designated opposing Pokémon, damaging them and decreasing their movement speed by 20% for 2s when it hits.

rsb.name: Smart Strike
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: The user charges at the designated opposing Pokémon and stabs them with their sharp horn, dealing damage when it hits. The user then leaps in a chosen direction, shoving the target in the opposite direction and stunning them for 1s.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Charges the user's psychic counter by 5 when this move hits.

rsb.name: Agility
rsb.true_desc: The user's movement speed increases by 5% when this move is used, increasing by an additional 7.5% every 0.5s over 3s (maximum 80% increased movement speed).
rsb.notes: This move's duration increases by 1.5s if the user moves or hits opposing Pokémon with moves (up to 5 times for an additional 7.5s; maximum 10.5s duration).
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Also restores 2% of the user's missing HP every 0.5s while their movement speed is increased by this move.

skills.name: Triad Blitz
skills.buffs: 30% Movement Speed, 30% CDR, 20% Max HP Shield

rsb.name: Triad Blitz
rsb.label: Damage (per Hit)
rsb.true_desc: The user becomes unstoppable and charges at the designated opposing Pokémon, shoving opposing Pokémon in the way and stunning them for 0.8s when hit. When the charge ends, a mysterious triangular space is created around the designated opposing Pokémon if the user hits them. That Pokémon cannot leave that space.
rsb.notes: When the mysterious space is created, this move can be used again up to 3 times within 5.5s. With each additional use, the user runs at high speed forward, damaging opposing Pokémon in their path. If the path of a dash starts or ends in the mysterious space, this move can be used again immediately afterward. Otherwise, there is a 3s cooldown between dashes.

name: Sableye
notes: Only auto attacks can critically strike, but Sableye has 0% base Critical-Hit rate at all levels.

skills.name: Prankster
skills.description: When Sableye is outside the visual range of Pokémon from the opposing team, it enters stealth and its movement speed increases. When Sableye enters the visual range of a Pokémon from the opposing team, it does not immediately become visible but instead remains in stealth for a short time. This stealth lasts longer when approaching enemy Pokémon from behind. The Pokémon with this Ability exits stealth when it attacks.

rsb.name: Prankster
rsb.true_desc: When Sableye is outside the visual range of enemy players, Sableye enters stealth and gains 10% increased movement speed. When Sableye enters the visual range of enemy players, Sableye does not immediately become visible but instead remains in stealth for 1.8s. Sableye exits stealth when attacking.

skills.name: Attack
skills.description: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, dealing damage to opposing Pokémon it hits and decreasing their movement speed for a short time. If Sableye is in stealth when it hits an opposing Pokémon with a boosted attack, it will deal damage and apply a fear effect. Opposing Pokémon affected by fear will be forced to move away from Sableye. When the user enters stealth, it will charge boosted attack immediately and hold it.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, dealing damage to enemies hit and decreasing their movement speed by 20% for 2s. If Sableye is in stealth when hitting an enemy with a boosted attack, Sableye will deal damage and apply a fear effect for 1s. Enemies affected by fear will be forced to move away from Sableye with 40% reduced movement speed. When Sableye enters stealth, they will ready a boosted attack immediately and hold it.

skills.name: Thief
skills.description: Dashes in the designated direction, dealing damage to any Pokémon it hits and decreasing their movement speed for a short time. If this move hits an enemy Pokémon, it steals a small amount of their Aeos energy. If those Pokémon do not have any Aeos energy, they will be left unable to act for a short time.

rsb.name: Thief
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Dashes in the designated direction, dealing damage to any Pokémon hit and slowing 20% for 2s. If this move hits an enemy, Sableye received 5 energy and removes up to 5 energy from the enemies hit. If those enemies did not have any Aeos energy, they will be left unable to act for 0.5s.

upgrades.name: Knock Off
upgrades.description1: Dashes in the designated direction and then back again while attacking around itself, dealing damage to opposing Pokémon hit by the attacks and leaving them unable to act for a short time. For a short time afterward, this move can be used again. If it is, the user attacks in front of itself with its claws, dealing damage to opposing Pokémon it hits and throwing them. When either the first or second stage of this move hits opposing Pokémon, those Pokémon will drop some of their collected Aeos energy, and for a short time, they’ll be unable to pick up Aeos energy. When either stage of this move hits opposing Pokémon that do not have Aeos energy, those Pokémon will be left unable to act—and for a longer duration. While using this move, the user receives reduced damage.
upgrades.description2: For a short time after this move is used, the next time the user picks up Aeos energy, the user recovers HP and has its movement speed increased.

rsb.name: Knock Off
rsb.label: Damage (per Hit)
rsb.true_desc: When either activation of this move hits enemies that do not have Aeos energy (or are wild Pokémon), those enemies will be left unable to act for longer periods of time. Sableye dashes in the designated direction and then back again while attacking around themself, dealing damage to enemies hit and leaving them unable to act for 0.4s or 0.6s if they have no Aeos energy. This move can be used again within 6s attacking in front of Sableye with their claws, dealing damage to enemies hit, pushing them away and leaving them unable to act for 0.6s or 1s if they have no Aeos energy. When either the first or second activation of this move hits an enemy, they will drop 5 Aeos energy (total 15: 10 from first activation, 5 from second) and be left unable to pick up Aeos energy for 4s. While using this move, Sableye receives 40% reduced damage.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Aeos energy picked up within 5s of using this move recovers 9% Max HP (one time per activation) and increases movement speed by 40% for 2s.

upgrades.name: Shadow Sneak
upgrades.description1: For a short time, increases the user’s movement speed and has it enter stealth. While this move is active, the user’s next boosted basic attack deals additional damage. While this move is active, if the user exits stealth and is not immobilized by a hindrance, it will be able to enter stealth again.
upgrades.description2: Increases the duration of this move’s effects. While this move is active and the user is in stealth, it will also gradually recover HP.

rsb.name: Shadow Sneak
rsb.label: Damage - Additional
rsb.true_desc: Apply a 6.5s duration buff that stealths Sableye after 1.5s increasing Sableye's movement speed by 10%. If the initial stealthing is interrupted by a hindrance, Sableye will not enter stealth. When the buff first stealth's Sableye, Sableye is granted a readied boosted attack that deals additional damage. While the buff is still active, if Sableye exits stealth and is not immobilized or incapacitated by a hindrance, they will enter stealth again after 2s.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases the duration of this move’s effects to 7.5s. While this move is active and Sableye is in stealth, Sableye will also restore 1% max HP every 0.5s.

skills.name: Astonish
skills.description: Attacks in a cone in front of itself, dealing damage to opposing Pokémon and decreasing their movement speed for a short time. If this move hits opposing Pokémon from behind, it deals increased damage and applies a greater decrease in movement speed.

rsb.name: Astonish
rsb.label: Damage (Front)
rsb.true_desc: Sableye attacks in a cone in front of themself, dealing damage to enemies hit and decreasing their movement speed by 30% for 2s. If this move hits enemies from behind, this move deals increased damage and applies a greater decrease in movement speed to 60%.

upgrades.name: Feint Attack
upgrades.description1: Has the user throw dummy Aeos energy to a designated location. While dummy Aeos energy remains at a location, that location and the area around it will be visible to the user. Dummy Aeos energy can remain at up to five locations at a time. If an opposing Pokémon picks up dummy Aeos energy, that energy explodes, dealing damage over time to that Pokémon and decreasing its movement speed for a short time. A maximum of three uses can be kept in reserve for this move.
upgrades.description2: If an opposing Pokémon is knocked out while taking damage over time from this move, it will drop more Aeos energy than it normally would.

rsb.name: Feint Attack
rsb.label: Damage - per Tick (9 Ticks)
rsb.true_desc: Throw dummy Aeos energy to a designated location. While dummy Aeos energy remains at a location, that location and the area around it will be visible to the user. Dummy Aeos energy can remain at up to five locations at a time. If an enemy walks on top of dummy Aeos energy, that energy explodes, dealing damage-over-time 9 times over 4s in an area and decreases the movement speed of enemies hit for 4s by 70% initially and decreasing gradually. Holds 3 uses in reserve and cannot be used more than once every 1s.
rsb.notes: Note: Placing the dummy energy does not break stealth. Stealth is only broken when an enemy takes damage from the dummy energy.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: If an enemy is knocked out while affected by this move, they will drop more Aeos energy than they normally would.

upgrades.name: Confuse Ray
upgrades.description1: Fires a sinister ray in the designated direction, dealing damage to opposing Pokémon it hits. If this move hits Pokémon from the opposing team, it also leaves them confused. While confused, Pokémon are left unable to act and start continuously attacking nearby Pokémon with basic attacks. Confused Pokémon will target nearby Pokémon in the following order of priority: first, their ally Pokémon; then, wild Pokémon; last, Pokémon on Sableye's team.
upgrades.description2: Also increases the movement speed and basic attack speed of Pokémon from the opposing team while this move has left them confused.

rsb.name: Confuse Ray
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Fires a sinister ray in the designated direction, dealing damage to enemies hit. If this move hits enemy players, they are also left confused for 2s. While confused, enemies are  unable to act and continuously attack nearby enemies with basic attacks. Confused enemies will target nearby enemies in the following order of priority: first, their allies; then, wild Pokémon; last, Pokémon on Sableye's team. Knock outs for wild Pokémon will be attributed to Sableye, stealing the effects of the wild Pokémon being knocked out as well as the Aeos energy.
rsb.notes: While confused, outgoing damage is decreased for auto attacks and move 1 by 50%. If the confused target knocks out a Wild Pokémon, Sableye receives the KO.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Also increases movement speed by 30% and attack speed by 50% from enemies of the opposing team while this move has left them confused.

skills.name: Chaos Glower
skills.buffs: 30% Movement Speed, 30% CDR, 20% Max HP Shield
skills.description: Shoot light from both eyes, dealing damage to opposing Pokémon in an cone in front of itself. Pokémon from the opposing team hit by this move who are facing the user are left unable to act and start preparing to return to base. If they take damage before returning to base, the return effect is cancelled, and they are left unable to act for a short time. Opposing Pokémon hit by this move who are not facing the user have their movement speed decreased for a short time.

rsb.name: Chaos Glower
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Sableye becomes unstoppable for 1.2s and shoots light from both eyes, dealing damage to enemies in a cone in front of themself. Enemy players hit by this move who are facing Sableye are left unable to act for 3s and start preparing to return to base. If they take damage before returning to base, the return effect is cancelled, and they are left unable to act for 1.5s. Enemies hit by this move who are not facing Sableye have their movement speed decreased by 50% for 2s.

name: Scizor

builds.name: Bullet Dance
builds.explanation: This build is the highest unite burst damage build but the 8th place in damage per second from the permutation of the following 5 items: Attack Weight, Accel Bracer, Energy Amplifier, Weakness Policy, Razor Claw

builds.name: Swords Punch
builds.explanation: This build is the highest damage per second build and third highest sustain build from the permutation of the following 5 items: Attack Weight, Accel Bracer, Energy Amplifier, Weakness Policy, Razor Claw.

builds.name: Bullet Hit
builds.explanation: This build is the highest unite burst damage build but the 8th place in damage per second from the permutation of the following 5 items: Attack Weight, Accel Bracer, Energy Amplifier, Weakness Policy, Razor Claw. This item set has the greatest chance for resetting cooldowns after Double Hit marking because of Unite Move: Red Illusion Drive.

builds.name: Double Punch
builds.explanation: This build is the highest damage per second build and third highest sustain build from the permutation of the following 5 items: Attack Weight, Accel Bracer, Energy Amplifier, Weakness Policy, Razor Claw. Double Hit adds to Scizor's stickiness

notes: Only auto attacks can critically strike. Scizor's Critical-Hit rate increases at levels 5 and 9. Scyther will evolve into Scizor only if Bullet Punch is learned.

skills.name: Technician
skills.description: After using a move, the next basic attack will change to deal 2 attacks instead. The second attack deals reduced damage.

rsb.name: Technician
rsb.label: Damage - Second Hit
rsb.true_desc: After this Pokémon uses a move, the next auto attack will deal two consecutive auto attacks instead. The second of these deals decreased damage. Technician lasts 5s and has no internal cooldown.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, decreasing enemy movement speed by 30% for 2s when it hits and increasing Scizor's Defense by 40% for 6s. This Defense increase can stack additively up to 3 times and the duration refreshes when gaining another stack.

rsb.name: Fury Cutter
rsb.label: Damage - First Hit
rsb.true_desc: Slashes twice dealing damage with its scythes in a cone. The second slash deals more damage than the first.

rsb.name: Bullet Punch
rsb.label: Damage - Initial Punch
rsb.true_desc: Dash in the designated direction and strike enemies, reducing this move's cooldown by 40% of its current cooldown if the attack connects and recovering a portion of HP with each hit. If Bullet Punch is used again within 8s, the number of punches increases. The number of punches increases from 3 to a maximum of 5.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Also grants a shield for 3s if this move hits an enemy.

rsb.name: Quick Attack
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Dashes in designated direction dealing damage to enemies hit along the way.

rsb.name: Double Hit
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Jumps in the designated direction, dealing damage to enemies during the jump and applying a mark to that enemy until they leave combat. After hitting an enemy, jump again. An enhanced auto attack is prepared on landing that has increased range and charges at the enemy being attacked. This enhanced attack is available for 5s.
rsb.notes: If a marked enemy is knocked out, all of the user's move cooldowns are reset. The mark may be cleansed.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Reduces cooldown by 1s.

rsb.name: Swords Dance
rsb.label: Damage - Eighth Attack
rsb.true_desc: Dashes a short distance, increasing Attack by 20% for 5s. While Swords Dance's attack buff is active, after basic attacks or abilities make contact 8 times, the user launches an area-of-effect attack that pierces through enemies in a line.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Reduces the damage the user receives by 50% while dashing (0.3s).

skills.name: Red Illusion Dive
skills.buffs: 30% Movement Speed, 30% CDR, 20% Max HP Shield

rsb.name: Red Illusion Dive
rsb.label: Damage - Initial Punch, Ground Punch, & Copy Contact
rsb.true_desc: Target an enemy and punch them, dealing an initial hit of damage, decreasing their movement speed by 40% for 3s. Then create 5 copies that dash away from Scizor. If a copy hits a non targetted enemy while dashing out, it deals damage, decreases that enemy's movement speed by 40% for 3s, then disappears. If untouched, the illusory copy will remain on the battlefield for 8 seconds. Enemies that come in contact with an illusary copy will detonate the copy, having damage dealt to them an slowing them for 40% for 3s. For 8s after activation, this move may be used again, dashing in a designated direction dealing damage to enemies hit. The enemies hit are also grabbed and carried while Scizor continues dashing. At the end of the dash, Scizor punches the ground dealing damage in an area-of-effect. If the grabbed enemy hits an illusory copy during the shove, they will be dealt damage and be left incapacitated for 2s.
rsb.add1_label: Damage - Main Target (Copy Dash x5), Grab

name: Scyther
notes: Only auto attacks can critically strike. Scyther's Critical-Hit rate increases at levels 5 and 9. Scyther will not evolve into Scizor if Dual Wingbeat is learned.

skills.name: Technician
skills.description: After using a move, the next basic attack will change to deal 2 attacks instead. The second attack deals reduced damage.

rsb.name: Technician
rsb.label: Damage - Second Hit
rsb.true_desc: After this Pokémon uses a move, the next auto attack will deal two consecutive auto attacks instead. The second of these deals decreased damage. Technician lasts 5s and has no internal cooldown.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, striking twice. The first attack is a normal basic attack and the second of these deals decreased damage, can critically hit, and increases Scyther's movement speed by 40% for 3s.

rsb.name: Fury Cutter
rsb.label: Damage - First Hit
rsb.true_desc: Slashes twice dealing damage with its scythes in a cone. The second slash deals more damage than the first.

rsb.name: Dual Wingbeat
rsb.label: Damage - Slash
rsb.true_desc: Slashes in front with scythes, dealing damage in an X-shaped area-of-effect. If the second slash deals damage to an enemy in the center, restore the user's HP. If this move hits an enemy, it can be activated again within a set amount of time. If this move is used again, the user dashes in the designated direction, dealing damage to enemies hit. The dash deals more damage the lower their HP is.
rsb.add2_true_desc: 20% of enemy missing HP. Against Wild Pokemon: The total damage is capped at 1200.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases the damage dealt by this move.

rsb.name: Quick Attack
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Dashes in designated direction dealing damage to enemies hit along the way.

rsb.name: Double Hit
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Jumps in the designated direction, dealing damage to enemies during the jump and applying a mark to that enemy until they leave combat. After hitting an enemy, jump again. An enhanced auto attack is prepared on landing that has increased range and charges at the enemy being attacked. This enhanced attack is available for 5s.
rsb.notes: If a marked enemy is knocked out, all of the user's move cooldowns are reset. The mark may be cleansed.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Reduces cooldown by 1s.

rsb.name: Swords Dance
rsb.label: Damage - Eighth Attack
rsb.true_desc: Dashes a short distance, increasing Attack by 20% for 5s. While Swords Dance's attack buff is active, after basic attacks or abilities make contact 8 times, the user launches an area-of-effect attack that pierces through enemies in a line.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Reduces the damage the user receives by 50% while dashing (0.3s).

skills.name: Green Illusion Dive
skills.buffs: 80% Movement Speed, 20% Max HP Shield

rsb.name: Green Illusion Dive
rsb.label: Damage - Initial, Dash, & Copy Dash
rsb.true_desc: Target an enemy, slashing through them dealing an initial hit of damage and creating 5 copies a set distance away. Copies deal damage to enemies they make contact with and apply a mark to them for 5s. After 5s, the copies return to Scyther, dealing damage to enemies they make contact with and healing Scyther for each hit. This move may be used again within 5s of activating as a dash in a designated direction dealing damage to enemies hit. The copies then dash to the end location of the user's dash. If a copy makes contact with an enemy while returning to Scyther, the copy deals damage to that enemy and disappears. If a marked enemy is knocked out, all of Scyther's move cooldowns are reset. Subsequent copies hitting the same target deal 70% reduced damage.

name: Slowbro

builds.name: Surf ???
builds.explanation: Assault Vest or Leftovers can be considered for third item based on ally and opponent draft. Curse Incense is considerable to fill for teams needing the space.

builds.name: Tele Surf
builds.explanation: Assault Vest or Leftovers can be considered for third item based on ally and opponent draft. Curse Incense is considerable to fill for teams needing the space.

builds.name: Scald ???
builds.explanation: Curse Incense may also be used as the third item after Exp Share and Resonant Guard to allow for allies to use other held items. Assault Vest or Leftovers can be considered for third item based on ally and opponent draft.

builds.name: Attacker Bro
builds.explanation: Telekinesis may be used for pick potential

notes: Only auto attacks can critically strike, but Slowbro has 0% base Critical-Hit rate at all levels.

skills.name: Oblivious
skills.description: When Slowbro receives damage, the HP loss is gradual. When damaging an opponent with a move, restore some of the remaining gradual HP loss and decrease the target's Sp. Defense.

rsb.name: Oblivious
rsb.true_desc: Slowbro stores up lost HP for a short time (blue HP). Slowbro's Oblivious health remains for 6s and then decreases by 3% max HP every second. When dealing damage to an enemy with Water Gun, Scald, Surf, or Slowbeam - decrease their Sp.Def by 4% for 5s, stacking up to 5 times.

skills.name: Attack
skills.description: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack. When this boosted attack hits, deal damage to nearby opposing Pokémon and decrease their movement speed.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack. When this boosted attack hits, deal damage to nearby enemies and decrease their movement speed by 30% for 1s.

skills.name: Water Gun
skills.description: Slowbro channels a fierce stream of water which deals damage and lowers movement speed. Increase the area of effect and damage the longer this move is channeled.

rsb.name: Water Gun
rsb.label: Damage - Uncharged
rsb.true_desc: Slowbro fires a stream of water, damaging and slowing enemies hit by 35% for 1s. This move can be channeled to increase its range and damage. Slowbro's movement speed is reduced while channeling. Restore some of Slowbro's Oblivious health (blue HP) once, after hitting an enemy.

upgrades.name: Scald
upgrades.description1: Deal damage to opposing Pokémon and create steam when it hits. Opposing Pokémon inside the steam's area are left burned and have their movement speed decreased.
upgrades.description2: Increased area of effect.

rsb.name: Scald
rsb.label: Damage - per Hit (3 Hits)
rsb.true_desc: Slowbro fires a stream of boiling water; damaging enemies hit, slowing them by 80% for 0.5s and creating a cloud of steam centered on the first enemy hit, which slows by 30% for 3s and applies a burn to all enemies inside. This burn reduces Attack by 60% for 3s. Restore 10% of Slowbro's Oblivious health (blue HP) once per stream instance after hitting an enemy (maximum 3 times).
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases the size of the steam cloud.

upgrades.name: Surf
upgrades.description1: Charge forward on a wave, dealing damage in an area and knock opponents back. This is followed by two more waves that deal damage and decrease enemy movement speed.
upgrades.description2: The second and third waves become larger and also knock enemies back like the first wave.

rsb.name: Surf
rsb.label: Damage - per Wave (3 Waves)
rsb.true_desc: Slowbro rides on a wave, damaging, knocking enemies back, and throwing them in the air for .4s. Two more waves follow after the first, damaging and slowing enemies by 25% for 1s. Restore 10% of Slowbro's Oblivious health (blue HP) per wave, when hitting at least one enemy (maximum 3 times).
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: The second and third waves will now also throw enemies in the air for .75s, and the second wave will knock them back.

skills.name: Slack Off
skills.description: Lay down and take a rest, continuously regaining health. Damage taken will reduce the recovery effect.

rsb.name: Slack Off
rsb.true_desc: Slowbro begins channeling a nap and gains a heal over time, healing 2% max HP every 0.5s for 3s. While Slowbro remains channeling its nap, all self-healing is doubled (including Slack Off healing). Slowbro can be manually or forcibly woken up from their nap.

upgrades.name: Amnesia
upgrades.description1: Nullify some damage before it takes effect. For a short time after using this move, become immune to hindrances and gain increased defense. Also increase the damage dealt by the next use of Scald or Surf.
upgrades.description2: Increases Sp. Attack.

rsb.name: Amnesia
rsb.true_desc: Slowbro briefly becomes unstoppable, gaining +250 Defense for 4s and restoring 17.5% of Slowbro's Oblivious health (blue HP) every second for 4s.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Also increases Slowbro's Sp. Defense by 125.

upgrades.name: Telekinesis
upgrades.description1: Make opposing Pokémon float with psychic power. If used again, pull the opposing Pokémon toward the user.
upgrades.description2: Increased range and firing speed.

rsb.name: Telekinesis
rsb.true_desc: Slowbro shoots a beam, causing the first enemy hit to float in the air for 2.3s, restoring 15% of Slowbro's Oblivious health (blue HP) every second for 5s. Slowbro can reactivate the ability to pull the enemy to themself, but otherwise cannot act for the duration.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases the range and speed of the beam.

skills.name: Slowbeam
skills.buffs: 30% Movement Speed, 40% Max HP Shield
skills.description: Stare at an enemy and attack continually, dealing damage and rooting them. Grants a shield and makes the user immune to hindrances while using this move.

rsb.name: Slowbeam
rsb.label: Damage (x6)
rsb.true_desc: Stare at an enemy and attack continually, dealing damage every .5 seconds for 3s and applying 'Bound' to them. This ability counters Unstoppable. Grants a shield (10% max HP) and makes Slowbro unstoppable while using this move.

name: Snorlax

builds.name: Heavy Block
builds.explanation: Assault Vest or Leftovers can be considered for third item based on ally and opponent draft.

builds.name: Heavy Yawn
builds.explanation: Assault Vest or Leftovers can be considered for third item based on ally and opponent draft.

builds.name: Flail Block
builds.explanation: Item priority is items with HP such as Resonant Guard, Buddy Barrier and Score Shield but avoiding using them when faced up against an Umbreon. Focus Band is an otherwise strong alternative to deal with enemy Umbreon stealing shields. Rapid Fire Scarf can be considered if a deliberate action of using Flail only just before or after Rapid Fire Scarf activates. Emblem Loadout 1 is the more common loadout shared amongst other Pokémon where as Emblem Loadout 2 is highly specialized for Flail.

builds.name: Flail Yawn
builds.explanation: Eject Button may also be used for surprise Yawn distance. Item priority is items with HP such as Resonant Guard, Buddy Barrier and Score Shield but avoiding using them when faced up against an Umbreon. Focus Band is an otherwise strong alternative to deal with enemy Umbreon stealing shields. Rapid Fire Scarf can be considered if a deliberate action of using Flail only just before or after Rapid Fire Scarf activates. Emblem Loadout 1 is the more common loadout shared amongst other Pokémon where as Emblem Loadout 2 is highly specialized for Flail.

notes: Only auto attacks can critically strike, but Snorlax has 0% base Critical-Hit rate at all levels.

skills.name: Gluttony
skills.description: Increases the effects gained from eating Berries.

rsb.name: Gluttony
rsb.true_desc: When facing nearby Berries, increases movement speed by 25%.
rsb.notes: Doubles the HP restored from eating Sitrus Berries. Restores an additional 1% max HP + 0 x (Lv. - 1) + 23 HP from eating Oran Berries (from Greedent Cheek Pouch).

skills.name: Attack
skills.description: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack. When this boosted attack hits, it deals damage to nearby enemies and decreases their movement speed for a short time.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, belly flopping forward to deal increased damage to opposing Pokémon and decrease their movement speed by 20% for 1s when it hits.

skills.name: Tackle
skills.description: Charge forward belly first, dealing damage when it hits and shoving the first enemy it comes in contact with. After this move, the user's next basic attack becomes a boosted attack.

rsb.name: Tackle
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: The user readies a boosted attack and dashes belly first forward, damaging opposing Pokémon and shoving the first opposing Pokémon hit for 1s. The boosted attack from this move remains readied until used.

upgrades.name: Heavy Slam
upgrades.description1: Has the user slam its heavy body down, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and throwing them.
upgrades.description2: Increased damage.

rsb.name: Heavy Slam
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: The user jumps up and slams down at the designated location, damaging opposing Pokémon in the area of effect and throwing them for 1s.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases the damage of this move.

upgrades.name: Flail
upgrades.description1: Has the user flail about, increasing the user's basic attack damage the lower the user's HP is.
upgrades.description2: Increased damage. If the user has low HP while using this move, its basic attacks that hit enemies will restore the user's HP.

rsb.name: Flail
rsb.true_desc: The user increases their movement speed by 80% for 3s (decaying by 10% every 0.5s over 2s; minimum 40% for 1s before this buff ends) and decreases the movement speed of nearby opposing Pokémon by 50% for 1.5s, and starts flailing about for 5s.
rsb.notes: While flailing about, auto attacks deal increased damage, with damage strengthening for every 20% max HP the user is missing. Basic attacks used while flailing about also decrease the movement speed of opposing Pokémon hit by 20% for 1s; boosted attacks decrease movement speed by 50% for 1s.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases the damage dealt by auto attacks used while flailing about.
rsb.enhanced_notes: When the user is below 40% max HP, auto attacks also restore the user's HP for 30% of damage dealt.

skills.name: Rest
skills.description: Has the user fall asleep on the spot and restores its HP. Blocks the movement of all enemies while this move is in effect.

rsb.name: Rest
rsb.true_desc: The user becomes unstoppable and falls asleep on the spot for 3s, restoring 8% max HP every 1s over 3s (maximum 24% max HP). While using this move, opposing Pokémon cannot pass through Snorlax.
rsb.notes: This move cannot be used within an opposing Miraidon's Electric Terrain.

upgrades.name: Block
upgrades.description1: Has the user spread its arms wide to create a wall and grants it a shield. Prevents enemies from passing through the wall and shoves them if they run into it.
upgrades.description2: Reduces the damage the user receives while this move is in effect.

rsb.name: Block
rsb.true_desc: The user gains a shield for 3.5s; becomes unstoppable, decreases their movement speed by 30% and creates a wall with their arms spread wide in the designated direction for up to 4s. Opposing Pokémon cannot pass through the wall from behind, and those that contact the wall from the front are shoved and stunned for 0.45s; targets cannot be shoved more than once every 1s (maximum 4 times).
rsb.notes: The user can use this move again to drop the wall early, becoming vulnerable to hindrances and returning to normal movement speed.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases the user's Defense and Sp. Def by 35% while holding up the wall. Shoves opposing Pokémon contacting the wall from the front not more than once every 0.5s (maximum 8 times).

upgrades.name: Yawn
upgrades.description1: Has the user let loose a huge yawn that lulls enemies into a sleepy haze, putting enemies hit by this move to sleep.
upgrades.description2: Decrease the movement speed of enemies for a short time when this move hits.

rsb.name: Yawn
rsb.true_desc: The user lets out a huge yawn in the designated direction, putting opposing Pokémon in the area of effect to a deep sleep for up to 3s.
rsb.notes: Targets that are hit after their deep sleep is halfway through wake up immediately.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Decreases the movement speed of opposing Pokémon waking up from a full deep sleep by 35% for 3s.

skills.name: Power Nap
skills.buffs: 30% Movement Speed, 40% Max HP Shield
skills.description: Go to sleep and begin snoring, dealing damage over time to enemies in the area of effect and throw them. While sleeping, become immune to hindrances and continually restore HP.

rsb.name: Power Nap
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: The user becomes unstoppable and slams onto their back fast asleep, damaging opposing Pokémon in the area of effect and throwing them for 0.6s; then continues to sleep for up to 4s afterward. The user starts snoring for the remainder of the Unite Move, restoring 10% max HP over time while fast asleep (up to 9 times; maximum 90%), damaging opposing Pokémon in the area of effect with a huge snore every 1.5s and decreasing their movement speed by 30% for 1s when hit. This Unite Move can be used again before the user snores a second time to flip over in the designated sideways direction and slam the ground, dealing an extra instance of snore damage in the area of effect and throwing opposing Pokémon hit for 1s. While the user is fast asleep, opposing Pokémon cannot pass through Snorlax.
rsb.notes: After the user flips over or snores a second time, the user can use this Unite Move again to stop sleeping early, becoming vulnerable to hindrances and returning to normal.
rsb.add1_true_desc: Deals 50% of the initial damage, 3 times.

name: Suicune
notes: Only auto attacks can critically strike, but Suicune has 0% base Critical-Hit rate at all levels.

rsb.name: Pressure
rsb.label: Shield
rsb.true_desc: Damaging a Pokémon from the opposing team below 10% max HP and frozen by Suicune deals an additional 15% max HP as true damage to the target (sufficient damage reduction can prevent the target from being knocked out). Using a move grants a shield for 5s (up to 2 times); separately increases the crystal gauge by 1 for 5s (becoming full when increased 2 times).
rsb.notes: Flooded areas created by Whirlpool or Surf remain for 5s; opposing Pokémon in a flooded area are marked as drenched for 3s. Freezing a flooded area with a regular move (not Unite Move) also freezes opposing Pokémon in that flooded area for 2s. Freezing an opposing Pokémon marked as drenched removes the mark; targets frozen by a regular move or by a frozen area cannot be marked as drenched for 3s afterward. Deals bonus damage when freezing opposing Pokémon with a regular move or by being in a frozen area.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: When the crystal gauge is full, readies a boosted attack for 5s as the crystal gauge decays to 0; increasing the crystal gauge refills it to full.
rsb.notes: Boosted attacks shoot water forward, damaging opposing Pokémon every 0.25s over 1s (up to 4 times), dealing bonus damage to frozen opposing Pokémon with each hit.

rsb.name: Water Pulse
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Fires a pulse of water in the designated direction, damaging opposing Pokémon and shoving them for 0.5s when it hits.
rsb.notes: Marks targets as drenched for 3s when it hits.

rsb.name: Whirlpool
rsb.label: Damage - Per tick
rsb.true_desc: Generates a vortex of water at the designated area, damaging opposing Pokémon in the area of effect every 1s over 4s (up to 4 times), pulling them toward the center with each hit. If used again within 4s, moves the vortex in the designated direction, flooding the area it passes through.
rsb.notes: Marks targets as drenched for 3s when hit.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Reduces this move's cooldown by 1s.

rsb.name: Surf
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Prepares an area for a big wave to pass through, then creates the wave and sends it in the designated direction after 0.75s, damaging opposing Pokémon hit by the wave and shoving them. The prepared area becomes flooded after the wave passes through it.
rsb.notes: Marks targets hit by the wave as drenched for 3s. Hitting a pillar of ice created by Icy Wind with the wave shatters it, damaging opposing Pokémon hit.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases the damage of this move.

rsb.name: Avalanche
rsb.label: Damage - Falling Snow
rsb.true_desc: Creates snow to fall at the designated area for 1.5s, damaging opposing Pokémon in the area of effect (up to 3 times) and decreasing their movement speed by 30% for 2s when hit. After 1.5s, drops a clump of snow at the designated area, damaging opposing Pokémon again.
rsb.notes: The clump of snow freezes drenched targets for 2s when it hits; freezes flooded areas it drops on after 1s.

rsb.name: Ice Beam
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Fires an icy-cold beam of energy in the designated direction, damaging opposing Pokémon and decreasing their movement speed by 20% for 2s when it hits.
rsb.notes: This move freezes drenched targets for 2s when it hits; freezes flooded areas it hits after 1s. A maximum of 2 uses can be kept in reserve, with a 0.5s cooldown between uses.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Strengthens the movement speed decrease to 30%.

rsb.name: Icy Wind
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Builds up a gust of freezing air at the designated area for 0.5s, decreasing the movement speed of opposing Pokémon in the area of effect by 20% for 2s; then forms a pillar of ice, damaging opposing Pokémon in the area of effect and decreasing their movement speed by 20% for 2s once fully formed. The pillar of ice shatters after 4s, damaging opposing Pokémon again.
rsb.notes: This move freezes drenched targets for 2s when the pillar of ice forms or when it shatters. Forming a pillar of ice on a flooded area freezes that area after 1s. A maximum of 2 uses can be kept in reserve, with a 0.5s cooldown between uses.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Reduces this move's cooldown by 1s.

skills.name: Endless Ice Spikes
skills.buffs: 30% Movement Speed, 30% CDR, 20% Max HP Shield

rsb.name: Endless Ice Spikes
rsb.label: Damage - Spike Creation
rsb.true_desc: Cleanses the user of status condition; then creates ice spikes in the designated direction, damaging opposing Pokémon in the area of effect and freezing those hit for 2s. After 2s, the ice spikes explode, damaging opposing Pokémon in the area of effect again. This Unite Move does not directly interact with drench marks, nor does it freeze flooded areas.
rsb.notes: Suicune can be stunned after cleansing themself and before creating the ice spikes, canceling the Unite Move and refunding 90% of the Unite Move gauge.

name: Sylveon

builds.name: Hyper Mind
builds.explanation: Full Heal may also be used as a battle item. The use of Eject is to account for terrain obstacles.

builds.name: Drain Fire
builds.explanation: Shell Bell may also be used in the third item slot as another defensive item option.

notes: Only auto attacks can critically strike, but Sylveon has 0% base Critical-Hit rate at all levels. At level 7, Sylveon gains 12.5% spell vamp (restores HP when dealing Special Attack damage). When on a team with four other eeveelutions, gains +1% base spell vamp.

skills.name: Adaptability
skills.description: Every time Eevee deals or receives damage, increase Sp. Attack by 5% for 1.5s, stacking up to 4 times.
skills.passive2_description: Every time Sylveon deals or receives damage, increase Sp. Atk and Sp. Defense by 2.5% for 1.5s, stacking up to 6 times.

rsb.name: Adaptability
rsb.true_desc: Every time Eevee deals or receives damage, increase Sp. Attack by 5% for 1.5s, stacking up to 4 times.

skills.name: Attack - Eevee
skills.description: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, dealing increased damage.
skills.basic2_description: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, dealing increased damage. In addition, increase movement speed by 75% for 1s when this boosted attack hits.

skills.name: Swift
skills.description: Shoots star-shaped rays at enemies, dealing damage to them.

rsb.name: Swift
rsb.label: Damage - per Star
rsb.true_desc: Shoots 4 star-shaped rays at enemies, dealing damage to them.

upgrades.name: Mystical Fire
upgrades.description2: Increases the number of flames by one.

rsb.name: Mystical Fire
rsb.label: Damage - First Hit
rsb.true_desc: Create four small flames while leaping in the designated direction. These flames shoot towards enemies one by one, dealing damage and decreasing their Sp. Attack by 15% for 1s, stacking up to 4 times. Each time a flame hits, reduce the cooldown of this move by 12% of the current cooldown. After the first flame hits, subsequent flames on the same target deal 25% damage. Wild Pokémon will only be prioritized if no enemy players are in range.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases the number of flames by one.

upgrades.name: Hyper Voice
upgrades.description1: Unleashes an attack of multiple sound waves that deal damage when they hit. The damage dealt increases the farther the target is from Sylveon. Every time a sound wave hits, enemy Sp. Defense is reduced by 50 and the next sound wave's damage increases.
upgrades.description2: Increases the number of sound waves by one.

rsb.name: Hyper Voice
rsb.label: Damage - Near (6x)
rsb.true_desc: Unleashes an attack of multiple sound waves that deal damage when they hit. The damage dealt increases the farther the target is from Sylveon. Every sound wave reduces enemy Sp. Defense by 20% for 1.5s (capping at 80%).
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Pokémon hit are slowed by 30%

skills.name: Baby-Doll Eyes
skills.description: Stare at an enemy with baby-doll eyes, dealing damage and decreasing their Attack and movement speed for a short time when this move hits.

rsb.name: Baby-Doll Eyes
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Stare at an enemy with baby-doll eyes, dealing damage and decreasing their Attack by 15% for 1s and decreasing their movement speed by 60% for 1s for a short time when this move hits.

upgrades.name: Draining Kiss
upgrades.description1: Blow a kiss at an enemy that goes back and forth between Sylveon and the target multiple times. When the kiss touches Sylveon, restore  HP. When it hits the enemy, deal damage and decrease their movement speed for a short time. If Sylveon and the enemy move too far away from each other, the kiss will disappear faster than normal.
upgrades.description2: Increases the amount of HP this move restores.

rsb.name: Draining Kiss
rsb.label: Damage (3x)
rsb.true_desc: Blow a kiss at an enemy that goes back and forth between Sylveon and the target multiple times. When the kiss touches Sylveon, restore  HP. When it hits the enemy, deal damage and decrease their movement speed by 50% for a 1s on each kiss hit. If Sylveon and the enemy move too far away from each other, the kiss will disappear. The closer Sylveon and the target is, the faster the damage and healing occur.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increased healing.

upgrades.name: Calm Mind
upgrades.description1: Sylveon quietly focuses their mind and calms their spirit, increasing movement speed, Sp. Attack by 40% and Sp. Defense by 10% for a short time.
upgrades.description2: One time only while using this move, if Sylveon is hit by an Enemy's move, the damage is completely nulliffied and Sylveon is granted a shield.

rsb.name: Calm Mind
rsb.true_desc: Sylveon quietly focuses their mind and calms their spirit, increasing movement speed by 30%, Sp. Attack by 40% and Sp. Defense by 10%. All buffs last for 3s.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: For up to 3s after using Calm Mind+ Sylveon can block one move (auto attacks will not be blocked), negating the first instance of damage and granting a shield for 3s. Hinderances and status effects will still be applied.

skills.name: Fairy Frolic
skills.buffs: 30% Movement Speed, 30% CDR, 20% Max HP Shield
skills.description: Jump into the air and become briefly invincible. The moment Sylveon lands, deal damage to enemies in the area of effect and restore Sylveon's HP. For 10s afterward, 50% of damage dealt by Sylveon is converted into HP (basic attacks are excluded).

rsb.name: Fairy Frolic
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Jump into the air, removing most statuses and becoming invincible. The moment Sylveon lands, lose invincibility and immediately gain Fairy Frolic buff, while dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect. Fairy Frolic buff: for 10s, 50% of the damage dealt by Sylveon is converted into HP. No HP is recovered if the damage is dealt to shields.
rsb.notes: Against Wild Pokémon: Damage is capped at 2000.

name: Talonflame
notes: Only auto attacks can critically strike. Talonflame's Critical-Hit rate increases at levels 5 and 9.

skills.name: Gale Wings
skills.description: While at high HP, movement speed is increased.

rsb.name: Gale Wings
rsb.true_desc: While at 85% max HP or above, this Pokémon's movement speed is increased by 15%.

skills.name: Attack
skills.description: Becomes a boosted attack every third attack, creating a fiery whirlwind that deals damage to enemies in the area of effect. This boosted attack remains readied even after leaving combat for a prolonged period of time.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, creating a fiery whirlwind around the user and damaging opposing Pokémon in the area of effect. This boosted attack remains readied until used.
rsb.notes: Basic and boosted attacks lunge at the target opposing Pokémon.

skills.name: Peck
skills.description: Fly toward an enemy and attack 3 times.

rsb.name: Peck
rsb.label: Damage (3x)
rsb.true_desc: The user dashes at the designated opposing Pokémon then pecks three times, damaging opposing Pokémon hit.

upgrades.name: Flame Charge
upgrades.description1: Fly in the designated direction while cloaked in flame, attacking enemies in the path. This also increases the movement speed for a short time.
upgrades.description2: For a short time after this move hits, Talonflame's abilities and basic attacks partially ignore the enemies defense.

rsb.name: Flame Charge
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: The user dashes forward cloaked in flame, damaging opposing Pokémon in their path and increasing the user's movement speed by 30% for 2.5s if it hits.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases the user's Defense penetration for 3s and reduces the movement speed of opposing Pokémon in the user's path by 30% for 5s if this move hits.

upgrades.name: Aerial Ace
upgrades.description1: Fly at the designated enemy, dealing damage. Also makes the next basic attack a boosted attack.
upgrades.description2: Increased damage.

rsb.name: Aerial Ace
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: The user readies a boosted attack and dashes through the designated opposing Pokémon with a swift attack, damaging opposing Pokémon in the area of effect around the user and restoring the user's HP when it hits.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases the damage of this move.

skills.name: Acrobatics
skills.description: Fly toward the designated area and attack multiple times. Escape in a direction of your choice after using this move.

rsb.name: Acrobatics
rsb.label: Damage (3x)
rsb.true_desc: The user dashes toward the designated location then attacks the area around them three times, damaging nearby opposing Pokémon.
rsb.notes: The user can choose to dash in the direction of movement afterward.

upgrades.name: Fly
upgrades.description1: Fly up into the sky. Using this move again will cause you to dive to the designated area and attack, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect. Your next basic attack becomes a boosted attack. This move's cooldown is reduced by 40% if it hits an enemy.
upgrades.description2: Also throws enemies when this move hits.

rsb.name: Fly
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: The user readies a boosted attack and flies up into the sky for up to 3s, becoming untargetable and increasing their movement speed by 65%. When this move is used again, or after 3s, the user dives at the designated location, damaging opposing Pokémon in the area of effect.
rsb.notes: If this move hits a Pokémon from the opposing team, the current cooldown of this move is reduced by 40%.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Throws opposing Pokémon hit for 0.4s.

upgrades.name: Brave Bird
upgrades.description1: Dive to the designated location while cloaked in flame, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect. Also deals recoil damage to the user when it hits. Performing a boosted attack within a set amount of time after this move hits will reset the cooldown of Flame Charge or Aerial Ace.
upgrades.description2: Deals less recoil damage when this move hits.

rsb.name: Brave Bird
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: The user becomes unstoppable and dives at the designated location, damaging opposing Pokémon in the area of effect when they land and receiving 5% remaining HP recoil damage if it hits.
rsb.notes: Opposing Pokémon hit by this move are marked for 4s. If the user hits a marked target with a boosted attack, the cooldown of Flame Charge or Aerial Ace is reset and the mark on the first target hit is removed.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Reduces damage received by 25% per opposing Pokémon hit for 5s (up to 3 times; maximum 75%).

skills.name: Flame Sweep
skills.buffs: 80% Movement Speed, 20% Max HP Shield
skills.description: Perform an aerial somersault before charging forawrd, dealing damage to enemies in this move's path and shoving them.

rsb.name: Flame Sweep
rsb.label: Damage (2x)
rsb.true_desc: The user performs an aerial somersault and sweeps forward, becoming unstoppable, receiving 50% reduced damage, damaging opposing Pokémon in their path and shoving them toward the end of the sweep, then damaging opposing Pokémon again. This Unite Move cannot go through walls.

name: Tinkaton

builds.name: Gigaton Thief
builds.explanation: Muscle Band is a considerable item to smooth out boosted attack to reduce wind up but does nothing for building boosted attacks faster.
