notes: Only basic attacks can critically strike (not boosted attacks or Thief empowered auto attacks), but Tinkaton has 0% base Critical-Hit rate at all levels.

rsb.name: Mold Breaker
rsb.true_desc: When damaging an opposing Pokémon with an active shield effect, 30% of the damage dealt to the shield is dealt as additional damage to the target's HP.
rsb.notes: This Pokémon's hammer strengthens every time they hit Pokémon from the opposing team with boosted attacks or moves, increasing this Pokémon's Attack by 0.5% per target hit (up to 60 times; maximum 30% Attack). After the hammer is strengthened 20, 40, and 60 times; Rock Smash, Gigaton Hammer, and Smack Down gain increased range.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Becomes a boosted attack after 12s, swinging the user's hammer in a circle around them, dealing increased damage and restoring 20% of the user's missing HP when it hits. This boosted attack remains readied until used. The time until the next boosted attack is readied is reduced faster when hit by opposing Pokémon's auto attacks.
rsb.notes: The hammer's size and basic attack range increase upon evolving into Tinkatuff and into Tinkaton.

rsb.name: Rock Smash
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: The user swings down their hammer with rock-crushing force, damaging opposing Pokémon in the area of effect and stunning them for 0.15s when hit.
rsb.notes: The stronger the hammer, the larger this move's area of effect.

rsb.name: Gigaton Hammer
rsb.label: Damage - Low charge
rsb.true_desc: The user becomes unstoppable and decreases their movement speed by 50% as they charge power for up to 1.95s, becoming fully charged after 1s, before swinging down their hammer in the designated direction, damaging opposing Pokémon in the area of effect and throwing them when hit. This move deals more damage and the throw duration is strengthened the longer it is charged.
rsb.notes: The stronger the hammer, the larger this move's area of effect.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Reduces this move's cooldown by 1s.

rsb.name: Smack Down
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: The user charges power for up to 2.4s, becoming fully charged after 0.8s, then uses their hammer to send a rock flying to the designated area, damaging opposing Pokémon at the rock's point of impact and decreasing the movement speed of those hit by 50% for 3s (decaying by 10% every 0.5s). The longer this move is charged, the farther the rock can fly. This move deals increased damage at maximum charge. If this move is canceled, it goes on a 2s cooldown.
rsb.notes: The stronger the hammer, the larger this move's maximum range.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Reduces this move's cooldown by 1s.

rsb.name: Fairy Wind
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: The user stirs up a fairy wind in the designated direction, damaging opposing Pokémon hit and decreasing their movement speed by 20% for 1s.

rsb.name: Ice Hammer
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: The user leaps in the designated direction and swings down their freezing hammer at the designated location, damaging opposing Pokémon in the area of effect, decreasing the movement speed of those hit by 50%, their Attack by 30%, and their Sp. Atk by 15% for 2.5s.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Strengthens the Attack decrease of opposing Pokémon hit to 50% and the Sp. Atk decrease to 30%.

rsb.name: Thief
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Increases the user's movement speed by 25% for 3s, strengthened to 50% for 5s when moving toward an opposing Pokémon affected by hindrances; and empowers the user's next basic attack for 5s, swinging their hammer in front of them and dealing boosted attack damage to opposing Pokémon hit. If this Thief empowered basic attack hits a Pokémon from the opposing team, the user gains a Thief buff for 5s, increasing their Defense and Sp. Def by 10% per target hit (up to 5 times; maximum 50%). While the user has the Thief buff, the movement speed increases remain in effect; the user readies boosted attacks after 2s, and the time until the next boosted attack is reduced significantly when hit by opposing Pokémon's auto attacks.
rsb.notes: Pokémon from the opposing team hit with Thief empowered basic attacks have a separate Thief debuff applied to them for 5s, decreasing their Defense and Sp. Def by 10%. The duration of the Thief debuff on targets hit refreshes when hit by subsequent Thief empowered attacks, and the duration of the Thief buff on the user is refreshed when a Pokémon from the opposing team is hit with the empowered attack.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Strengthens the Defense and Sp. Def decrease on targets hit by the empowered auto attack to 25%; strengthens the Defense and Sp. Def increases on the user to 25% per target hit (maximum 125%).

skills.name: Kiss Bliss Kaboom
skills.buffs: 30% Movement Speed, 30% CDR, 20% Max HP Shield

rsb.name: Kiss Bliss Kaboom
rsb.label: Damage - Kiss Bliss
rsb.true_desc: The user first blows cute kisses at the designated Pokémon from the opposing team and their nearby allies, damaging and stunning them for 0.7s when Kiss Bliss hits a target. The user can then use the Unite Move again, leaping up forward and slamming their hammer down at the designated location, damaging opposing Pokémon in the area of effect of Kaboom.
rsb.notes: Unite Move buffs apply when Kiss Bliss hits a target.

name: Trevenant

builds.name: Hammer Leech
builds.explanation: Aeos Cookie is a very strong alternative for selfish set.

builds.name: Pain Curse
builds.explanation: Aeos Cookie may be subbed in for defensive item or Curse Bangle may be used to go all in on offense.

notes: Only auto attacks can critically strike, but Trevenant has 0% base Critical-Hit rate at all levels.

rsb.name: Natural Cure
rsb.true_desc: When Trevenant deals or receives damage while at or below 35% max HP, a continuous HP recovery effect is triggered every 0.5s for 4s. This effect also reduces the cooldowns of Trevenant's moves by 1s every 1s. When this HP recovery effect ends, there is a 100s cooldown. However, this cooldown is reduced by 1s each time one of Trevenant's moves damage an enemy. This cooldown reduction cannot be triggered more than once every 0.5s.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, dealing increased damage to enemies and heal for 5% max HP when this boosted attack hits.

rsb.name: Will-o-Wisp
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Shoot 3 sinister flames in the designated direction, dealing damage to enemies hit and leaving them burned for 3s. This burn reduces enemy Attack by 10% and Sp. Attack by 5% for 3s. The first wisp to hit a target deals full damage, and subsequent flame hits deal 50% damage.

rsb.name: Wood Hammer
rsb.label: Damage - Both Hits
rsb.true_desc: Trevenant pulls back its arms and attacks, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and pulls them in front of Trevenant, leaving them unable to act for 0.5s. If this attack deals damage to at least one enemy, a follow-up attack will be available for 5s. This follow-up attack slams down a giant wooden hammer in front of Trevenant, dealing damage to any enemy it hits, and leaving them unable to act. The lower Trevenant's HP, the longer the enemy will be left unable to act. Every time this move is used, it consumes 5% of Trevenant's current HP.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: If an enemy is hit by the second hammer, the damage they deal is reduced by 20% for 3s.

rsb.name: Curse
rsb.label: Damage - per Tick
rsb.true_desc: Trevenant creates a cursed zone in exchange for 2% max HP per second for 6s, dealing damage over time to enemies in the area of effect every 0.5s for 6s and decreasing their movement speed for 1s, refreshing with each tick. The lower Trevenant's HP is, the greater the decrease in movement speed. While using this move, Trevenant builds up Curse gauge every time it deals or receives damage. Curse will deal additional damage to enemies in the area of effect when the Curse releases at the end of 6s or by manually detonating the Curse. If the Curse gauge is at maximum when it’s released, the cooldowns of Branch Poke, Horn Leech, and Pain Split are reset.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increased radius.

rsb.name: Branch Poke
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Trevenant jabs in the designated direction; dealing damage, decreasing their movement speed by 40% for 2s, and healing Trevenant for 9% max HP (over 3 ticks as 1 tick per second) when hitting an enemy.

rsb.name: Horn Leech
rsb.label: Damage - 2 Hits
rsb.true_desc: Charge forward, becoming unstoppable, dealing damage to enemies and shoving them while dashing in the designated direction for the duration of the dash. At the end of the charge, enemies that were shoved are dealt additional damage and then thrown for 0.75s. Colliding with an enemy while charging recovers Trevenant's HP 3 times, and the lower Trevenant's remaining HP the more HP that is recovered. After this move hits an enemy, Trevenant's next three auto attacks deal more damage and reduce this move’s cooldown by 0.5s when they hit.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: After using this move, Trevenant's movement speed is increased by 30% for 1.5s.

rsb.name: Pain Split
rsb.label: Damage - per conditional tick
rsb.true_desc: Creates a link between Trevenant and a designated enemy for 6s. While the link holds, a percentage of damage that Trevenant would take is mitigated and instead redirected to the linked enemy as True damage. The lower Trevenant's remaining HP, the greater the percentage of damage that is redirected. If Trevenant's percentage of remaining HP is lower than the linked enemy, this move continuously deals damage and recovers Trevenant's HP every 0.5s. If Trevenant and the linked enemy are too far apart, the link will disappear. Using this move increases Trevenant's movement speed by 35% for 2s decaying by 7.5% per half second.
rsb.add5_true_desc: Trevenant heals for 134.4% of damage dealt on each tick.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Duration increased to 8.5s.

skills.name: Phantom Forest
skills.buffs: 30% Movement Speed, 20% Max HP Shield

rsb.name: Phantom Forest
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Briefly becomes unstoppable and creates a cursed forest, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and marking them, throwing them, and decreasing their movement speed by 50% for 2s. Trevenant and allies deal increased basic (and boosted) attack damage to enemies that were marked by this move (0.5s cd for each attacker). The mark lasts for 6s. Trevenant is also granted a shield for 6s when this move hits an enemy with the shield being strengthened for each enemy hit, up to 5 times. While Trevenant is shielded by this shield, HP recovery effects applied to Trevenant are increased by 50%.

name: Tsareena

builds.name: Stomp Glide
builds.explanation: X Attack may also be used for aggressive Unite move usage. Primary use of Queenly Majesty enhanced moves should be the dash.

builds.name: Stomp Trop
builds.explanation: X Attack may also be used for aggressive Unite move usage. Primary use of Queenly Majesty enhanced moves should be the dash.

builds.name: Triple Glide
builds.explanation: X Attack may also be used for aggressive Unite move usage. Primary use of Queenly Majesty enhanced moves should be the dash.

builds.name: Triple Trop
builds.explanation: X Attack may also be used for aggressive Unite move usage. Primary use of Queenly Majesty enhanced moves should be the dash.

notes: Only auto attacks and Razor Leaf can critically strike. Tsareena's Critical-Hit rate increases at levels 5 and 9.

skills.name: Oblivious
skills.description: When a hindrance is inflicted on Bounsweet, Steenee; decrease the duration of the effect.
skills.passive2_description: When a hindrance is inflicted on Tsareena; decrease the duration of the effect. Using a boosted attack or move grants 1 stack of Queenly Majesty to Tsareena. After gaining 3 stacks, the Queenly Majesty buff is applied to Tsareena for a short time, which allows one of Tsareena's moves to be reused (these uses do not share the same cooldown as the base moves), dealing increased damage and applying an additional effect based on the move used.

rsb.name: Oblivious
rsb.true_desc: Reduces the duration of hindrances inflicted on the user by an increased amount.

skills.name: Attack
skills.description: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, lunging at an opposing Pokémon, damage nearby opposing Pokémon and lowering the Defense of those hit by 20% for 1s.

skills.name: Razor Leaf
skills.description: Pelts leaves in the designated direction, dealing damage to enemies hit. The critical-hit rate of this move is higher than that of basic attacks.

rsb.name: Razor Leaf
rsb.label: Damage (3x)
rsb.true_desc: The user pelts sharp-edged leaves in the designated direction, damaging opposing Pokémon hit up to 3 times. The critical-hit rate of this move is increased by 15%.

upgrades.name: Triple Axel
upgrades.description1: Tsareena spin-kicks 3 times in the designated direction, dealing damage to enemies. The damage dealt increases each time a kick hits, and basic attack speed is increased for a short time after this move ends by an amount based on the number of landed kicks. Queenly Majesty Effect: Restores HP each time a kick hits.
upgrades.description2: Increased damage.

rsb.name: Triple Axel
rsb.label: Damage - per Hit
rsb.true_desc: The user dashes forward with 3 spinning kicks, hitting opposing Pokémon in the area of effect of each kick; increasing the user's auto attack speed for 5s per opposing Pokémon hit (up to 3 times), and increasing the damage of the user's auto attacks and Triple Axel by 8% per opposing Pokémon hit before dealing damage (up to 6 times).
rsb.notes: Queenly Majesty Effect: Restores HP per opposing Pokémon hit with each kick.
rsb.add2_label: Heal per hit per target (Queenly Majesty buff)
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increased damage.

upgrades.name: Stomp
upgrades.description1: Tsareena jumps up high and attacks enemies their feet. When this move hits, deal damage to enemies and leave them unable to act for a short time. Queenly Majesty effect: Restores HP when this move hits.
upgrades.description2: Increased damage.

rsb.name: Stomp
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: The user jumps up high and stomps the ground, damaging opposing Pokémon in the area of effect when they land and stunning them for 0.2s.
rsb.notes: Queenly Majesty Effect: Restores HP per opposing Pokémon hit.
rsb.add2_label: Heal per hit per target (Queenly Majesty buff)
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases the damage of this move.

skills.name: Rapid Spin
skills.description: Tsareena spins in the designated direction, dealing damage to any enemy hit. When this move hits, increase Tsareena's movement speed for a short time.

rsb.name: Rapid Spin
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: The user dashes forward and spins, damaging opposing Pokémon in their path and increasing the user's movement speed by 30% for 1.5s when it hits.

upgrades.name: Trop Kick
upgrades.description1: Perform a flying kick in the designated direction, dealing damage to enemies hit and decrease their Attack for a short time. Enemies that make contact with the flying kick's wake receive damage and have their movement speed decreased for a short time. Queenly Majesty effect: Grants Tsareena a shield when this move is used.
upgrades.description2: Increased damage.

rsb.name: Trop Kick
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: The user dashes forward with a flying kick of tropical origins, damaging opposing Pokémon in the path of the kick and decreasing their Attack by 25% for 1s when it hits. At the same time, a muddy wake is left in the path of the kick, damaging opposing Pokémon in the area of the wake (up to 7 times) and decreasing their movement speed by 35% for 1s.
rsb.notes: Queenly Majesty Effect: Grants the user a shield for 3s when this move is used.
rsb.add3_label: Damage - DoT (7 Ticks - Queenly Majesty buff)
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases the damage of this move.
rsb.enhanced_add3_label: Damage - DoT (7 Ticks - Queenly Majesty buff)

upgrades.name: Grassy Glide
upgrades.description1: Tsareena slides in the designated direction, dealing damage to enemies hit and decreases their movement speed for a short time. This is followed by an attack in the opposite direction, dealing damage and shoving enemies hit. Queenly Majesty effect: Grants Tsareena a shield when this move is used.
upgrades.description2: Increased damage.

rsb.name: Grassy Glide
rsb.label: Damage (2x)
rsb.true_desc: The user dashes forward with a gliding kick, damaging opposing Pokémon hit. The user then immediately kicks back in the opposite direction, damaging and shoving opposing Pokémon hit backward.
rsb.notes: Queenly Majesty Effect: Grants the user a shield for 3s when this move is used.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases the damage of this move.

skills.name: Queen Ascendant
skills.buffs: 30% Movement Speed, 30% CDR, 20% Max HP Shield
skills.description: Tsareena leaps toward an enemy from the opposing team and kicks it high into the air before showering it with a series of kicks while airborne, dealing damage to them. The moment Tsareena lands on the ground, recover HP. While airborne, the enemy that is being kicked and Tsareena are not affected by other moves.

rsb.name: Queen Ascendant
rsb.label: Damage (9x)
rsb.true_desc: Tsareena leaps toward an enemy player and kicks it high into the air before showering it with a series of kicks while airborne, dealing damage to them. The moment Tsareena lands on the ground, recover HP. While airborne, the enemy that is being kicked and Tsareena are not affected by other moves.

name: Tyranitar

builds.name: Sand Stone
builds.explanation: Razor Claw may be used over a defensive item.

notes: Only auto attacks can critically strike. Tyranitar's Critical-Hit rate increases at levels 5 and 9.

skills.name: Guts
skills.description: When Larvitar receives damage equal to at least 10% of max HP, Attack is increased by 30% for 3s. This Ability goes on cooldown after it’s triggered (40s cd).
skills.passive2_description: When Pupitar receives damage equal to at least 10% max HP, all status conditions are nullified and Pupitar is granted a shield worth 10% Max HP. This Ability goes on cooldown after it’s triggered (40s cd).
skills.passive3_description: Summons a sandstorm around Tyranitar for 3s after using a move. This sandstorm increases Defense and Sp. Defense by 65% for 3s and deals damage to nearby enemies every .5s.

skills.name: Attack
skills.description: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, dealing increased damage when it hits.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, dealing increased damage when it hits.
rsb.notes: After evolving to Pupitar basic and boosted attacks (and basic attacks during Tyrannical Rampage) have an additional 5% lifesteal that is also active when doing true damage.

rsb.name: Bite
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Deals damage to enemies in front of the user. If the enemy HP is below 50%—or falls below that percentage as a result of this move—they become immobilized for 0.6s.

rsb.name: Dark Pulse
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Exhale a mist of darkness in a horizontal sweeping motion, dealing damage to any enemy hit. If the remaining HP of an enemy hit by this move falls below 50%, they become immobilized for 0.6s. If this move hits the same enemy again within 8s, it deals additional damage.
rsb.notes: If this move deals damage while Tyranitar's piercing strength is activated by Ancient Power, the 8s duration of piercing damage is refreshed.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Reduces this move's cooldown by 1s.

rsb.name: Stone Edge
rsb.label: Damage - Melee Range
rsb.true_desc: Deals damage to enemies in a 90 degree cone, dealing more damage the closer the enemies are to the user. This move can be used up to 3 times with the cone widening to 135 and 180 degrees.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increased damage.

rsb.name: Rock Polish
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Charge ahead in the designated direction, dealing damage to any enemies hit. If this move hits any enemy, all damage is increased by 15% for 3s.

rsb.name: Ancient Power
rsb.label: Damage - Initial Hit
rsb.true_desc: Charge power before releasing a shock wave. The shock wave deals damage to nearby enemies and leaves them stunned for 1s. While charging power: Tyranitar becomes resistant to hindrances for 4s, movement speed is increased by 20% for 3s (stacking 3 times), and Tyranitar gains a shield (stacking 3 times and lasting up to 5s). If any enemies are hit by the shock wave, Tyranitar is granted piercing strength allowing damage dealt to ignore enemy Defense and shield effects for 8s.
rsb.notes: If this move hits an enemy, a second shock wave can be released in front of Tyranitar; dealing damage to enemies and decreasing their movement speed by 30% for 2s. If this second shock wave hits successfully, Tyranitar is granted another shield. The strength of this shield increases for each enemy hit, capping at 3 stacks.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Strengthens the effect of the shields granted by this move.

rsb.name: Sand Tomb
rsb.label: Damage - Leap
rsb.true_desc: Leap in a designated direction; dealing damage to any enemies hit and leaving them unable to act for 1.5s. When Tyranitar lands, the shock from landing creates a cloud of dust at the point of impact for 6s; dealing damage-over-time every 0.5s and decreasing movement speed of enemies hit by 35% for 1s every second.
rsb.notes: If this move is used again while Tyranitar is in the cloud of dust, enemies in front of Tyranitar will be pulled closer to it. Furthermore, while the user is in the cloud of dust, they take 15% reduced damage and can ignore the Defense and shield effects of enemies.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases the length of time the cloud of dust remains at the point of impact to 8s.

skills.name: Tyrannical Rampage
skills.buffs: 30% Movement Speed, 30% CDR, 20% Max HP Shield

rsb.name: Tyrannical Rampage
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Briefly becomes unstoppable and explodes with anger, then goes on a rampage for 10s, gaining 50% tenacity for the duration. While rampaging, changes the auto attack pattern, dealing increased damage.
rsb.notes: Damaging a Pokémon from the opposing team below 20% max HP with these auto attacks deals 40% max HP as true damage to the target (sufficient damage reduction effects can prevent the target from being knocked out).

name: Umbreon
notes: Auto attacks, Boosted attacks and Mean Look boosted attacks can critically strike but Umbreon has 0% base Critical-Hit rate at all levels. When on a team with four other eeveelutions, gains +1% maximum HP.

skills.name: Anticipation
skills.description: When Eevee would be shoved, thrown or left unabled to act, that effect is negated. This effect goes on a 40s cooldown after being triggered and is reset after respawning.
skills.passive2_description: When Umbreon would be shoved, thrown or left unabled to act, that effect is negated. Umbreon becomes unstoppable for 1.2s afterwards and also its Defense and Sp. Def are increased by 30% for 3s. This effect goes on a 40s cooldown after being triggered and is reset after respawning.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Becomes a boosted attack every third attack, lunging at a Pokémon  and dealing damage. This boosted attack also heals the user's HP. The lower the user's remaining HP, the more HP is restored.

rsb.name: Swift
rsb.label: Damage (First Star)
rsb.true_desc: Shoot 1 large and 3 small star-shaped rays, dealing damage to Pokémon and applying a mark to them after the fourth star hits that lasts 4s. When near a marked Pokémon, Eevee receives a 15% movement speed increase. When Eevee deals damage to a marked Pokémon, its next basic attack becomes a boosted attack.

rsb.name: Mean Look
rsb.label: Damage (Boosted)
rsb.true_desc: Pins an enemy Pokémon with a dark, arresting look, slowing them by 30% for 2s. After a 0.5s delay, the enemy is surrounded by a black zone they cannot leave for 3s. While inside the black zone, Umbreon’s basic attacks become boosted and deal increased damage. The black zone is removed if the target enemy is knocked out.
rsb.notes: Mean Look is cleansable if the cleanse is used when the laser connects and before the area appears on the ground.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases the duration of the black zone to 3.5s.

rsb.name: Foul Play
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Charges in a direction, dealing damage to Pokémon hit and slowing them by 15% for 2.5s. If the charge hits a Pokémon, this move can be used again within 6s and it will note the highest Attack stat of all enemies hit. If this move is used again, Umbreon sweeps in front of itself with its tail, dealing damage to Pokémon hit, slowing them by 30% for 2.5s and shoving them for 1s. If the highest enemy Attack was greater than Umbreon's Attack when the first stage hit, the second stage deals damage using the noted Attack. Otherwise it uses Umbreon's current Attack.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Umbreon's next basic attack after using this move becomes a boosted attack.

rsb.name: Fake Tears
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Feigns crying, dealing damage to nearby Pokémon  and decreases their Defense and Sp. Def by 20% for 2s. Also grants a shield for 4s.

rsb.name: Wish
rsb.label: Heal
rsb.true_desc: Wishes for an ally Pokémon or Umbreon. For 2s, that Pokémon receives 15% reduced damage, then afterward, the wish comes true and heals them. If the targeted Pokémon is knocked out before the wish comes true, a different ally Pokémon near them takes the wish instead.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases the damage reduction to 25% and amount of healing when the wish comes true.

rsb.name: Snarl
rsb.label: Damage (8x)
rsb.true_desc: Becomes hindrance resistant and begin snarling for 1.5s, dealing damage to enemy Pokémon in the area around Umbreon and decreasing the affected Pokémon's Attack and Sp. Atk stat by 3% for 1.5s and movement speed by 15% for 2s. Also grants the user a shield for 2s. Umbreon is slowed by 30% while snarling. The final shout leaves enemy Pokémon stunned for 0.7s and further decreases their Attack and Sp. Atk by 15% for 3s. The small shout Attack and Sp. Atk decreases can stack up to 6 times and stack with the big shout's Attack and Sp. Atk decreases.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases the stun duration of the final shout to 1s.

skills.name: Moonlight Prance
skills.buffs: 30% Movement Speed, 10% Max HP Shield

rsb.name: Moonlight Prance
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Umbreon briefly becomes unstoppable, leaping up and absorbing the shields of enemy Pokémon in the area around Umbreon, taking them for the user. Umbreon then lands, dealing damage to Pokémon in an area-of-effect, and stuns them for 1s. For 5s, enemy Pokémon in the area around Umbreon are slowed by 30%, and if an enemy Pokémon in that area is granted a shield, Umbreon absorbs 50% of the shield for themself. Additionally, after learning this move and while not in combat, Umbreon continually recovers 1% Max HP every second.
rsb.notes: Note: Umbreon cannot steal shields granted by Rayquaza or Assault Vest.

name: Urshifu

builds.name: Single Strike Style
builds.explanation: Muscle Band may be swapped out for Weakness Policy for a slower first center clear but overall more damage. Switching out Attack Weight for Weakness Policy offers a flexible item set between Rapid Strike and Single Strike

notes: Auto attacks, Wicked Blow, and Surging Strikes's third chain use can critically strike. Urshifu's Critical-Hit rate increases at levels 5 and 9.

skills.name: Inner Focus
skills.description: Reduces the duration of hindrances inflicted on Kubfu by 15%.
skills.passive2_description: When Urshifu deals damage to an opposing Pokémon with an active shield effect, 30% of the damage dealt to the shield is dealt as additional damage to the target's HP.

skills.name: Attack - Kubfu
skills.description: Becomes a boosted attack with increased range every third attack, lunging at an opposing Pokémon and dealing increased damage.
skills.basic2_description: Becomes a boosted attack with increased range every third attack, lunging at an opposing Pokémon, dealing increased damage and granting the user a shield for 3s when it hits.
skills.basic3_description: Becomes a boosted attack with increased range every third attack, dealing damage with two consecutive blows and reducing the user's move cooldowns by 1.5s when it hits.

rsb.name: Rock Smash
rsb.label: Damage (1st Level Charge)
rsb.true_desc: The user receives 20% reduced damage as they charge power for up to 2s, increasing power levels until reaching maximum charge after 1s; then punches in the designated direction when released, damaging opposing Pokémon hit. If this move is canceled or not released after 2s, it goes on a 0.9s cooldown.

rsb.name: Wicked Blow
rsb.label: Damage (Uncharged)
rsb.true_desc: The user becomes unstoppable, receives 20% reduced damage and decreases their movement speed as they charge power for up to 2.5s, becoming charged after 1s; then strikes in the designated direction with a fierce blow when released, readying a boosted attack if it hits. When uncharged, the cooldown of this move is reduced by 50%; and the user strikes in a small line area of effect, damaging opposing Pokémon and decreasing their movement speed when it hits.
rsb.notes: When charged, the user strikes in a larger cone area of effect, dealing increased damage to opposing Pokémon and dealing additional missing HP damage to those hit. Opposing Pokémon in the center line area of effect receive a critical hit and are shoved. If this move is canceled or not released after 2.5s, it goes on a 2.1s cooldown.
rsb.add1_true_desc: Damage is always a critical and deals additional damage equal to 10% of the enemies missing HP. Against Wild Pokemon: This additional damage is capped at 1200.
rsb.add2_true_desc: Deals additional damage equal to 5% of the enemies' missing HP. Against Wild Pokemon: This additional damage is capped at 600.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Strengthens damage reduction while charging this move to 40%. If this move is charged when released, opposing Pokémon in the center line area of effect are also stunned with the shove.

rsb.name: Surging Strikes
rsb.label: Damage - per Hit
rsb.true_desc: The user dashes forward and strikes with a flowing motion, damaging opposing Pokémon hit. This move can be used up to two more times within 4s of the previous use. Opposing Pokémon hit by the third use receive a critical hit and are thrown.
rsb.notes: Each time this move is used, the user readies an enhanced boosted attack which restores the user's HP per hit.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Receives 30% reduced damage while using this move.

rsb.name: Headbutt
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: The user dashes forward with a headbutt, damaging opposing Pokémon and shoving them when it hits.

upgrades.name: Throat Chop
upgrades.description1: Dash in the designated direction and strike with a flowing motion, dealing damage to enemies hit. This move can be used an additional two times and the third time it is used, any hits are always critical hits and the enemy is thrown. Urshifu's next basic attack after using this move becomes a boosted attack and if the boosted attack hits, Urshifu's HP is restored.

rsb.name: Throat Chop
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.alert: This move must be selected if Wicked Blow was learned.
rsb.true_desc: The user readies a boosted attack and dashes forward, damaging opposing Pokémon in their path and stunning them for 0.7s when it hits.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Reduces this move's cooldown by 2s when Wicked Blow hits.

upgrades.name: Liquidation
upgrades.description1: Deal damage to and decrease the defense of enemies in the area around Urshifu by 30% for 2s. When this move hits, Urshifu is granted a shield whose strength is based on the number of enemies hit.
upgrades.description2: Reduces this move's cooldown by 1s.

rsb.name: Liquidation
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.alert: This move must be selected if Surging Strikes was learned.
rsb.true_desc: The user stomps the ground, damaging nearby opposing Pokémon and decreasing their Defense by 30% for 3s; and granting the user a shield for 3s if it hits, strengthening per opposing Pokémon hit (up to 3 times).
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Reduces this move's cooldown by 1s.

skills.name: Ebon Fist
skills.buffs: 30% Movement Speed, 30% CDR, 20% Max HP Shield

rsb.name: Ebon Fist
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.alert: This move must be selected if Wicked Blow was learned.
rsb.true_desc: The user becomes unstoppable and the cooldown of Wicked Blow is reset when this Unite Move is used. The user dashes at the designated Pokémon from the opposing team, stunning them, then chooses whether to designate a direction to move or not. If no direction is chosen, the user pushes them slightly and delivers an uppercut, damaging the target, throwing them and stunning them when they land.
rsb.notes: If the user chooses a direction, the user instead delivers a more powerful blow to the target, dealing increased damage and shoving them in the designated direction. The shoved target also deals reduced damage to opposing Pokémon they collide with and throws those hit.

skills.name: Flowing Fists
skills.buffs: 30% Movement Speed, 30% CDR, 20% Max HP Shield

rsb.name: Flowing Fists
rsb.label: Damage (Initial Hit)
rsb.alert: This move must be selected if Surging Strikes was learned.
rsb.true_desc: The user activates the Flowing Fists buff for up to 10s, and briefly becomes unstoppable and damages nearby opposing Pokémon, shoving them away. If this Unite Move is used again, the user becomes unstoppable and receives 30% reduced damage as they unleash a minimum of 5 consecutive blows upon the designated Pokémon from the opposing team, dealing damage to the target and shoving them with each hit. After the consecutive blows have finished, the user delivers a final kick, damaging opposing Pokémon in front of themself and shoving them when it hits.
rsb.notes: When the Flowing Fists buff is active, until the follow-up attack is used, every 2 times the user hits a Pokémon from the opposing team, the number of consecutive blows for the follow-up attack increases by 1 (up to 10 hits for an additional 5 blows; maximum 10 consecutive blows).

name: Venusaur

builds.name: Giga Dance
builds.explanation: This set has a higher focus on positioning to maximize Giga Drain cooldown reductions off Petal Dance. Resonant Guard may be used in place of Focus Band for team utility and the consideration which Resonant Guard gains more value than Focus Band at 21 seconds of continued combat.

notes: Only auto attacks can critically strike, but Venusaur has 0% base Critical-Hit rate at all levels.

skills.name: Overgrow
skills.description: When HP is low, increases all damage dealt.

rsb.name: Overgrow
rsb.true_desc: When HP is 30% or less; increase all damage dealt by 20%.

skills.name: Attack
skills.description: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, dealing increased damage. This boosted attack also pulls enemies inward between the vines.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, becoming a vine whip that strikes twice, pulls enemies between both vines, and stuns them for 0.4s, then applies a 20% slow for 1.5s.

skills.name: Seed Bomb
skills.description: Hurl a large seed at the designated area, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect.

rsb.name: Seed Bomb
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Venusaur hurls a large seed to the designated location, damaging all enemies in the radius.

upgrades.name: Sludge Bomb
upgrades.description1: Hurl unsanitary sludge to the designated area, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect, leaving them poisoned and decreasing their movement speed and Sp. Defense for a short time
upgrades.description2: Increased area of effect.

rsb.name: Sludge Bomb
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Venusaur hurls toxic sludge to the designated location, damaging, slowing movement speed by 50% for 2s (stacking with the radius slow), and poisoning all enemies in the radius when it lands. The sludge lingers; damaging enemies every 0.5s for 5s in the radius, slowing them by 50%, and reducing their Sp. Defense by 40% for 2s (refreshes every tick).
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increased radius.

upgrades.name: Giga Drain
upgrades.description1: Drain HP from enemies in the area of effect, dealing damage to them and restoring HP when this hits. Also reduces damage received for a short time.
upgrades.description2: Increases amount of HP restored.

rsb.name: Giga Drain
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Venusaur emits a cone-shaped blast in the designated direction, damaging enemies and restoring health when it hits. Venusaur also takes 40% reduced damage for 2.5s.
rsb.notes: This move's healing is not increased by Venusaur's passive.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increased healing.

skills.name: Razor Leaf
skills.description: Launch many sharp-edged leaves in a quick succession of attacks, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect.

rsb.name: Razor Leaf
rsb.label: Damage (10x)
rsb.true_desc: Venusaur launches a barrage of sharp-edged leaves in the designated direction, damaging enemies 10 times over 0.75s.

upgrades.name: Solar Beam
upgrades.description1: Blast a bundled beam of light, dealing damage to enemies in a line.
upgrades.description2: Reduced cooldown.

rsb.name: Solar Beam
rsb.label: Damage - per tick (x5)
rsb.true_desc: Venusaur charges for 0.7s before firing a beam of light in the designated direction, damaging enemies five times over 0.3s.
rsb.notes: Against Wild Pokémon: Each tick is capped at 450 damage and the total damage is capped at 2250.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Reduced cast time to 0.6s and base cooldown is further reduced by 2s.

upgrades.name: Petal Dance
upgrades.description1: Scatter petals around the user, increasing movement speed for a short time and dealing damage over time to enemies in the area of effect.
upgrades.description2: Increased area of effect.

rsb.name: Petal Dance
rsb.label: Damage - Aura (16 Ticks)
rsb.true_desc: Venusaur scatters petals around themself for 4.8s, increasing movement speed by 90% and damaging enemies every 0.3s in the radius (for a total of 16 damage ticks). This movement speed increase slowly decays during the duration of this move by 9% every 0.5s to a minimum of 27%. Petal Dance reduces the cooldown of Sludge Bomb or Giga Drain by 30% of the current remaining cooldown, per tick of damage that hit an enemy player (hitting multiple enemies reduces the cooldown more).
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increased radius.

skills.name: Verdant Anger
skills.buffs: 30% Movement Speed, 30% CDR, 20% Max HP Shield
skills.description: Launches a giant seed toward the designated area. The seed then splits apart, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and decreasing their movement speed for a short time.

rsb.name: Verdant Anger
rsb.label: Damage - Initial
rsb.true_desc: Venusaur becomes unstoppable to hurl a massive seed to the designated location, damaging all enemies in the radius and slowing them by 35% for 1s. The seed then splits apart into 4 smaller seeds, each damaging all enemies in their radius.

name: Wigglytuff
notes: Only auto attacks can critically strike, but Wigglytuff has 0% base Critical-Hit rate at all levels.

skills.name: Cute Charm
skills.description: When hit by an enemies attack at close range, make that enemy infatuated for a short time. Infatuated enemies become enthralled and approach Wigglytuff against their will. The effects of this ability have a cooldown and cannot trigger on the same enemy in quick succession.

rsb.name: Cute Charm
rsb.true_desc: When hit by an enemy attack at close range, make that enemy infatuated for a short time (10s CD). Infatuated enemies become enthralled and approach Wigglytuff against their will.

skills.name: Attack
skills.description: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, dealing damage to enemies and spinning them around when it hits.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, dealing damage to enemies and stunning them for 0.5s when it hits.

skills.name: Pound
skills.description: Perform a combo attack in front, dealing damage to enemies and decreasing their movement speed for a short time when the attack hits.

rsb.name: Pound
rsb.label: Damage - per Slap
rsb.true_desc: Wigglytuff slaps the area in front of them twice (.3s apart), damaging enemies in a cone and slowing them by 40% for 0.5s.

upgrades.name: Double Slap
upgrades.description1: Perform a combo attack in front, dealing damage to enemies and decreasing their movement speed for a short time when the attack hits.
upgrades.description2: Increased number of attacks.

rsb.name: Double Slap
rsb.label: Damage - per Slap
rsb.true_desc: Wigglytuff unleashes a barrage of slaps, damaging enemies in a cone 3-5 times and slowing them by 45% for 1.5s.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Slaps 4-6 times instead.

upgrades.name: Dazzling Gleam
upgrades.description1: Emit a powerful flash in the designated direction, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect twice.
upgrades.description2: Also decreases the movement speed of enemies for a short time when the first hit of this move deals damage to them.

rsb.name: Dazzling Gleam
rsb.label: Damage - First Hit
rsb.true_desc: Wigglytuff emits a flash of fairy energy, dealing a small amount of damage in a cone after 0.6s followed by a large amount of damage.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Slows enemies hit by the first flash by 40% for 1s.

skills.name: Defense Curl
skills.description: Perform a quick roll, granting the user a shield and throwing any enemies hit by the roll. Hitting an obstacle while rolling will change the direction the user is moving and reset the cooldown of Pound, Double Slap, or Dazzling Gleam.

rsb.name: Defense Curl
rsb.true_desc: Wigglytuff gains a 25% max HP shield for 0.5s and rolls forward a short distance, throwing enemies hit in the air for 0.5s. Hitting an obstacle while rolling will change the direction Wigglytuff is moving and reset the cooldown of Pound, Double Slap, or Dazzling Gleam.

upgrades.name: Rollout
upgrades.description1: Perform a quick roll, granting the user a shield. Also deals damage to enemies hit by the roll and throws them. Hitting an obstacle while rolling will change the direction the user is moving and reset the cooldown of Pound, Double Slap, or Dazzling Gleam.
upgrades.description2: Increases the length of time enemies are thrown.

rsb.name: Rollout
rsb.label: Damage - per Hit
rsb.true_desc: Wigglytuff gains a 25% max HP shield for 2.5s and rolls forwards. Wigglytuff becomes unstoppable for the duration of the roll, damaging and throwing Pokémon hit in the air for 0.5s. Hitting an obstacle while rolling will change the direction Wigglytuff is moving up to 5 times and reset the cooldown of Pound, Double Slap, and Dazzling Gleam. Also, the shield refreshes duration each time an obstacle is hit.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases the amount of time enemies are thrown in the air to 0.7s.

upgrades.name: Sing
upgrades.description1: Wigglytuff begins singing, slowing enemies around them by 15% for 2s per "Note" and increasing Wigglytuff's movement speed by 30% for 2.5s. Enemies that stay inside the song's effect will be put to sleep (when reaching 4 Notes) for 1.5s, and have their Defense and Special Defense reduced by 35% for 1.5s.
upgrades.description2: Increases the amount of time enemies are asleep to 1.75s and the duration of Defense and Sp. Defense reduction to 1.75s.

skills.name: Starlight Recital
skills.buffs: 30% Movement Speed, 30% CDR, 20% Max HP Shield
skills.description: Begin performing a recital, granting the user and nearby allies a shield as well as removing all status conditions from the affected allies and make them immune to hindrances for a short time.

rsb.name: Starlight Recital
rsb.label: Shield
rsb.true_desc: Begin performing a recital and become unstoppable for 3s, granting Wigglytuff and nearby allies a shield for 3.5s as well as removing all status conditions from Wigglytuff and the affected allies and granting them immunity to hindrances for as long as the shield is active. When the shield expires, allies are healed for 50% of the remaining shield value.

name: Zacian
notes: Only auto attacks can critically strike. Zacian's Critical-Hit rate increases at levels 5 and 9.

rsb.name: Intrepid Sword
rsb.true_desc: If the goal scoring button is held down, Zacian charges its sword  with Aeos energy. For a short time, its basic attacks become boosted attacks. In addition, during this time, Zacian can use a boosted version of one of its moves once. The longer the goal scoring button is held down, the more Aeos energy is charged into the sword, lengthening the duration of the boost effect on basic attacks and moves. This Ability goes on an 8s cooldown after it’s triggered.
rsb.notes: Minimum 5 energy is required to charge with a maximum of 10 (except for Unite Move). Duration for buff window is 3s for 5 energy, 6s for 8 energy, 10s for 10 energy. Charging occurs at a rate of 1 energy per 0.1s.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Stage One
rsb.true_desc: When basic attacks are performed consecutively within 2s, additional effects are applied depending on the stage of the consecutive attack. If a Move is used, the time to perform the next consecutive attack is extended.
rsb.notes: Boosted attacks have an increased area of effect and deal additional damage proportional to the opposing Pokémon’s HP.
rsb.add3_true_desc: Dashes towards the target, reducing all Move cooldowns by 15% of their current cooldown.

boosted_rsb.name: Boosted
boosted_rsb.label: Stage One - Boosted
boosted_rsb.rsb_info: Deals additional 2% Max HP. (Additional damage capped at 400 on Wild Pokémon)
boosted_rsb.add1_true_desc: Applies 15% Slow for 1s & deals additional 3% Max HP (Additional damage capped at 600 on Wild Pokémon)
boosted_rsb.add2_true_desc: Heals 5% Max HP & deals additional 3% Max HP damage (Additional damage capped at 600 on Wild Pokémon)
boosted_rsb.add3_true_desc: Dashes towards the target, reducing all Move cooldowns by 15% of their current cooldown. Also deals additional 4% Max HP damage. (Additional damage capped at 750 on Wild Pokémon)

rsb.name: Slash
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Slashes target Pokémon and deals a small amount of damage to nearby Pokémon. When this move is boosted with Aeos energy, its area of effect is increased, deals increased damage and also slows of Pokémon hit by 60% for 0.5s.

rsb.name: Metal Claw
rsb.label: Damage - Shockwave
rsb.true_desc: Releases a shock wave in the designated direction, dealing damage to Pokémon, decreasing their movement speed by 30% for 3s. As the shock wave moves forward, projectiles from non-allied Pokémon it hits are negated. After releasing the shock wave,  Zacian charges in that direction and deals damage to Pokémon. If the charge hits an enemy, Zacian's attack speed is increased by 100% for 4s or 6 attacks, whichever comes first. When this move is boosted with Aeos energy, the shock wave's size and travel distance are increased and the intensity of the slow is increased to 45% for 3s.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Reduces this move's cooldown by 1s.

rsb.name: Sacred Sword
rsb.label: Damage - Circle Draw
rsb.true_desc: Has the user slash around itself as if drawing a circle with the tip of its sword, dealing damage to opposing Pokémon in the area of effect and slowing them by 20% for 3s. During this slash, Zacian briefly becomes unstoppable and reduces damage taken by 30%. After 1.5s the user then unleashes a slashing attack inside the circle, dealing damage to opposing Pokémon it hits and leaving them unable to act for 0.35s. After a flurry attack hits an opposing Pokémon, the user’s Attack is increased by 20% for 3s, and damage dealt by the user’s moves and basic attacks ignores 10% of the opposing Pokémon’s Defense. When this move is boosted with Aeos energy, its area of effect is increased, and the time until the slashing attack is unleashed is reduced to 1s.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Reduce the time until the flurry of slashes is unleashed to 1.2s for the base Sacred Sword+ and 0.45s for Boosted Sacred Sword+

rsb.name: Quick Attack
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Zacian charges in the designated direction, stopping at the first Pokémon it hits and dealing damage. When this move is boosted with Aeos energy, it also leaves opposing Pokémon unable to act for 1s.

rsb.name: Agility
rsb.true_desc: Dashes in the designated direction and increases the user’s movement speed by 30% decaying every 1s by 10% down to a minimum of 7.5% for 3s. Dealing or taking any damage extends this duration by 1 second per attack up to 6 seconds and bypasses the movement speed decay. When this move is boosted with Aeos energy, the user is granted a shield.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Further increases movement speed gain to 40% on use.

rsb.name: Play Rough
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Leaps in the designated direction stopping at the first Pokémon hit. The Pokémon hit is dealt damage and is stunned for 0.25s. Zacian lands near that Pokémon it hits and deals damage to nearby Pokémon stunning them as well. If Play Rough connects, Zacian receives 25% reduced damage from the enemies hit for 3s after landing. When this move is boosted with Aeos energy, Zacian leaps further and through all Pokémon hit along the leap’s path. Pokémon hit will receive damage and be left stunned for the same amount as the base stun duration.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases the stun duration to 0.75s.

skills.name: Sovereign Sword
skills.buffs: 30% Movement Speed, 30% CDR, 20% Max HP Shield

rsb.name: Sovereign Sword
rsb.label: Damage (<=10 Energy Charged)
rsb.true_desc: Has the user ready its giant sword, charge the sword with Aeos energy, and then slash in front of itself. The user becomes Unstoppable, applying a 10% self slow while the Unite Move button is held down and the user is in its ready stance. The longer the user is in this stance, the more Aeos energy is charged into the sword, and the more damage this move deals. If a set amount of Aeos energy or more is charged into the sword, the Unite Move becomes boosted, and the slash’s area of effect increases. This boosted Unite Move deals increased damage to opposing Pokémon it hits who have been buffed by their own Unite Move.
rsb.notes: This move deals 15% decreased damage per additional target hit, capping at 30% less damage from hitting 3 targets.
rsb.add4_label: Damage (Additional - Boosted) versus Unite Buffed Pokémon

name: Zeraora
notes: Only auto attacks and Spark's additional auto attacks can critically strike. Zeraora's Critical-Hit rate increases at levels 5 and 9.

skills.name: Volt Absorb
skills.description: Gain an electric charge when receiving damage, converting a portion of that damage into additional Attack.

rsb.name: Volt Absorb
rsb.true_desc: Gains 8% of damage received as bonus Attack for 4s (maximum 200 bonus Attack from 2,500 damage received).

skills.name: Attack
skills.description: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, dealing increased damage and paralyzing the enemy while restoring some of Zeraora's HP.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, dealing increased damage and paralyzing opposing Pokémon hit, and restoring 10% missing HP per target hit.
rsb.notes: The movement speed of paralyzed targets is decreased by 15% for 2.5s and their auto attack speed is decreased by 25% for 1s.

skills.name: Agility
skills.description: Perform a quick dash and increase basic attack speed for a short time afterward.

rsb.name: Agility
rsb.true_desc: Quickly dashes forward, and increases auto attack speed by 45% for 3s.

upgrades.name: Volt Switch
upgrades.description1: Perform a high-speed dash, dealing damage to enemies hit and increase basic attack speed for a short time. Using this move again within a set period of time will allow the user to immediately dash back to the original position.
upgrades.description2: Increased damage and basic attack speed buff duration.

rsb.name: Volt Switch
rsb.label: Damage - Initial Dash
rsb.true_desc: Dashes forward at high speed, damaging opposing Pokémon in their path; and increasing auto attack speed by 45% for 3s. Also marks the starting location of this dash for 3s.
rsb.notes: This move can be used again within 3s to dash back to the starting location, dealing increased damage to opposing Pokémon in their path; and refreshing the auto attack speed buff duration.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases the damage of both dashes. Strengthens the auto attack speed increase to 60% for 3s.

upgrades.name: Spark
upgrades.description1: Leap at an enemy dealing damage to them. If using your basic attack before reaching the targeted enemy, instead leap at the closest enemy and deal damage to it. This move can be used 3 times before going on cooldown.
upgrades.description2: Also restore HP if performing a basic attack before reaching the targeted enemy.

rsb.name: Spark
rsb.label: Damage - Jump
rsb.true_desc: Becomes unstoppable for 0.2s and dashes forward with an electrically charged leap, damaging opposing Pokémon in their path. If an auto attack is used before the leap ends; leaps to an opposing Pokémon, dealing increased damage to the target.
rsb.notes: This move can be used again within 4s of the last use, repeating the effects of the first use (up to 3 total uses).
rsb.add1_true_desc: If an auto attack is used before the leap ends, deal 110% Atk as damage instead.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Restores 15% missing HP if leaping to an opposing Pokémon with an auto attack before reaching them with the dash.

skills.name: Slash
skills.description: Pounce at an enemy and attack with sharp claws. This move's final attack throws enemies.

rsb.name: Slash
rsb.label: Damage - per Hit (3 Hits)
rsb.true_desc: Pounces toward the designated opposing Pokémon's location and attacks with 3 sharp claw swipes, damaging opposing Pokémon in the area of effect and throwing those hit by the last swipe for 0.5s.

upgrades.name: Discharge
upgrades.description1: Release an electrical discharge, dealing damage to nearby enemies and grant the user a shield when it hits. If this move hits enemies that are paralyzed, it pulls them in toward the user once the move ends, dealing damage to them once again and leaving them unable to act.
upgrades.description2: Decreases movement speed of enemies for a short time when this move hits.

rsb.name: Discharge
rsb.label: Damage - per Tick (6 Ticks)
rsb.true_desc: Discharges electricity around themself for 1.5s, damaging opposing Pokémon in the area of effect every 0.3s (up to 6 times), followed by a final discharge after 0.4s; granting a shield for 3s when this move hits.
rsb.notes: Pulls opposing Pokémon paralyzed by the user hit by the final discharge in toward Zeraora's position over 1s, stunning them for 1s during the pull; and dealing extra damage to them.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Decreases the movement speed of opposing Pokémon by 25% for 1s when hit.

upgrades.name: Wild Charge
upgrades.description1: Charge in the designated direction. If this move hits an enemy, unleash a combo attack that also deals a set amount of damage to itself. If the user hit an enemy with Volt Switch, Spark, or a boosted attack before using this move, the number of attacks in the combo is increased.
upgrades.description2: Also deals damage to nearby enemies when this hits.

rsb.name: Wild Charge
rsb.label: Damage - Initial Hit
rsb.true_desc: Dashes forward. If this move hits an opposing Pokémon; latches onto the target, and becomes untargetable to unleash a combo of at least 3 attacks, damaging the target with each attack (switching to the closest opposing Pokémon if the target is out of range or unable to be attacked for the next attack). Receives 1% remaining HP recoil damage per attack; the initial hit deals 2 instances of recoil damage. Opposing Pokémon hit by one of these attacks receive 50% reduced damage from subsequent attacks from Wild Charge for 5s.
rsb.notes: Hitting an opposing Pokémon with boosted attacks, Volt Switch, or Spark applies 1 stack of a Wild Charge buff for 5s (up to 3 stacks); each stack of the buff adds 1 additional attack to the next use of Wild Charge (for up to 6 total hits). Zeraora is untargetable while attacking; for 1.2s at 0 stacks, 1.5s at 1 stack, 1.8s at 2 stacks and 2s at 3 stacks from this buff.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Deals 50% reduced damage to other nearby opposing Pokémon with each attack.

skills.name: Plasma Gale
skills.buffs: 30% Movement Speed, 20% Attack Speed, 15% CDR, 20% Max HP Shield
skills.description: Unleash a blast of lightning, dealing damage to enemies in the area of effect and throw them. This also creates a zone of plasma that increases the user's basic attack range and damage dealt while inside this zone.

rsb.name: Plasma Gale
rsb.label: Damage - Trail
rsb.true_desc: Becomes unstoppable for 0.5s and launches a bolt of lightning toward the designated target; damaging opposing Pokémon in its path toward the target and throwing them for 0.5s. Once the bolt reaches the target; damages opposing Pokémon in an area of effect and throws them once again.
rsb.notes: Creates a circular zone of plasma centered on the target's location for 5s when it hits; paralyzing opposing Pokémon inside it for 3s. While in the zone, also increases the user's auto attack range, and auto attack damage by 20%.

name: Zoroark
notes: Only auto attacks can critically strike. Zoroark's Critical-Hit rate increases at levels 5 and 9.

skills.name: Illusion
skills.description: The user takes the form of a random wild Pokémon or Pokémon from the opposing team. The user returns to their original form when taking damage or using an auto attack or move (15s cd).

rsb.name: Illusion
rsb.true_desc: Zoroark takes the form of the nearest enemy. Zoroark returns to their original form when taking damage, using an auto attack or move, when attempting to score, or when recalling to base. Applying the illusion applies Unstoppable for 20 frames (1/3s). This ability has a 15s cooldown.

skills.name: Attack
skills.description: Becomes a boosted attack with every third attack, dealing increased damage.

rsb.name: Basic
rsb.label: Damage - Basic
rsb.true_desc: Becomes a boosted with every third attack, dealing increased damage.

skills.name: Slash
skills.description: Dashes in the designated direction, dealing damage to enemies hit.

rsb.name: Slash
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Dashes in the designated direction, dealing damage to enemies hit.

upgrades.name: Shadow Claw
upgrades.description1: Dash in the designated direction, dealing damage to enemies hit and leaving them unable to act for a short time. If this move hits an enemy near the end point of the dash, they will be thrown instead of being left unable to act.
upgrades.description2: Increases the length of time enemies are thrown.

rsb.name: Shadow Claw
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Dash in the designated direction, dealing damage to enemies, and leaving them unable to act for 0.1s. If this move hits an enemy near the end point of the dash, they will be thrown for 0.3s instead of being left unable to act.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases the length of time enemies are thrown to 0.6s.

upgrades.name: Cut
upgrades.description1: Dashes in the designated direction, dealing damage to enemies, and restoring the Zoroark's HP.
upgrades.description2: Increases the amount of HP this move restores.

rsb.name: Cut
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Dashes in the designated direction, dealing damage to enemies, and restoring Zoroark's HP.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Increases the amount of HP this move restores.

skills.name: Fury Swipes
skills.description: Dashes in the designated direction, dealing damage to enemies. If this move hits an enemy, for a short time afterwards, this move can be activated again.

rsb.name: Fury Swipes
rsb.label: Damage
rsb.true_desc: Dashes in the designated direction, dealing damage to enemies. If this move hits an enemy, for a short time, this move can be used again.

upgrades.name: Night Slash
upgrades.description1: For a short time, change the user’s normal movement to dash attacks. After performing a dash attack, the user’s next auto attack changes to a special auto attack. During this move’s effect duration, whenever Zoroark hits an enemy with other moves or special auto attacks, this move’s effect duration increases and the user is able to use Night Slash again. This move’s effect duration ends if the user moves when it’s unable to use Night Slash. During this move’s effect duration, if Zoroark hits enemies with a total of six moves and/or special auto attacks, Zoroark will jump into the air and then while landing, slash a set area-of-effect, dealing damage to enemies. Zoroark recovers HP if they hit enemies with this slashing attack. While jumping, the user is able to use Shadow Claw or Cut to move a set distance.
upgrades.description2: Reduces this move's cooldown by 1s.

rsb.name: Night Slash
rsb.label: Damage - Dash
rsb.true_desc: For 2s, changes the user’s normal movement to dash attacks. After performing a dash attack, the user’s next auto attack changes to a unique boosted attack. During this move’s effect duration, whenever Zoroark hits enemies with other moves or unique boosted attacks, this move’s effect duration is reset to 2s and the user is able to use Night Slash again. This move’s effect duration ends if the user moves when they're unable to use Night Slash. During this move’s effect duration, if Zoroark hits enemies with a total of six moves and/or unique boosted attacks, the user will jump into the air becoming invincible, and then while landing, slash a set area-of-effect, dealing damage to enemies and additional damage to enemies based on how much HP they are missing. Zoroark additionally recovers HP if enemies are hit with either of the two rectangular diagonally oriented areas of the cross slash up to once per area. Hitting a target in the overlap of the two rectangular diagonally oriented areas will heal double the value. While jumping, the user is able to use Shadow Claw or Cut to move a set distance.
rsb.add1_true_desc: Deals an additional 10% missing enemy HP as damage. Against Wild Pokemon: The total damage is capped at 1000.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Reduces this move's cooldown by 1s.

upgrades.name: Feint Attack
upgrades.description1: Dashes in the designated direction, dealing damage to enemies and reducing all of the user’s move cooldowns. If this move hits an enemy, for a short time, the location where the dash started is marked, and the user is able to use this move again; returning to the marked location and dealing damage to enemies. A new mark is left where the dash started. As long as there is a mark, if the user uses another move, the mark will move to where the move was used. If the user hits enemies four times with either Feint Attack or other moves without interrupting the chain of marking, the next use of Feint Attack changes. If this changed form of Feint Attack is used, Zoroark leaps at the designated enemy and deals damage to them before landing in the designated direction.
upgrades.description2: Reduces this move's cooldown by 1s.

rsb.name: Feint Attack
rsb.label: Damage - Dash
rsb.true_desc: Dashes in the designated direction, dealing damage to enemies and resetting all of the user’s move cooldowns. If this move hits an enemy, for 3s, the location where the dash started is marked, and the user is able to use this move again, returning to the marked location, dealing damage to enemies. A new mark is left where that dash started. As long as there is a mark, if the user uses another move, the mark will move to where the move was used. If the user hits enemies four times with either Feint Attack or other moves without interrupting the chain of marking, the next use of Feint Attack changes. If this changed form of Feint Attack is used, Zoroark leaps at the designated enemy. Zoroark designates a direction during the leap to bounce off the target in a designated direction to perform a slashing attack. This slashing attack deals damage to the originally designated target and any Pokémon in the slash area of effect. This slash also deals additional damage based on missing HP and grants unstoppable to Zoroark.
rsb.add1_true_desc: Deals an additional 15% missing enemy HP as damage. Against Wild Pokemon: The total damage is capped at 1200.
rsb.enhanced_true_desc: Reduces this move's cooldown by 1s.

skills.name: Nightfall Daze
skills.buffs: 80% Movement Speed, 20% Max HP Shield
skills.description: Release dark shockwaves, dealing damage to enemies hit. Three shockwaves are released, and each one has an increasingly larger area-of-effect. Zoroark is immune to hindrances while releasing shockwaves.

rsb.name: Nightfall Daze
rsb.label: Damage - per Shockwave
rsb.true_desc: Release dark shockwaves, dealing damage to enemies hit. Three shockwaves are released, and each one has an increasingly larger area-of-effect. Zoroark is unstoppable during this move.
